01 - Patient Registration.Name: 01 - Patient Registration
01 - Patient Registration.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name} this is from the clubfoot clinic at {case.clinic_name}. We will send you important information and reminders regarding {case.patient_first_name}'s treatment.
01 - Patient Registration.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name} c'est la clinique du pied bot. Nous vous enverrons des informations importantes et des rappels concernant le traitement de {case.patient_first_first_name}.
01 - Patient Registration.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}, somos de la Clinica de Pie Equinovaro. Te enviaremos información importante y recordatorios en relación al tratamiento de {case.patient_first_name}.
01 - Patient Registration.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Ny toeram-pitsaboana ny mivadi-tongotra ihany ity. Mandefa vaovao manan-danja sy mampatsiahy ny mikasika ny fitsaboana an'i {case.patient_first_name} ho anareo izahay.
01 - Patient Registration.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name} {case.clinic_name} မှာရှိတဲ့ ခြေခွင်ရောဂါကုဆေးခန်းမှ ဖြစ်ပါတယ်။ {case.patient_first_name} ရဲ့ကုသမှုနဲ့ ပတ်သက်ပြီး အရေးကြီး အချက်အလက်များနဲ့ သတိပေးချက်များကို ပေးပို့သွားမှာ ဖြစ်ပါတယ်။
01 - Patient Registration.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name} ខ្ញុំទូរស័ព្ទពីគ្លីនិកជើងខ្វេរនៅ {case.clinic_name}។ យើងខ្ញុំនឹងបញ្ជូនព័ត៌មានសំខាន់ៗដល់លោកអ្នក និងរំលឹកលោកអ្នក ទាក់ទងនឹងការព្យាបាលរបស់ {case.patient_first_name}។
01 - Patient Registration.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू, हामी  {case.clinic_name} स्थित क्लबफुट क्लिनिकबाट हौं । हामी तपाईलाई {case.patient_first_name} को उपचारको महत्वपूर्ण जानकारी तथा रिमाईन्डर पठाउने छौं ।
01 - Patient Registration.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name} ujumbe huu unatoka katika kliniki ya miguu kifundo iliyoko {case.clinic_name}. Tutakutumia maelezo muhimu na vikumbusho kuhusu matibabu ya {case.patient_first_name}.
01 - Patient Registration.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Mula ito sa clubfoot clinic sa {case.clinic_name}. Ipapadala namin sa inyo ang mahahalagang impormasyon at paalala tungkol sa gamutan ni {case.patient_first_name}.
01 - Patient Registration.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name} nun la  waa kilinig biy faj laagog tànk ci  {case.clinic_name}  Dinanu leen yónnee xabaar yu am maanaa ak ay fàttali yu jëm ci pajum {case.patient_first_first_name}.
01 - Patient Registration.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name} kini kay gikan sa clubfoot clinic sa {case.clinic_name}. Magpadala mi sa inyo ug importanteng mga impormasyon ug mga pahinumdum bahin sa kaayuhan ni {case.patient_first_name}.

02 - Treatment Introduction.Name: 02 - Treatment Introduction
02 - Treatment Introduction.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Clubfoot is a medical condition that happens to 1 out of 800 babies. No one is to blame for clubfoot. It can affect anyone!
02 - Treatment Introduction.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Le pied bot est un trouble médical qui touche 1 bébé sur 800. Personne n'est à blâmer concernant le pied bot. Cela peut affecter n'importe qui!
02 - Treatment Introduction.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. El Pie Equinovaro es una condición que aparece en uno de cada 800 bebes. Nadie es culpable por esta condición ¡puede afectar a cualquiera!
02 - Treatment Introduction.MLG: ma ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Ny mivadi-tongotra dia aretina mahazo ny zaza 1 amin'ny 800. Tsy misy omen-tsiny anefa satria io dia aretina mety hahazo na iza na iza.
02 - Treatment Introduction.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ ခြေထောက်ခွင်တဲ့ရောဂါဆိုတာ ကလေး ၈၀၀ မှာ ၁ ယောက်ဖြစ်ပွားတဲ့ ရောဂါတစ်ခုဖြစ်ပါတယ်။ ခြေထောက်ခွင်တဲ့ ရောဂါအတွက် ဘယ်သူ့ကိုမှ အပြစ်တင်လို့မရပါဘူး။ ဘယ်သူမဆို ဖြစ်နိုင်ပါတယ်။
02 - Treatment Introduction.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ ជើងខ្វេរគឺជាលក្ខខ័ណ្ឌវេជ្ជសាស្ត្រដែលកើតឡើងនៅលើទារកម្នាក់ ក្នុងចំណោម ៨០០នាក់។ មិនមាននរណាម្នាក់ត្រូវបានស្តីបន្ទោសចំពោះការមានជើងខ្វេរនេះទេ។ វាអាចកើតឡើងចំពោះមនុស្សគ្រប់រូប!
02 - Treatment Introduction.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । क्लबफुट एक चिकित्सकीय अवस्था हो, जुन ८०० मध्ये १ जना बच्चामा हुन्छ । क्लबफुटका लागी कसैलाई दोष दिन मिल्दैन । यसले जो-कोहीलाई असर पार्न सक्छ ।
02 - Treatment Introduction.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Miguu kifundo ni tatizo la kiafya ambalo hutokea kwa mtoto mmoja kati ya mia nane. Hakuna mtu anayepaswa kulaumiwa kwa miguu kifundo. Inaweza kuathiri mtu yeyote!
02 - Treatment Introduction.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ang clubfoot ay medikal na kondisyon na nakaaapekto sa 1 sa 800 sanggol. Walang dapat sisihin sa kondisyong ito. Maaaring maapektuhan ang kahit na sino!
02 - Treatment Introduction.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Laagog tànk jàngoro la juy dal 1 liir ci 800.Waruñoo xarab kenn ci mbirum laagog tànk.Mën naa dal ku nekk.
02 - Treatment Introduction.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ang Clubfoot ay usa medikal nga kondisyon nga mahitabo sa usa sa kada otso-syentos nga mga bata. Walay  dapat basulon kung naay clubfoot ang bata. Mahitabo kini kang bisan kinsa.

02 - Treatment Introduction.Name: 02 - Treatment Introduction
02 - Treatment Introduction.EN: Almost all children that complete the Ponseti plaster casting method grow up walking normally, with no pain. It is the best treatment for your baby!
02 - Treatment Introduction.FRA: Presque tous les enfants qui complètent la méthode de moulage en plâtre de Ponseti grandissent normalement, sans douleur. C'est le meilleur traitement pour votre bébé!
02 - Treatment Introduction.ES: Casi todos los niños que completan el tratamiento con el Método Ponseti caminan normalmente al crecer, sin dolor ¡Es el mejor tratamiento para tu bebé!
02 - Treatment Introduction.MLG: Ny ankabeazan'ny zaza nahavita tanteraka ny fanaovana platra, dia mitombo ara-dalana sy mandeha tsara, tsy manaintaina. Io no fitsaboana mahomby indrindra ho an'ny zanakao
02 - Treatment Introduction.MYA: Ponseti ပတ်တီးစည်းပြီးသွားတဲ့ ကလေးအားလုံးနီးပါးက အသက်ကြီးလာရင် နာကျင်မှုမရှိဘဲ ပုံမှန်လမ်းလျှောက်နိုင်ပါတယ်။ ဒါက သင့်ကလေးအတွက် အကောင်းဆုံး ကုသမှုဖြစ်ပါတယ်။
02 - Treatment Introduction.KHM: កុមារស្ទើរតែទាំងអស់ដែលទទួលការព្យាបាលចប់សព្វគ្រប់តាមរយៈការពត់តំរង់និងការរុំប្លាតតាមបច្ចេកទេសប៉ុងសេទី អាចដើរបានធម្មតានៅពេលគេធំឡើងដោយមិនមានការឈឺចាប់ឡើយ។ វាគឺជាវីធីសាស្ត្រព្យាបាលដ៏ល្អបំផុតសម្រាប់កូនលោកអ្នក!
02 - Treatment Introduction.NEP: प्राय: सबै पोन्सेटी प्लाष्टर विधि पूरा गरेका बालबालिकाहरु बिना कष्ट साधारण रुपमा हिंडेरै हुर्किन्छन् । यो तपाईको सन्तानका लागी उत्कृष्ट उपचार हो ।
02 - Treatment Introduction.SW: Karibia watoto wote ambao wanakamilisha mbinu ya plasta ya Ponseti hukua wakitembea kawaida, bila maumivu. Ni matibabu bora kwa mtoto wako!
02 - Treatment Introduction.TGL: Halos lahat ng batang nakakompleto ng Ponseti plaster casting method ay lumalaking nakalalakad ng normal at walang nararamdamang sakit. Ito ang pinakamainam na paggamot para sa inyong sanggol!
02 - Treatment Introduction.WOL: Daanaka xale yi topp ni mu ware pajum palaatar bi tukee ci Ponseti dinañu màgg ci yoon te du am mettit. Moo gën ci paj yi ngir seen liir.
02 - Treatment Introduction.PHI: Halos tanang mga bata nga nakakompleto sa Ponseti plaster casting method kay midakong makalakaw ug normal nga walay sakit. Kini ang pinakamaayong proseso sa pagpa-ayo sa inyong anak!

02 - Treatment Introduction.Name: 02 - Treatment Introduction
02 - Treatment Introduction.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. You are not alone in the clubfoot treatment process. Reach out to other parents at the clinic or to your doctor for support!
02 - Treatment Introduction.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Vous n'êtes pas seul dans le processus de traitement du pied bot. Communiquez avec d'autres parents à la clinique ou avec votre médecin pour obtenir des informations et de l'aide!
02 - Treatment Introduction.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. No estás solo en el proceso de tratamiento del pie equinovaro. Ponte en contacto con otros padres en la clínnica o directamente con tu doctor.
02 - Treatment Introduction.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Tsy irery ianao mandritra ny fitsaboana ny mivadi-tongotra. Mifandraisa amin'nireo raiamandreny hafa ao amin'ny toeram-pitsaboana na ny dokoteranao mba hahazoana fanampiana !
02 - Treatment Introduction.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ ခြေထောက်ခွင်တဲ့ရောဂါ ကုသနေရတာ သင်တစ်ယောက်တည်း မဟုတ်ပါဘူး။ အကူအညီလိုအပ်ရင် ဆေးခန်းက တခြားမိဘတွေကိုဖြစ်စေ၊ သင့်ဆရာဝန်ကိုဖြစ်စေ ဆက်သွယ်လိုက်ပါ။
02 - Treatment Introduction.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ លោកអ្នកមិនមែនជាមនុស្សតែម្នាក់ដែលមកទទួលការព្យាបាលជើងខ្វេរនោះទេ។ សូមនិយាយទៅកាន់ឳពុកម្តាយផ្សេងទៀតនៅគ្លីនិក ឬនិយាយទៅកាន់វេជ្ជបណ្ឌិតដើម្បីទទួលបានការគាំទ្រ!
02 - Treatment Introduction.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । तपाई क्लबफुट उपचार प्रकृयामा एक्लो हुनुहुन्न । सहायताका लागी क्लिनिकमा आउने अन्य अभिभावकहरु तथा डाक्टर सम्म आफ्नो पहुँच बढाउनुहोस् ।
02 - Treatment Introduction.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Hauko peke yako katika utaratibu wa matibabu ya miguu kifundo. Zungumza na wazazi wengine kwenye kliniki au daktari wako kwa msaada!
02 - Treatment Introduction.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Hindi ka nag-iisa sa prosesong ito ng paggamot ng clubfoot. Kayo'y aming hinihikayat na makipag-ugnayan sa iba pang mga magulang  o sa inyong doktor para sa suporta!
02 - Treatment Introduction.WOL: Salaam maalikum , {case.guardian1_first_name}.Du yeen doŋŋ a di yëngu ci yoonu pajum laagog tànk.Deeleen waxtaan ak yeneen way-jur yi ca kilinig ba walla ak seen  doktoor ngir am ay xabaar ak ndimmal. .
02 - Treatment Introduction.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Dili ka mag-inusara sa proseso sa pagpatambal sa clubfoot. Pangutana sa ubang mga ginikanan sa klinik o sa imohang doktor para sa suporta!

03 - Casting Introduction.Name: 03 - Casting Introduction
03 - Casting Introduction.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Serial plaster casting is the first phase of clubfoot treatment. Most babies need 5-7 casts to correct their feet, but every child is different.
03 - Casting Introduction.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. La série de moule en plâtre est la première phase du traitement du pied bot. La plupart des bébés ont besoin de 5 à 7 plâtres pour corriger leurs pieds, mais chaque enfant est différent.
03 - Casting Introduction.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. La colocación en serie de escayolas es la primera fase del tratamiento para pie equino varo. La mayoria de bebés requieren 5-7 yesos, pero cada nino es diferente.
03 - Casting Introduction.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Ny fanaovana platra no dingana voalohany amin'ny fitsaboana ny mivadi-tongotra. Ny ankamaroan'ny zaza dia mila atao platra in-5 hatramin'ny im-7 mba hamerenana amin'ny laoniny ny tongony. Tsy mitovy avokoa anefa ny zaza rehetra
03 - Casting Introduction.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ ပတ်တီးတစ်ခုပြီးတစ်ခုစည်းတာက ခြေထောက်ခွင်တဲ့ရောဂါ ကုသမှု ပထမအဆင့် ဖြစ်ပါတယ်။ ကလေးတွေ တစ်ယောက်နဲ့ တစ်ယောက် မတူညီပေမယ့် ကလေးအများစုဟာ ခြေထောက်ပုံမှန်ဖြစ်အောင် ပတ်တီး ၅-၇ ကြိမ် စည်းဖို့ လိုပါတယ်။
03 - Casting Introduction.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ ការព្យាបាលដោយរុំប្លាតគឺជាដំណាក់កាលទីមួយនៃការព្យាបាលជើងខ្វេរ។ ទារកភាគច្រើនត្រូវការរុំប្លាតពី៥-៧ដងដើម្បីកែតម្រង់ជើងរបស់ពួកគេ ប៉ុន្តែកុមារម្នាក់ៗមានលក្ខណៈខុសៗគ្នា។
03 - Casting Introduction.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । क्लबफुट उपचारका लागी सिरियल प्लाष्टर विधि पहिलो चरण हो । धेरै जसो बच्चाहरुको पैतला मिलाउन ५-७ ओटा प्लाष्टर आवश्यक पर्दछ, तर सबै बच्चाहरु भिन्न हुन्छन् ।
03 - Casting Introduction.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Kufunga plasta moja baada ya nyingine ni awamu ya kwanza ya matibabu ya miguu kifundo. Idadi kubwa ya watoto wanahitaji plasta 5-7 ili kurekebisha miguu yao, lakini kila mtoto ni tofauti.
03 - Casting Introduction.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ang serial plaster casting ang unang yugto sa paggamot ng clubfoot. Kadalasang ang mga sanggol ay mangangailangan ng 5-7 casts upang maiwasto ang kanilang mga paa, subalit iba-iba pa rin ang bawat bata.
03 - Casting Introduction.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Tabax yi ñuy tabax tànk bi ak palaatar moo jiitu ci pajum laagog tànk.Li ëpp ci xale yi  dinañu leen tabaxal seen tànk 5 ba 7 yoon ngir jubbanti seen tànk wànte xale yi dañoo wuute.
03 - Casting Introduction.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ang Serial plaster casting kay ang pinaka-unang proseso sa pagpa-ayo sa clubfoot. Halos tanang mga bata nanginahanglan ug lima hangtud pito ka casts para matarong ang ilang mga tiil, pero lahi-lahi ang kada bata.

03 - Casting Introduction.Name: 03 - Casting Introduction
03 - Casting Introduction.EN: The casting phase of treatment will last around 3 months.
03 - Casting Introduction.FRA: La phase de moulage pour le traitement durera environ 3 mois.
03 - Casting Introduction.ES: La colocación de yesos en tu bebé durara alrededor de 3 meses.
03 - Casting Introduction.MLG: Ny fanolosoloana platra amin'ny fitsaboana dia mety haharitra 3 volana eo ho eo
03 - Casting Introduction.MYA: ကုသမှုမှာ ပတ်တီးစည်းတဲ့ကာလက ၃ လခန့်ကြာပါတယ်။
03 - Casting Introduction.KHM: ដំណាក់កាលនៃការព្យាបាលដោយការរុំប្លាត មានរយៈពេលប្រហែល៣ខែ។
03 - Casting Introduction.NEP: उपचारको क्रममा प्लाष्टर लगाउने चरण करिब ३ महिनासम्म लम्बिन सक्छ ।
03 - Casting Introduction.SW: Awamu ya plasta katika matibabu itaendelea kwa miezi mitatu
03 - Casting Introduction.TGL: Ang casting ay tinatayang aabot ng mga 3 buwan.
03 - Casting Introduction.WOL: Tabakhyi dinañ amm diirou niétti wér thi tankou khalébi.
03 - Casting Introduction.PHI: Ang casting phase sa pagpa-ayo kay mu-abot ug hangtud tulo ka bulan.

03 - Casting Introduction.Name: 03 - Casting Introduction
03 - Casting Introduction.EN: The position of the foot will move a little after each plaster cast. After the last cast the foot will look and move normally.
03 - Casting Introduction.FRA: La position du pied bouge un peu après chaque plâtre. Après le dernier moulage, le pied aura l'air bien en place et bougera normalement.
03 - Casting Introduction.ES: La posición del pie cambiará poco a poco luego de cada yeso. Después del último yeso, el pie se verá y se moverá normalmente.
03 - Casting Introduction.MLG: Ny fipetraky ny tongotra ao anaty platra dia mihatsara isaky ny manao platra vaovao. Aorian'ny fanaovana platra farany, dia afaka mihetsika tsy misy olana ny tongotra.
03 - Casting Introduction.MYA: ပတ်တီးတစ်ကြိမ် စည်းပြီးတိုင်း ခြေထောက်အနေအထား အနည်းငယ် ပြောင်းလဲသွားပါလိမ့်မယ်။ နောက်ဆုံးအကြိမ် ပတ်တီးစည်းပြီးရင် ခြေထောက်က ပုံမှန်အတိုင်း လှုပ်ရှားနိုင်မှာပါ။
03 - Casting Introduction.KHM: ស្ថានភាពជើងនឹងរំកិលបន្តិចក្រោយពីរុំប្លាតម្តងៗ។ បន្ទាប់ពីការរុំប្លាតលើកចុងក្រោយ ប្រអប់ជើងនឹងមានរូបរាងធម្មតាហើយអាចធ្វើចលនាបានជាធម្មតា។
03 - Casting Introduction.NEP: प्रत्येक प्लाष्टर पश्चात् पैतलाको स्थिति थोरै चल्न थाल्छ । अन्तिम प्लाष्टर पछी पैतला साधारण जस्तै देखिन्छ तथा चल्न थाल्छन् ।
03 - Casting Introduction.SW: Msimamo wa mguu utasonga kidogo baada ya kila plasta. Baada ya plasta ya mwisho mguu utakaa na kusonga kwa kawaida.
03 - Casting Introduction.TGL: Unti-unting magbabago ang posisyon ng paa pagkatapos ng bawat isang plaster cast. At pagkatapos ng huling cast, magiging normal na ang hitsura at paggalaw ng paa.
03 - Casting Introduction.WOL: Saa yu nu tabaxee ba noppi, tànk bi dana randu tuuti. Bu ñu amalee tabaxu mujjantal bi, tànk bi dina mel ni jaar na  yoon te mu ngi yëngu ni mu ware;
03 - Casting Introduction.PHI: Ang posisyon sa tiil kay hinay-hinay nga mulihok kada plaster cast. Pagkahuman sa kina-ulahiang cast, ang tiil kay matarong ug makalihok ug normal.

04 - Casting Campaign.Name: 04 - Casting Campaign
04 - Casting Campaign.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Make sure that new plaster casts are dry before allowing {case.patient_first_name} to play so pressure from standing or crawling does not affect their shape.
04 - Casting Campaign.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Assurez-vous que les nouveaux plâtres soient secs avant de laisser {case.patient_first_name} jouer de façon à ce que la pression exercée par le fait de rester debout ou de ramper n'affecte pas leur forme.
04 - Casting Campaign.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Asegúrate de que los nuevos yesos estén secos antes de dejar que {case.patient_first_name} juegue para que el estrés de estar de pie o de gatear no afecte su forma.
04 - Casting Campaign.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Andraso ho maina tsara ny platra vao avela hilalao i {case.patient_first_name} mba tsy hanimba ny platra vokatry ny fijoroana na ny fandadizana.
04 - Casting Campaign.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ ပတ်တီးအသစ် စည်းထားတာတွေ ခြောက်သွေ့သွားမှသာ {case.patient_first_name} ကို ဆော့ကစားခွင့် ပေးပါ။ ဒါမှသာ မတ်တပ်ရပ်တာ၊ လေးဘက်ထောက်တာတွေကနေ သူတို့ခြေထောက်ပုံစံကို ဖိအားမဖြစ်မှာပါ။
04 - Casting Campaign.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ ត្រូវប្រាកដថា ប្លាតដែលរុំថ្មីស្ងួតល្អសិន មុនពេលដាក់ {case.patient_first_name} ឲ្យ​លេង ដើម្បីកុំឲ្យសម្ពាធសង្កត់ដោយសារទម្ងន់ឈរ ឬការលូនធ្វើឲ្យខូចខាតដល់រូបរាងរបស់ប្លាត។
04 - Casting Campaign.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । {case.patient_first_name} लाई खेल्न दिनु भन्दा पहिले नयाँ प्लाष्टर सुक्खा छन् भनी निश्चय गर्नुहोस्  ताकी उठ्दा वा बामे सर्दाको चापले त्यसको आकारमा असर नगरोस् ।
04 - Casting Campaign.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Hakikisha ya kwamba plasta mpya imekauka kabla ya kuruhusu {case.patient_first_name} kucheza ili shinikizo kutokana na kusimama au kutambaa haiathiri muundo wake.
04 - Casting Campaign.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Tiyaking tuyo na ang bagong plaster casts bago hayaang maglaro si {case.patient_first_name} upang hindi maapektuhan ng presyon mula sa pagtayo o paggapang ang hugis nito.
04 - Casting Campaign.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Na leen wóor ni palaatar yi bees yi wow nañu laata ngeen di bàyyi {case.patient_first_name} muy foyi balaaa taxawaay bi walla raam bi di indi benn gàllankoor ci xér bi.
04 - Casting Campaign.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Siguraduha nga ang bag-ong plaster casts kay uga na bag-o nimu hatagag permiso nga paduwaon si {case.patient_first_name} para ang kabug-aton sa pagtindog o pagkamang dili maka-apekto sa porma sa tiil.

04 - Casting Campaign.Name: 04 - Casting Campaign
04 - Casting Campaign.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. It is normal for children to be fussy after getting a new plaster cast. {case.patient_first_name} will feel better in a few days.
04 - Casting Campaign.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Il est normal que les enfants ne soient pas très en forme après avoir reçu un nouveau plâtre. {case.patient_first_name} se sentira mieux après quelques jours.
04 - Casting Campaign.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Es normal que los niños estén inquietos después de recibir un yeso nuevo. {case.patient_first_name} se sentirá mejor en unos días.
04 - Casting Campaign.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Ara-dalana raha kirikiriana ny zaza aorian'ny fanaovana platra voalohany. Ho zatra ihany i {case.patient_first_name} afaka andro vitsivitsy.
04 - Casting Campaign.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ ပတ်တီးအသစ်တစ်ခု စည်းပြီးရင် ကလေးတွေ မငြိမ်မသက် ဖြစ်တတ်တာပုံမှန်ပါပဲ။ {case.patient_first_name} က ရက်အနည်းငယ်အတွင်း အဆင်ပြေသွားပါလိမ့်မယ်။
04 - Casting Campaign.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ ជាធម្មតា កុមាររាងមួរម៉ៅបន្តិច ក្រោយពីការរុំប្លាតថ្មី។ {case.patient_first_name} នឹងមានអារម្មណ៍ល្អវិញក្នុងអំឡុង២ទៅ៣ថ្ងៃក្រោយ។
04 - Casting Campaign.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । नयाँ प्लाष्टर लगाएपछी बालबालिकाहरुले पिरोल्नु स्वाभाविक हो । {case.patient_first_name} ले केही दिन पछी सहज महसुस गर्नुहुनेछ ।
04 - Casting Campaign.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ni kawaida kwa watoto kutotulia baada ya kupata plasta mpya. {case.patient_first_name} atahisi vizuri baada ya siku chache.
04 - Casting Campaign.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Normal sa mga batang mairita kapag bago ang plaster cast. Huwag mag-alala sapagkat pagkalipas ng ilang araw ay bubuti rin naman ang pakiramdam ni {case.patient_first_name}.
04 - Casting Campaign.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Jaadu na xale yi tàyyeel bu ñu leen di  soog a defal palaatar bu bees.. {case.patient_first_name} dina sawaraat ci fan yu néew.
04 - Casting Campaign.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Normal ra para sa mga bata nga maghilak-hilak paghuman mabutangan ug bag-ong plaster cast. Mama-ayo ang paminaw ni {case.patient_first_name} paghuman sa pipila ka adlaw.

04 - Casting Campaign.Name: 04 - Casting Campaign
04 - Casting Campaign.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. It is important to keep the plaster cast clean and dry. Do not put soap, powder or lotion inside of the cast.
04 - Casting Campaign.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Il est important de garder le plâtre propre et sec. Ne mettez pas de savon, de poudre ou de lotion à l'intérieur du plâtre.
04 - Casting Campaign.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Es importante mantener el yeso limpio y seco. No lo laves con jabón ni pongas perfume dentro del yeso.
04 - Casting Campaign.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Zava-dehibe ny fitandremena ny platra mba hadio sy ho maina lalandava. Aza asiana savony na vovotsavony na ranontsavony  ao anaty platra.
04 - Casting Campaign.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ ပတ်တီးကို သန့်ရှင်းခြောက်သွေ့အောင် ထားဖို့ အရေးကြီးပါတယ်။ ပတ်တီးထဲကို ဆပ်ပြာ၊ ပေါင်ဒါ၊ လိမ်းဆေးတွေ မထည့်ပါနဲ့။
04 - Casting Campaign.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ វាជាប្រការសំខាន់ដែលត្រូវថែទាំប្លាតឲ្យបានស្អាត និងស្ងួតល្អ។ មិនត្រូវដាក់សាប៊ូ ម្ស៉ៅ ឬឡេចូលទៅខាងក្នុងប្លាតឡើយ។
04 - Casting Campaign.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । प्लाष्टर सुख्खा र सफा राख्न महत्वपूर्ण हुन्छ । प्लाष्टर भित्र साबुन, पाउडर वा लोसन नहल्नुहोला ।
04 - Casting Campaign.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ni muhimu kuweka plasta ikiwa safi na kavu. Usiweke sabuni, poda au lotion ndani ya plasta.
04 - Casting Campaign.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Mahalagang panatilihing malinis at tuyo ang plaster cast. Huwag lagyan ng sabon, pulbos, o losyon ang loob ng cast.
04 - Casting Campaign.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}.Bu ñuy denc palaatar bi dafa war a set boole kook wow.Buleen def saabu walla pëndêx walla luy nirook lajkoloñ  ci biir palaatar bi.
04 - Casting Campaign.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Importante nga permi limpyo ug uga ang ang plaster. Ayaw ug gamit ug sabon, pulbos o lotion sa sulod sa cast.

04 - Casting Campaign.Name: 04 - Casting Campaign
04 - Casting Campaign.EN: Do not remove {case.patient_first_name}'s cast before you come to the clinic. This will prevent the foot from turning inward again.
04 - Casting Campaign.FRA: Ne retirez pas le plâtre de {case.patient_first_name} avant de venir à la clinique. Ceci empêchera le pied de se retourner vers l'intérieur.
04 - Casting Campaign.ES: No quites el yeso de {case.patient_first_name} sin antes de ir a la clínica. Esto evitará que el pie vuelva a girar hacia adentro.
04 - Casting Campaign.MLG: Aza esorina ny platran'i {case.patient_first_name} mialoha ny handehananao any amin'ny toeram-pitsaboana. Io manko no miaro ny tongotra tsy hivadika indray.
04 - Casting Campaign.MYA: ဆေးခန်းမလာခင်{case.patient_first_name} ရဲ့ပတ်တီးကို မဖယ်ပစ်ပါနဲ့။ ဖယ်လိုက်ရင် ခြေထောက်ပြန်ခွင်သွားနိုင်ပါတယ်။
04 - Casting Campaign.KHM: សូមកុំដោះប្លាតចេញពី {case.patient_first_name} មុនពេលលោកអ្នកមកដល់គ្លីនិក។ ធ្វើបែបនេះដើម្បីការពារប្រអប់ជើង មិនឲ្យងាកទៅក្នុងវិញ។
04 - Casting Campaign.NEP: क्लिनिकमा आउनु भन्दा पहिले {case.patient_first_name} को प्लाष्टर ननिकाल्नुहोला । यसले पैतलालाई भित्र तिर फर्कनबाट रोक्छ ।
04 - Casting Campaign.SW: Usitoe plasta ya {case.patient_first_name} kabla ya kuja kliniki. Hii itauzuia mguu kutopinda ndani tena.
04 - Casting Campaign.TGL: Huwag tanggalin ang cast ni {case.patient_first_name} bago kayo magpunta sa klinika. Ito ay upang mapigilan ang muling pagbalik ng paa sa papaloob na posisyon.
04 - Casting Campaign.WOL: Buleen dindi palaataru  {case.patient_first_name} laata ngeen di ñëw  ci kilinig bi. Loolooy tax ba tànk bi du dellu ci biir..
04 - Casting Campaign.PHI: Ayaw kuhaa ang cast ni {case.patient_first_name} bag-o mo muadto sa klinika. Ang cast kay nagpugong sa tiil para dili mubalik ug pasulod.

04 - Casting Campaign.Name: 04 - Casting Campaign
04 - Casting Campaign.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name} skin irritation is common when children wear a plaster cast. Talk to your doctor or call the clinic for advice if {case.patient_first_name}'s skin is irritated.
04 - Casting Campaign.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name} l'irritation de la peau est fréquente lorsque les enfants portent un plâtre. Parlez-en à votre médecin ou appelez la clinique pour obtenir des conseils si {case.patient_first_fname} a la peau irritée.
04 - Casting Campaign.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}, la irritación de la piel es común cuando los niños usan yesos. Habla con tu médico o llama a la clínica para pedir consejos si la piel de {case.patient_first_name} se ha irritado.
04 - Casting Campaign.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name}. indraindray dia mangidihidy ny hoditry ny zaza rehefa manao platra. Mifandraisa amin'ny dokoteranao na antsoy ny toeram-pitsaboana mba hahazoana torohevitra raha misy tsiranoka na maratra kely ny hoditra mangidihidy
04 - Casting Campaign.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name} ကလေးတွေက ပတ်တီး စည်းထားတဲ့အခါ အနေအထိုင်ခက်တာ ဖြစ်တတ်ပါတယ်။ {case.patient_first_name} ရဲ့ အရေပြားက အနေအထိုင်ခက်နေရင် သင့်ဆရာဝန်နဲ့ ဆွေးနွေးပါ ဒါမှမဟုတ် ဆေးခန်းကိုဖုန်းဆက်အကြံဉာဏ်တောင်းပါ။
04 - Casting Campaign.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name} ការរមាស់នៅលើស្បែកជារឿងធម្មតាពេលកុមារមានរុំប្លាត។ សូមសាកសួរទៅកាន់វេជ្ជបណ្ឌិតរបស់អ្នក ឬទូរស័ព្ទស្នើសុំយោបល់ពីគ្លីនិក បើ {case.patient_first_name} មានបញ្ហារមាស់លើស្បែក។
04 - Casting Campaign.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । प्लाष्टर लगाएको दौरान छाला चिलाउनु स्वाभाविक हो । यदी {case.patient_first_name} को छाला चिलाएको छ भने, तपाईको डाक्टरसंग सल्लाह गर्नुहोस् वा क्लिनिकमा फोन गरी सुझाव लिनुहोस् ।
04 - Casting Campaign.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name} matatizo ya ngozi ni kawaida wakati watoto wamevalishwa plasta. Ongea na daktari wako au pigia kliniki kwa ushauri ikiwa ngozi ya {case.patient_first_name} inakerwa.
04 - Casting Campaign.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Karaniwan ang iritasyon sa balat kapag may plaster cast ang mga bata. Makipag-usap sa inyong doktor o tawagan ang klinika para sa karagdagang payo sakaling mairita ang balat ni {case.patient_first_name}.
04 - Casting Campaign.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name} Suñu defalee xale yi palaatar seen deru yaram dafay faral di jam.Yëgalleen ko seen doktoor walla kilinig ba ngir am ay dénkaane su deru {case.patient_first_fname} dee jam.
04 - Casting Campaign.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}, ang iritasyon sa panit kay komon ra na kung ang mga bata naay plaster cast. Istoryahi ang imong doktor o sa tawag sa klinika para matambagan ka kung ang panit ni {case.patient_first_name} kay nagka-iritasyon.

04 - Casting Campaign.Name: 04 - Casting Campaign
04 - Casting Campaign.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Remember to change {case.patient_first_name}'s diaper regularly so that no wetness from the diaper gets on the plaster cast.
04 - Casting Campaign.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. N'oubliez pas de changer régulièrement la couche de {case.patient_first_fname} afin d'éviter que l'humidité de la couche ne pénètre dans le plâtre.
04 - Casting Campaign.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Recuerda cambiar regularmente el pañal de {case.patient_first_name} para que no se moje el yeso.
04 - Casting Campaign.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Aza hadinoina ny manolo ny lamban'i {case.patient_first_name} isaky ny mando izy mba tsy hisy hamandoana avy any amin'ny taty mikoriana any amin'ny platra
04 - Casting Campaign.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ {case.patient_first_name} ရဲ့ အနှီးကို အချိန်မှန်မှန်လဲပေးဖို့ မမေ့ပါနဲ့။ ဒါမှသာ စိုနေတဲ့အနှီးကြောင့် ပတ်တီးပါ မစိုအောင် ကာကွယ်ပေးမှာပါ။

04 - Casting Campaign.Name: 04 - Casting Campaign

04 - Casting Campaign.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Kailangan ng karamihan ng bata ng isang simple at mabilis na procedure na tinatawag na tenotomy upang mapahaba ang litid sa likod ng sakong.

04 - Casting Campaign.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ ជាការល្អណាស់ដែលទាំងពីរនាក់ឳពុកនិងម្តាយ មកជាមួយតាមការណាត់ជួបរបស់ {case.patient_first_name} នៅគ្លីនិកជើងខ្វេរ នៅពេលដែលពួកគាត់អាចធ្វើបាន ដើម្បីគាំទ្រដល់ការព្យាបាលរបស់ {case.pronoun_his_her}!
04 - Casting Campaign.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । {case.patient_first_name} को उपचारमा सहयोग पुग्ने भएकाले उहाँका दुबै अभिभावकहरु क्लबफुट क्लिनिकमा भेटका बेला आउनु लाभदायी हुनेछ ।
04 - Casting Campaign.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ni muhimu kwa wazazi wote wawili kuja kwenye miadi ya {case.patient_first_name} katika kliniki ya miguu kifundo wakati wanaweza ili kumuunga mkono katika matibabu!
04 - Casting Campaign.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}.Makatutulong sa parehong magulang kung hanggang maaari ay magkasama silang pupunta sa appointment ni {case.patient_first_name} sa klinika upang suportahan ang kaniyang gamutan!
04 - Casting Campaign.WOL: Salaam maalikum , {case.guardian1_first_name}. Amal na njariñ ñaari way-jur yi ñuy teewe wisitu {case.patient_first_name}  ca kilinig ba  ngir dooleel  {case.pronoun_his_her} diirub lu muy faju.
04 - Casting Campaign.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Makatabang sa duha ka ginikanan nga muanhi sila sa mga du-aw bahin sa clubfoot ni {case.patient_first_name} sa klinika para makasuporta sa pagpa-ayo sa bata.

04 - Casting Campaign.Name: 04 - Casting Campaign
04 - Casting Campaign.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. After the last plaster cast, {case.patient_first_name} will wear a brace to prevent the foot from turning inward. At first {case.pronoun_he_she} will wear it for 23 hours a day.
04 - Casting Campaign.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Après le dernier plâtre, {case.patient_first_name} portera un appareil orthopédique pour empêcher le pied de se retourner vers l'intérieur. Dans un premier temps {case.proun_he_she} le portera pendant 23 heures par jour.
04 - Casting Campaign.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Después del ultimo yeso, {case.patient_first_name} usará una ferula para evitar que el pie rote hacia adentro. Al principio, {case.patient_first_name} deberá usarla durante 23 horas al día.
04 - Casting Campaign.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} aorian'ny fametahana ny platra farany, {case.patient_first_name} dia omena kiraro voatokana mba iarovana tongony tsy hivadika indray. Amin'ny voalohany, {case.patient_first_name} dia hitondra izany 23 ora isanandro.
04 - Casting Campaign.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ နောက်ဆုံးပတ်တီး စည်းပြီးတဲ့အခါ {case.patient_first_name} က ခြေထောက်ပြန်ခွင်မသွားအောင် ခြေပတ် (brace) ဝတ်ထားရပါမယ်။ အစပိုင်းမှာ {case.pronoun_he_she} က အဲဒါကို တစ်ရက်လျှင် ၂၃ နာရီပတ်ထားရပါမယ်။
04 - Casting Campaign.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ ក្រោយពីការរុំប្លាតលើកចុងក្រោយ {case.patient_first_name} នឹងត្រូវពាក់រណបការពារជើងមិនឲ្យវិលទៅរកសភាពដើមវិញ។ ដំបូង {case.pronoun_he_she} ត្រូវពាក់វារយៈពេល២៣ម៉ោងក្នុងមួយថ្ងៃ។
04 - Casting Campaign.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । अन्तिम प्लाष्टर गरे पछी {case.patient_first_name} ले खुट्टा भित्रतिर फर्कने रोक्नका लागी उहाँले सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  लगाउनुपर्ने हुन्छ । पहिला उहाँले सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  दिनको २३ घण्टाका लागी लगाउनुपर्नेछ ।
04 - Casting Campaign.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Baada ya plasta ya mwisho, {case.patient_first_name} atavaa brace ili kuzuia mguu usipinde ndani. Mara ya kwanza atavaa kwa masaa 23 kwa siku.
04 - Casting Campaign.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Pagkatapos ng huling plaster cast, magsusuot si {case.patient_first_name} ng brace upang maiwasan ang pagbalik ng clubfoot. Sa unang 3 buwan, ang brace ay kailangang ipasuot sa kanya sa loob ng 23 oras kada araw.
04 - Casting Campaign.WOL: Salaam maalikum , {case.guardian1_first_name}. Gannaaw palaatar bu mujj bi  {case.patient_first_name} dina sol àppaare bu tànk buy tax ba tànk bi du walbatiku jëm ci biir.Ci njalbéen gi {case.proun_he_she} dina amee àppaare bi 23 waxtu bés bu nekk.
04 - Casting Campaign.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Paghuman sa pinaka-ulahing plaster cast, si {case.patient_first_name} kay magsuot ug brace para magpugngan ang pagsulod ug balik sa tiil. Sa permiro, kailangan niya nga suoton ang brace sa sulod sa 23 ka oras kada adlaw.

04 - Casting Campaign.Name: 04 - Casting Campaign
04 - Casting Campaign.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. The plaster casting phase is almost over! Next {case.patient_first_name} will wear a brace to prevent the foot from turning inward again.
04 - Casting Campaign.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. La phase de moulage du plâtre est presque terminée ! Ensuite {case.patient_first_name} portera un appareil orthopédique pour empêcher le pied de se retourner vers l'intérieur.
04 - Casting Campaign.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. ¡La fase de los yesos ya casi termina! Luego, {case.patient_first_name} deberá usar una ferula para evitar que el pie rote hacia adentro nuevamente.
04 - Casting Campaign.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} efa ho vita ireo dingana fametahana platra! Ny tohiny dia fanaovana kiraro manokana mba hiarovana ny tongotr'i {case.patient_first_name} tsy hivadika indray.
04 - Casting Campaign.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ ပတ်တီးစည်းတဲ့အ ဆင့်က ပြီးဆုံးပါတော့မယ်။ ပြီးတဲ့အခါ {case.patient_first_name} က ခြေထောက်ပြန်ခွင်မသွားအောင် ခြေပတ် (brace)ဝတ်ထားရပါမယ်။
04 - Casting Campaign.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ ការរុំប្លាតជិតដល់ពេលបញ្ចប់ហើយ! បន្ទាប់មកទៀត {case.patient_first_name} ត្រូវពាក់រណបដើម្បីការពារប្រអប់ជើងមិនឲ្យវាត្រឡប់ទៅរកសភាពដើមវិញ។
04 - Casting Campaign.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । प्लाष्टर लगाउने अवधि समाप्त हुन लागेको छ । यस पश्चात् {case.patient_first_name} ले खुट्टा भित्रतिर फर्कन रोक्नका लागी उहाँले सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  लगाउनुपर्ने हुन्छ ।
04 - Casting Campaign.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Awamu ya plast iko karibu kuisha! Hatua inayofuata, {case.patient_first_name} atavaa brace ili kuzuia mguu usipinde tena.
04 - Casting Campaign.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Malapit ng matapos ang casting! Pagkatapos nito, magsusuot na si {case.patient_first_name} ng brace upang hindi bumalik ang clubfoot.
04 - Casting Campaign.WOL: Salaam maalikum , {case.guardian1_first_name}.Njëfandikoom palaatar bi jeex na daanaka ! Bu loolu weesoo, {case.patient_first_name} dina sol àppaare bu tànk buy tax ba tànk bi du walbatiku jëm ci biir.
04 - Casting Campaign.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ang plaster casting phase kay hapit na mahuman! Sunod nga suoton ni {case.patient_first_name} kay ang brace para dili mubalik ug pasulod ang tiil.

05 - Tenotomy.Name: 05 - Tenotomy
05 - Tenotomy.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Congratulations on {case.patient_first_name} completing a tenotomy! Now {case.patient_first_name} will wear a plaster cast for 3 weeks to make sure that it heals correctly.
05 - Tenotomy.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Félicitations pour {case.patient_first_name} qui a réussi sa ténotomie ! Maintenant {case.patient_first_name} portera un plâtre pendant 3 semaines pour s'assurer une correcte guérison!
05 - Tenotomy.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. ¡Felicitaciones a {case.patient_first_name} por completar una tenotomía! Ahora {case.patient_first_name} usará un yeso durante 3 semanas para que su pie cure correctamente.
05 - Tenotomy.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name}) Arahabaina {case.patient_first_name} nahavita ny dingana fanamboarana voditongotra. Ankehitriny, {case.patient_first_name} dia hitondra platra farany mandritra ny 3 herinandro mba hahazoana antoka ny fahasitranany tanteraka.
05 - Tenotomy.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ အရွတ်ခွဲစိတ်မှု ပြီးသွားတာကြောင့် {case.patient_first_name} အတွက် ဂုဏ်ယူပါတယ်။ အခုဆိုရင် {case.patient_first_name} က သေသေချာချာ အနာကျက်စေဖို့အတွက် ၃ ပတ်ကြာအောင် ပတ်တီး စည်းထားရပါမယ်။
05 - Tenotomy.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ សូមអបអរសាទរដល់ {case.patient_first_name} សម្រាប់ការចោះសសៃកែងបានដោយជោគជ័យ! ពេលនេះ {case.patient_first_name} នឹងត្រូវរុំប្លាតសំរាប់រយៈពេល៣សប្តាហ៍ដើម្បីឲ្យសសៃកែងនោះបានជាសះស្បើយត្រឹមត្រូវ។
05 - Tenotomy.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । {case.patient_first_name} को टेनोटोमी पूरा गर्नुभएकोमा बधाई छ ! अब पूरा निको बनाउनका लागी {case.patient_first_name} ले ३ हप्ता सम्म प्लाष्टर राख्नुपर्नेछ ।
05 - Tenotomy.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Hongera {case.patient_first_name} kwa kukamilisha tenotomy! Sasa {case.patient_first_name} atavaa plasta kwa wiki 3 ili kuhakikisha kwamba anapona kwa usahihi.
05 - Tenotomy.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Pagbati kay {case.patient_first_name} sa pagkompleto ng tenotomy! Ngayon, siya ay kailangang naka-plaster cast sa loob ng 3 linggo upang matiyak ang kanyang patuloy na paggaling.
05 - Tenotomy.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Jarajëf {case.patient_first_name} Jubbantib siis gi jaar na yoon. ! Léegi nag, {case.patient_first_name} dina sol àppaare bu tànk ci diiru 3 ayubés ngir mën a wér ba fàww.
05 - Tenotomy.PHI: Hi (Pangalan). Congratulations sa paghuman sa tenotomy ni {case.patient_first_name}! Karon, kinahanglang suoton ni {case.patient_first_name} ang plaster cast sa tulo ka semana para masigurado nga maayo ug tarong.

06 - Bracing Introduction.Name: 06 - Bracing Introduction
06 - Bracing Introduction.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Plaster casting has corrected {case.patient_first_name}'s clubfoot, but the foot can easily move back down and inward. This is called relapsing.
06 - Bracing Introduction.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Le moulage en plâtre a corrigé le pied bot de {case.patient_first_fname}, mais le pied peut facilement se retourner et se déplacer vers l'intérieur. C'est ce qu'on appelle une rechute.
06 - Bracing Introduction.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. El yeso ha corregido el pie equinovaro de {case.patient_first_name}, pero el pie puede moverse fácilmente hacia abajo y hacia adentro. A esto se le llama recaída.
06 - Bracing Introduction.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Ny platra dia namerina @ laoniny ny tongotr'i {case.patient_first_name} saingy mety hiverina mivadika indray ireo. Izany no atao hoe fiverenan'ny voditongotra mivadika
06 - Bracing Introduction.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ ပတ်တီးစည်းတာက {case.patient_first_name} ရဲ့ ခြေထောက်ခွင်တဲ့ရောဂါကို ပြုပြင်ပေးလိုက်ပေမယ့် ခြေထောက်က အတွင်းဘက်ကို အလွယ်တကူ ပြန်ကျသွားနိုင်ပါတယ်။ ဒါကို ရောဂါ ပြန်ဖြစ်တာလို့ ခေါ်ပါတယ်။
06 - Bracing Introduction.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ ការរុំប្លាត បានកែតំរង់ជើងខ្វេររបស់ {case.patient_first_name} រួចហើយ តែប្រអប់ជើងនៅតែអាចសំយ៉ុងចុះនិងងាកចូលក្នុងវិញបានយ៉ាងងាយ។ ករណីនេះ យើងហៅថា ការលាប់ឡើងវិញ។
06 - Bracing Introduction.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । प्लाष्टरले {case.patient_first_name} को क्लबफुटलाई सुधारेको छ तर पैतला सजिलै  पुन: तल र भित्रतिर फर्कन सक्छ । यसलाई रिल्याप्स भएको भनिन्छ ।
06 - Bracing Introduction.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Plasta imerekebisha miguu kifundo ya {case.patient_first_name}, lakini mguu unaweza kurudia kupinda nyuma na ndani. Hii inaitwa relapsing.
06 - Bracing Introduction.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Naiwasto na ng plaster casting ang paa ni {case.patient_first_name}, subalit madaling bumalik ang clubfoot. Ito ay tinatawag na relapsing.
06 - Bracing Introduction.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}.Palaatar bi ñu tabaxe tànk bi jubbanti na tànk bi  {case.patient_first_fname},wànte  tànk bi mën naa  walbatikuwaat jëm ci biir. Loolu lañuy tudde daanuwaat.
06 - Bracing Introduction.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ang plaster casting kay nakatarong sa clubfoot ni {case.patient_first_name} pero ang tiil kay dali ra gihapong mubalik paubos ug pasulod. Kini mao ang ginatawag nga relapsing.

06 - Bracing Introduction.Name: 06 - Bracing Introduction
06 - Bracing Introduction.EN: It is important that {case.patient_first_name} wears the brace, because it stops the foot from relapsing!
06 - Bracing Introduction.FRA: Il est important que {case.patient_first_name} porte lun appareil orthopédique, car il empêche le pied de rechuter !
06 - Bracing Introduction.ES: ¡Es importante que {case.patient_first_name} use la ferula, para evitar que el pie se vuelva a deformar!
06 - Bracing Introduction.MLG: Tena zava-dehibe ny hitondran'i {case.patient_first_name} kiraro manokana amin'ny tongony satria izany no hiaro ny tongotra tsy hivadika indray.
06 - Bracing Introduction.MYA: ရောဂါပြန်မဖြစ်စေဖို့အတွက် {case.patient_first_name} က ဖိနပ် (brace)ဝတ်ထားဖို့ အရေးကြီးပါတယ်။
06 - Bracing Introduction.KHM: ជាការសំខាន់ណាស់ដែល {case.patient_first_name} ត្រូវពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណប ដើម្បីការពារកុំឲ្យមានការលាប់ឡើងវិញ!
06 - Bracing Introduction.NEP: {case.patient_first_name} ले सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  लगाई     राख्नु महत्वपूर्ण छ किनभने, यसले खुट्टालाई रिल्याप्स हुनबाट रोक्छ ।
06 - Bracing Introduction.SW: Ni muhimu kwamba {case.patient_first_name} anavaa brace, kwa sababu kinazuia mguu usipinde tena!
06 - Bracing Introduction.TGL: Mahalagang isuot ni {case.patient_first_name} ang brace, dahil mapipigilan nito ang pag-relapse ng paa!
06 - Bracing Introduction.WOL: Dina am solo lool {case.patient_first_name} sol àppaare bu tànk . Loolooy tee jàngoro ji dellusiwaat.
06 - Bracing Introduction.PHI: Importante nga magsuot ug brace si {case.patient_first_name} kay kini magpugong sa mga tiil sa pag-relapse!

06 - Bracing Introduction.Name: 06 - Bracing Introduction
06 - Bracing Introduction.EN: If a child does not wear the brace as told by the doctor, the foot will almost always relapse and will need casting again.
06 - Bracing Introduction.FRA: Si l'enfant ne porte pas l'attelle comme le médecin l'a dit, le pied rechutera presque toujours et devra de nouveau être remoulé.
06 - Bracing Introduction.ES: Si no se usa la ferula como lo indicó el médico, el pie casi siempre recaerá y será necesario volver a poner yesos.
06 - Bracing Introduction.MLG: Raha tsy manao ny kiraro araka ny torohevitry ny dokotera ny zaza dia hivadika indray ny tongony ary mila averina indray ireo andiana platra.
06 - Bracing Introduction.MYA: ကလေးငယ်ဟာ ဆရာဝန်ပြောသလို ဖိနပ် (brace) မဝတ်ဘူးဆိုရင် ခြေထောက်က အမြဲတမ်းနီးပါ ရောဂါပြန်ဖြစ်ပြီး ပတ်တီးပြန်စည်းဖို့ လိုပါလိမ့်မယ်။
06 - Bracing Introduction.KHM: បើកុមារមិនពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបតាមការណែនាំរបស់វេជ្ជបណ្ឌិតទេ ជានិច្ចកាល ប្រអប់ជើងនិងវិលត្រឡប់ទៅរកភាពដើមវិញ ហើយត្រូវរុំប្លាតសារជាថ្មីម្តងទៀត។
06 - Bracing Introduction.NEP: डाक्टरले भने बमोजिम बच्चाले सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  नलायको खण्डमा पैतला झण्डै सधैंका लागी रिल्याप्स हुन सक्छ र पुन: प्लाष्टर गर्नुपर्ने हुन्छ ।
06 - Bracing Introduction.SW: Iwapo mtoto havai brace kulingana na maagizo ya daktari, mguu unaweza kupinda tena na utahitaji plasta tena.
06 - Bracing Introduction.TGL: Kung hindi isinusuot ng bata ang brace tulad ng payo ng doktor, malaki ang posibilidad na mag-relapse ang paa at muling kakailanganin ang casting.
06 - Bracing Introduction.WOL: Su xale bi solul àppaare ni ko doktoor bi waxe fàww tànk bi yënguwaat te su boobaa danu koy tabaxaat.
06 - Bracing Introduction.PHI: Kung ang bata dili mag-suot ug brace sama sa mando sa doktor, ang tiil kay dako kaayong tsansa nga mag-relapse ug manginahanglang napud mobalik ug casting.

07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.Name: 07 - Bracing All Day Campaign
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. You can expect {case.patient_first_name} to be a bit unhappy for the first days wearing the brace. This is not because {case.pronoun_he_she} is in pain, it is because the brace is different than what {case.pronoun_he_she} is used to.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Vous pouvez vous attendre à ce que {case.patient_first_fname} soit un peu malheureux pendant les premiers jours avec l'attelle. Ce n'est pas parce que {case.pronoun_he_she} souffre, c'est parce que l'attelle est différente de ce à quoi {case.pronoun_he_she} est habitué.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Puede que {case.patient_first_name} no esté contento los primeros días usando la ferula. Esto no se debe a que sienta dolor, sino porque la barra es diferente a lo que acostumbra.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Mety tsy ho faly i {case.patient_first_name} amin'ny andro voalohany hanaovany ilay kiraro. Tsy hoe mijaly izy akory fa tsy mitovy amin'ny mahazatra azy ilay izy.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ {case.patient_first_name} က ဖိနပ် (brace)ဝတ်ထားတဲ့ ပထမဆုံးရက်တွေမှာ သိပ်မပျော်ရွှင်တာ တွေ့နိုင်ပါတယ်။ ဒါက {case.pronoun_he_she} နာကျင်လို့မဟုတ်ပါဘူး။ {case.pronoun_he_she} နေသားမကျသေးလို့ ဖြစ်ပါတယ်။
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ អ្នកអាចរំពឹងទុកថា {case.patient_first_name} នឹងមិនសូវសប្បាយចិត្តទេនៅពេលគេពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបនៅថ្ងៃដំបូង។ វាមិនមែនបណ្តាលមកពី {case.pronoun_he_she} មានការឈឺចាប់ទេ តែវាបណ្តាលមកពីស្បែកជើងរណបខុសពីអ្វីដែល {case.pronoun_he_she} ធ្លាប់ជួបពីមុនមក។
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  लगाउन सुरु गरेको केही दिन सम्म {case.patient_first_name} लाई अलि असहज हुन सक्छ । यो उहाँलाई दुखेको कारणले होईन कि, उहाँलाई सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज) मा बानी नपरेको हुनाले हो ।
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Unaweza kutarajia {case.patient_first_name} kutokuwa na furaha kwa siku za kwanza za kuvaa brace. Si kwa sababu ana maumivu ila ni kwa sababu kuvaa brace ni tofauti na alivyozoea.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Asahan ninyong hindi gaanong magiging masaya si {case.patient_first_name} sa mga unang araw ng pagsuot ng brace. Subalit tandaan na ito at hindi naman dahil sa masasaktan siya, kundi dahil maninibago lamang siya.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Jàppal ni {case.patient_first_fname} mën naa bañ a bég ci fan yu jëkk yi mu sol àppaare bi.Du caageenag  {case.pronoun_he_she} dafa ame mettit wànte àppaare bi dafa wuute ak li  {case.pronoun_he_she} tàmm..
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Makadamha ka nga dili malipayon si {case.patient_first_name} sa mga permirong mga adlaw sa pagsuot sa brace. Dili ni kay gibati siya ug kasakit pero kay ang brace lahi ra gayud siya sa na-andan ni {case.patient_first_name}.

07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.Name: 07 - Bracing All Day Campaign
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.EN: Make sure that {case.patient_first_name} wears the brace 23 hours per day, except when bathing. Soon {case.pronoun_he_she} will be used to it!
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.FRA: Assurez-vous que {case.patient_first_name} porte l'attelle 23 heures par jour, sauf lors du bain. Bientôt {case.proun_he_she} y sera habitué(e)!
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.ES: Asegúrate de que {case.patient_first_name} use la barra por 23 horas al día, excepto al bañarse. ¡Pronto se acostumbrará!
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MLG: Ataovy izay ahazoana antoka fa {case.patient_first_name} dia mitondra ny kiraro manokana 23 ora isan'andro hafa tsy rehefa mandro, Tsy ho ela akory izy dia ho zatra izany !
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MYA: {case.patient_first_name} က ခြေပတ် (brace)ကို ရေချိုးတဲ့အချိန်ကလွဲလို့ တစ်ရက်လျှင် ၂၃ နာရီပတ်ထားရပါမယ်။ မကြာခင်မှာ {case.pronoun_he_she} အကျင့်ရသွားပါလိမ့်မယ်။
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.KHM: សូមប្រាកដថា {case.patient_first_name} ស្បែកជើងរណប២៣ម៉ោងក្នុងមួយថ្ងៃ លើកលែងតែពេលមុជទឹក។ មិនយូរទេ {case.pronoun_he_she} នឹងមានទម្លាប់ជាមួយវាហើយ!
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.NEP: पक्का गर्नुहोस् कि, {case.patient_first_name} ले नुहाउने समय बाहेक सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  दिनको २३ घण्टा सम्म बाँधिराखोस् । चाँडै नै उहाँ यसमा अभ्यस्त हुनुहुनेछ !
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.SW: Hakikisha kwamba {case.patient_first_name} anavaa brace masaa 23 kwa siku, isipokuwa wakati wa kuoga. Hivi karibuni atazoea!
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.TGL: Tiyaking suot ni {case.patient_first_name} ang brace sa loob ng 23 oras bawat araw, maliban kung maliligo. Hindi magtatagal at ito'y kanya ring makakasanayan!
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.WOL: Fexeleen ba {case.patient_first_name }sol àppare bi  23 waxtu  bés bu nekk, ba mu des saa yuy sangu.. Du yàgg lool {case.proun_he_she} tàmm ko!
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.PHI: Siguraduha nga si {case.patient_first_name} magsuot sa iyang brace 23 ka oras kada adlaw, gawas sa ig kaligo sa iya. Kadugayan si {case.patient_first_name} maanad na!

07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.Name: 07 - Bracing All Day Campaign
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. It is important that {case.patient_first_name}'s shoe is on correctly. Look through the hole on the side of the shoe to make sure {case.pronoun_his_her} foot is completely down.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Il est important que la chaussure de {case.patient_first_name} soit en place correctement. Regardez à travers le trou sur le côté de la chaussure pour vous assurer que son pied soit complètement au fond.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Es importante que el zapato de {case.patient_first_name} esté correctamente puesto. Mira a través del orificio en el costado del zapato para asegurarte de que su pie esté completamente dentro.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name}Tena zava-dehibe ny fametahana tsara ny kiraron'i {case.patient_first_name} araka ny tokony ho izy, Tsiriho eo amin'ilay lavaka kely eo amin'ny sisin'ny kiraro mba hahitanao raha mipetraka tsara ny tongony.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ {case.patient_first_name} ရဲ့ ဖိနပ် (brace) မှန်မှန်ကန်ကန် ဝတ်ထားဖို့ အရေးကြီးပါတယ်။ {case.pronoun_his_her} ခြေထောက်က လုံးဝ အောက်ကျရဲ့လားဆိုတာကို ဖိနပ်ဘေးနားက အပေါက်ကနေ ကြည့်ပါ။
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ វាជារឿងសំខាន់ ដែលត្រូវបំពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបឲ្យ {case.patient_first_name} ឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ។ សូមមើលតាមរន្ធចំហៀងស្បែកជើងរបស់ {case.pronoun_his_her} ដើម្បីឲ្យច្បាស់ថា ប្រអប់ជើងរបស់គាត់ ធ្លាក់ស្មើចុះក្រោមទាំងស្រុង។
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । {case.patient_first_name} ले जुत्ता(सहायेक् उपकरन) राम्रो संग लगाउन जरुरी छ । उहाँको पैतला पूरै तल छ कि छैन भनी जुत्ताको छेउमा रहेको प्वालबाट हेर्नुहोस् ।
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ni muhimu kwamba {case.patient_first_name} amevaa kiatu kwa usahihi. Angalia kupitia tundu upande wa kiatu ili kuhakikisha kuwa mguu umegusa chini kabisa.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Mahalagang wasto ang pagkakasuot ng sapatos ni {case.patient_first_name}. Silipin ang butas sa gilid ng sapatos upang matiyak na nakalapat ang kanyang mga paa.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}.Dàllu {case.patient_first_name} war naa nekk bu baax palaasam.Xoolal ci bën-bën bi nekk ci wetu dàll wi ngir mu wóor la ni tànk bi tegu na bu baax. .
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Importante nga ang sapatos ni {case.patient_first_name} kay natarong ug pagsuot. Tan-awa ang buslot sa kilid sa sapatos para makasiguro ka nga tiil niya makatukod gyud sa lapalapa.

07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.Name: 07 - Bracing All Day Campaign
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.EN: If the foot is not completely down in the shoe, the foot can relapse and {case.pronoun_he_she} may need another tenotomy!
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.FRA: Si le pied n'est pas complètement descendu dans la chaussure, le pied peut rechuter et {case.proun_he_she} peut nécessiter une autre ténotomie !
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.ES: Si el pie no está completamente dentro del zapato, el pie puede torcerse nuevamente y puede ser que {case.patient_first_name} necesite otra tenotomía.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MLG: Raha tsy tafiditra tsara ao anaty kiraro ilay tongotra dia mety hiverina hivadika indray. Mety hiverina hiharana fanamboarana voditongotra indray izy!
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MYA: ခြေထောက်က လုံးဝအောက်မကျဘူးဆိုရင် ခြေထောက်က ရောဂါပြန်ဖြစ်နိုင်ပြီး {case.pronoun_he_she} ကို နောက်ထပ်အရွတ်ခွဲစိတ်မှု လိုအပ်နိုင်ပါတယ်။
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.KHM: បើប្រអប់ជើងមិនធ្លាក់ស្មើចុះក្រោមទាំងស្រុងនោះទេ ប្រអប់ជើងអាចត្រឡប់ទៅរកភាពដើមវិញ ហើយ {case.pronoun_he_she} អាចត្រូវធ្វើការចោះសរសៃកែងម្តងទៀត!
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.NEP: यदी पैतला जुत्तामा पूरै तल छैन भने, पैतला रिल्याप्स हुन सक्छ र उहाँलाई अर्को टेनोटोमीको(शल्यक्रिया)  आवश्यकता पर्न सक्छ !
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.SW: Ikiwa mguu haujagusa chini ya kiatu, mguu unaweza kupinda tena na anaweza kuhitaji tenotomy ingine!
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.TGL: Kung hindi nakalapat ang paa sa sapatos, maaaring mag-relapse ang paa at maaaring muling kailanganin niya ng isa pang tenotomy!
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.WOL: Su tànk bi wàccul bu baax ci biir dàll wi, tànk bi mën naa yëngutuwaat te su boobaa {case.proun_he_she} mën naa soxlawaat ñu jubbantiwaat  siis gi.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.PHI: Kung ang tiil dili kompletong nakatukod sa lapalapa sa sapatos, ang tiil kay mo-relapse ug si {case.patient_first_name} kay posibleng manginahanglan napud ug tenotomy!

07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.Name: 07 - Bracing All Day Campaign
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. {case.patient_first_name} should be able to crawl while wearing the brace. You may need to practice these movements with {case.pronoun_him_her} as {case.pronoun_he_she} gets used to the brace.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. {case.patient_first_name} devrait pouvoir ramper en portant l'attelle. Vous devrez peut-être faire ces mouvements avec {case.pronoun_him_her} pour qu' {case.pronoun_he_she} s'habitue à l'attelle.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. {case.patient_first_name} debe poder gatear mientras usa la barra. Es posible que debas practicar estos movimientos con {case.pronoun_him_her}, mientras se acostumbra a la barra.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MLG: Salama {case.guardian1_first_name} , Afaka mandady ihany i {case.patient_first_name} na dia misy ilay kiraro manokana, Azonao atao ny manazatra azy ireo fihetsika ireo mandrapahazatra azy    mitondra kiraro manokana.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ {case.patient_first_name} ဟာ ဖိနပ် (brace)ဝတ်ထားရင်းနဲ့ လေးဘက်ထောက် သွားလို့ရပါတယ်။ {case.pronoun_him_her} က ဖိနပ် (brace)နဲ့ အကျင့်ရသွားတဲ့အခါ {case.pronoun_he_she} နဲ့အတူ အဲဒီလှုပ်ရှားမှုကို သင်လေ့ကျင့်ပေးဖို့ လိုအပ်နိုင်ပါတယ်။
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ {case.patient_first_name} អាចវារបានពេលពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណប។ អ្នកអាចជួយដល់ {case.pronoun_him_her}ឲ្យអនុវត្តនូវចលនាទាំងនេះ នៅពេលដែល {case.pronoun_he_she} មានទម្លាប់ជាមួយនឹងពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណប។
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । {case.patient_first_name} ले सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)को  कारणले बामे सर्नमा कुनै बाधा गर्दैन।  {case.patient_first_name} बामे सरेको नसरेको ख्याल राख्नुहोस्। उहाँले सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  लगाउन बानी हुनेबेलामा तपाईले उहाँसंग यी चालहरुको अभ्यास गर्नु पर्न पनि हुन   सक्छ ।
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. {case.patient_first_name} anapaswa kuwa na uwezo wa kutambaa akiwa amevaa brace. Huenda ukatakiwa kumfanyisha mazoezi anapoendelea kuzoea brace.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Dapat ay nakagagapang si {case.patient_first_name} habang suot ang brace. Kailangan siyang sanayin sa mga galaw na ito habang nasasanay siya sa pagsuot ng kaniyang brace.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. {case.patient_first_name} war naa mên a raam boole ci sol àppaare bi. Dangeen a war a gunge ci loolu  {case.pronoun_him_her} ngir  {case.pronoun_he_she} mën a tàmm àppaare bi.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Si {case.patient_first_name} kay pwede ra gihapon makakamang bisan nagsuot siya sa iyang brace. Manginahanglan nga mag-praktis aning mga lihoka para ma-anad siya sa brace.

07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.Name: 07 - Bracing All Day Campaign
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. During the first 3 months with the brace, {case.patient_first_name} will need to wear it for 23 hours per day.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Pendant les 3 premiers mois avec l'attelle, {case.patient_first_name} devra la porter pendant 23 heures par jour.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Durante los primeros 3 meses con la ferula, {case.patient_first_name} deberá usarlo durante 23 horas al día.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Mandritra ny telovolana voalohany itondrana ny kiraro manokana, {case.patient_first_name} dia tokony hitondra izany 23 ora isan'andro,
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ ဖိနပ် (brace)ဝတ်ထားတဲ့ ပထမဆုံး ၃ လအတွင်းမှာ {case.patient_first_name} က အဲဒါကို တစ်ရက်လျှင် ၂၃ နာရီပတ်ထားဖို့ လိုပါတယ်။
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ ក្នុងរយៈពេលពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណប៣ខែដំបូង {case.patient_first_name} ត្រូវតែពាក់ឲ្យជាប់២៣ម៉ោងក្នុងមួយថ្ងៃ។
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज) पहिलो ३ महिना सम्म {case.patient_first_name} ले यो दिनको २३ घण्टा सम्म लगाउनु पर्ने हुन्छ ।
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Katika miezi mitatu ya kwanza ya kuvaa brace, {case.patient_first_name} atahitaji kuvaa kwa masaa 23 kwa siku.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Sa unang 3 buwan ng brace, kakailanganin ni {case.patient_first_name} na isuot ito nang 23 oras bawat araw.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ci 3 weer yu jëkk yi muy sol àppaare bi, {case.patient_first_name} war na koo sol 23 waxtu ci bés bu nekk.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Sa sulod sa tulo ka bulan nga nagsuot sa brace, si {case.patient_first_name} kay nanginahanglan nga isuot ni niya 23 ka oras kada adlaw.

07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.Name: 07 - Bracing All Day Campaign
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.EN: After the first 3 months, {case.pronoun_he_she} will only need to wear it at nights and during naps.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.FRA: Après les 3 premiers mois, {case.proun_he_she} n'aura besoin de la porter que la nuit et pendant les siestes.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.ES: Después de los primeros 3 meses, {case.pronoun_he_she} deberá usarlo solo por las noches y durante las siestas.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MLG: Aorian'ny telovolana voalohany, izy dia tsy mila mitondra izany intsony afa tsy ny alina na rehefa matory makamaka aina amin'ny antoandro,
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MYA: ၃ လပြည့်သွားရင် {case.pronoun_he_she} က အဲဒါကို ညဘက်နဲ့ နေ့ခင်း ခဏအိပ်ချိန်တွေမှာပဲ ဝတ်ဖို့လိုပါလိမ့်မယ်။
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.KHM: បន្ទាប់ពីរយៈពេល៣ខែដំបូង {case.pronoun_he_she} ត្រូវពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបតែពេលយប់ និងពេលគេងថ្ងៃតែប៉ុណ្ណោះ។​
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.NEP: पहिलो ३ महिना पश्चात् उहाँले सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  राती र सुतेको बेला मात्र लगाउनु पर्छ ।
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.SW: Baada ya miezi mitatu ya kwanza, {case.pronoun_he_she} atahitajika kuvaa usiku na anapolala mchana.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.TGL: Pagkatapos ng unang 3 buwan, kakailanganin lang ni {case.pronoun_he_she} na isuot ito sa gabi at kapag natutulog.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.WOL: Bu 3 weer yu jëkk yi weesoo, {case.proun_he_she} dootu ko soxla lu dul guddi ak buy nelaw bêccëg.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.PHI: Pagkahuman sa tulo ka bulan, pwede na nga suoton ni {case.patient_first_name} ang brace sa gabii nalang ug inig katulog niya sa hapon.

07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.Name: 07 - Bracing All Day Campaign
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Remember to always use the brace, even if {case.patient_first_name} cries. It keeps {case.pronoun_his_her} feet in the correct position.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. N'oubliez pas de toujours utiliser l'attelle, même si {case.patient_first_name} pleure. Cela maintient ses pieds dans la bonne position.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Recuerda usar siempre la barra, incluso si {case.patient_first_name} llora. Este mantiene sus pies en la posición correcta.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MLG: Salama, {case.guardian1_first_name} Aza hadinoina mihitsy ny manao ny kiraro manokana  na dia mitomany aza i {case.patient_first_name}. Mitazona ny tongony ho amin'ny tokony ho izy izany,
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ {case.patient_first_name} ငိုနေရင်တောင်မှ ဖိနပ် (brace)ကို အမြဲဝတ်ထားပေးဖို့ သတိရပါ။  အဲဒါက {case.pronoun_him_her} ခြေထောက်ကို ပုံမှန်အနေအထား ရရှိစေပါတယ်။
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ សូមចាំថា ត្រូវតែពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណប សូម្បីតែពេល {case.patient_first_name} យំក៏ដោយ។ វាធ្វើឲ្យប្រអប់ជើងរបស់ {case.pronoun_him_her} ស្ថិតនៅក្នុងស្ថានភាពត្រង់ត្រឹមត្រូវ។
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । {case.patient_first_name} रोएता पनि सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  लगाई    दिने गर्नुहोस् । यसले उहाँको पैतला सही अवस्थामा राख्दछ ।
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Kumbuka kumvalisha brace kila wakati, hata kama {case.patient_first_name} analia. Kinamsaidia kuweka mguu panapo stahili.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Huwag kalimutang laging gamitin ang brace, kahit na umiyak si {case.patient_first_name}. Pananatilihin nitong tama ang posisyon ng kaniyang paa.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}.Buleen fàttee jëfandikoo àppaare bi donte sax {case.patient_first_name} dafay jooy. Loolooy tax tànk yi taxaw bu baax.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Hinumdumi nga kailangan kanunay nga isul-ob ang brace, bisan pa ug maghilak si {case.patient_first_name}. Makatabang kini sa pag-anad ug para sa mga tiil niya nga matarong ug posisyon.

07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.Name: 07 - Bracing All Day Campaign
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.EN: Wearing the brace like the doctor explained will help {case.patient_first_name} get used to it and prevent relapsing.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.FRA: Le port de l'attelle comme l'a expliqué le médecin aidera {case.patient_first_name} à s'y habituer et à prévenir les rechutes.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.ES: Usar la ferula según lo indicado por el médico le ayudará a {case.patient_first_name} a acostumbrarse y evitar recaídas.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MLG: Ny fampiasana ny kiraro manokana araka ny toromariky ny dokotera dia manampy an'i {case.patient_first_name} ho zatra ny fampiasana izany sy hiala amin'ny fiverenan'ny fivadian'ilay tongotra indray,
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MYA: ဆရာဝန် ရှင်းပြထားသလို ဖိနပ် (brace)ဝတ်ထားတဲ့အခါ {case.patient_first_name} က အဲဒါကို အကျင့်ရသွားပြီး ရောဂါပြန်မဖြစ်အောင် ကာကွယ်ပါတယ်။
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.KHM: ពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបតាមការពន្យល់របស់គ្រូពេទ្យ នឹងជួយដល់ {case.patient_first_name} ឲ្យស៊ាំជាមួយវា និងការពារមិនឲ្យប្រអប់ជើងត្រឡប់ទៅរកភាពដើមវិញ។
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.NEP: डाक्टरले भने बमोजिम सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  लगाउनाले {case.patient_first_name} चाँडै यसमा अभ्यस्त हुनुहुनेछ र रिल्याप्स हुनबाट जोगाउनेछ ।
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.SW: Kuvaa brace kulingana na maagizo ya daktari kutasaidia {case.patient_first_name} kuzoea na kuzuia kupinda tena.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.TGL: Agad na masasanay si {case.patient_first_name} at maiiwasan ang relapsing kapag suot niya ang brace alinsunod sa ipinaliwanag ng doktor.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.WOL: Sol àppaare bi ni ko doktoor bi diglee mooy dimbali {case.patient_first_name} ngir mu tàmm ko ba du daanuwaat feebar.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.PHI: Ang pagsuot sa brace uyon sa tambag sa doktor kay makatabang sa pagka-anad ni {case.patient_first_name} ug para dili siya mag-relapse.

07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.Name: 07 - Bracing All Day Campaign
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Always check your child's skin when you take off {case.pronoun_his_her} shoes.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Vérifiez toujours la peau de votre enfant lorsque vous enlevez ses chaussures.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Siempre revisa la piel de tu hijo cuando se quite los zapatos.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} hamarino hatrany raha tsy maninona ny hoditry ny tongotry ny zanakao isaky ny manala ilay kirarony ianao
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ သင့်ကလေးကို ဖိနပ် (brace)ချွတ်ပေးတဲ့အခါ {case.pronoun_his_her} ရဲ့ အရေပြားကို အမြဲကြည့်ပါ။
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ សូមពិនិត្យមើលស្បែករបស់កូនលោកអ្នករាល់ពេលដែលអ្នកដោះស្បែកជើងរបស់ {case.pronoun_his_her} ចេញ។
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । {case.patient_first_name} को जुत्ता खोल्दा उहाँको छाला सधैं निरिक्षण गर्नुहोस् ।
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Angalia ngozi ya mtoto wako kila mara unapomtoa viatu.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Siguraduhing tignan ang balat ng inyong anak sa tuwing tatanggalin ninyo ang kaniyang sapatos.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Deeleen nemmeeku seen deru doom saa yu ngeen koy dindil dàll yi.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Tan-awa pirmi ang panit sa imong anak kung panahon nga imong hubuon ang iyang sapatos.

07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.Name: 07 - Bracing All Day Campaign
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.EN: Swelling on the top of the foot is common and harmless, but if you see dark spots, contact your doctor.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.FRA: L'enflure sur le dessus du pied est fréquente et inoffensive, mais si vous voyez des taches brunes, contactez votre médecin.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.ES: Las inflamaciones en la parte superior del pie son comunes e inofensivas, pero si ves manchas oscuras, consulta a tu médico.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MLG: Ny fivontosana eo amin'ny tampon-tongotra dia mateti-pitranga ary tsy mampanahy akory, fa raha mahita tasy maintimainty ianao amin'izany dia mifandraisa amin'ny dokoteranao
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MYA: ခြေထောက်အပေါ်ဘက်မှာ ရောင်နေတာက အဖြစ်များတတ်ပြီး အန္တရာယ် မရှိပါဘူး။ ဒါပေမယ့် အမဲရောင်အစက်တွေမြင်ရင်တော့ ဆရာဝန်ကို ဆက်သွယ်ပါ။
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.KHM: អាការៈហើមលើខ្នងជើងកើតមានជាធម្មតា និងមិនមានគ្រោះថ្នាក់អ្វីទេ ប៉ុន្តែបើអ្នកឃើញមានស្នាមខ្មៅៗ សូមទំនាក់ទំនងទៅវេជ្ជបណ្ឌិតរបស់អ្នក។
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.NEP: पैतलाको टुप्पो तिर सुन्निनु सामान्य र हानीरहित हुन्छ, तर यदी तपाईले गाढा टाटाहरु देख्नुभयो भने, डाक्टरलाई सम्पर्क गर्नुहोस् ।
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.SW: Uvimbe sehemu ya juu ya mguu ni kawaida na haudhuru lakini ukiona madoa meusi, wasiliana na daktari wako
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.TGL: Karaniwan lamang at di-mapaminsala ang pamamaga ng itaas na bahagi ng paa, subalit kapag kayo ay nakakita ng maiitim na marka, mangyaring tawagan ang inyong doktor upang ipaalam ito.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.WOL: Bari na lu ñuy gis gamb  ci kow tànk bi waaye amul solo. Soo ci gisee nag ay gàkk-gàkk  yu ñuul,demal seeti doktoor.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.PHI: Ang paghubag sa tumoy sa tiil kay kasagaran ra na ug dili peligro, pero kung makakita kag mga lagum-lagum, tawaga dayun imong doktor.

07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.Name: 07 - Bracing All Day Campaign
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name} it's crucial that {case.patient_first_name} wears the brace as directed. Nearly all babies who stop wearing the brace as directed are at risk of relapsing.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name} il est crucial que {case.patient_first_name} porte l'attelle comme indiqué. Presque tous les bébés qui cessent de porter l'attelle risquent de rechuter.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name} es crucial que {case.patient_first_name} use la ferula como se indica. Casi todos los bebés que dejan de usar el aparato ortopédico según las indicaciones dadas corren el riesgo de recaer.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MLG: Salama! {case.guardian1_first_name} Tena ilaina ny hitondran'i {case.patient_first_name} ny kiraro manokana araka ny toromatrika. Ny tongotry ny ankamaroan'ny zaza tsy manao ilay kiraro araka ny tokony ho izy dia mety hiverina mivadika.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name} {case.patient_first_name} က ညွှန်ကြားထားတဲ့အတိုင်း ဖိနပ် (brace)ဝတ်ထားဖို့ အရမ်းအရေးကြီးပါတယ်။ ညွှန်ကြားထားတဲ့အတိုင်း ဖိနပ် (brace) ဆက်မဝတ်တော့တဲ့ ကလေးအားလုံးနီးပါးက ရောဂါပြန်ဖြစ်နိုင်ခြေ ရှိပါတယ်။
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name} វាសំខាន់ណាស់ដែល {case.patient_first_name} ត្រូវពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបតាមការណែនាំ។ កុមារស្ទើរតែទាំងអស់ដែលបញ្ឈប់មិនបន្តការពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបតាមការណែនាំ តែងតែមានហានិភ័យក្នុងការលាប់ឡើងវិញ។
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । निर्देशन बमोजिम {case.patient_first_name} ले सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  लगाउनु अति महत्वपूर्ण हुन्छ । निर्देशन बमोजिम सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  नलगाउने प्राय: सबै बच्चाहरुमा रिल्याप्स हुने सम्भावना रहेको हुन्छ ।
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name} ni muhimu kwamba {case.patient_first_name} anavaa brace kulingana na maagizo. Karibu watoto wote wanaoacha kuvaa brace kinyume na maagizo huwa katika hatari ya kupinda tena.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Mahalagang suot ni {case.patient_first_name} ang brace tulad ng isinasaad na paraan ng pagsuot nito. Halos lahat ng sanggol na huminto sa pagsuot nito taliwas sa payo ng doktor ay maaaring mag-relapse.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.WOL: Salaam maalikum {case.guardian1_first_name} ,Dina war lool {case.patient_first_name} sol àppaare bi ni ñu ko ko waxe.. Daanaka liir yi bàyyee sol àppaare yépp dañuy daanuwaat ci  feebar bi.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Importante gyud kaayo nga suoton ni {case.patient_first_name} ang mga braces sama sa kung unsay ingon sa doktor. Halos tanang mga bata nga ninghunong ug suot sa brace sama sa ingon sa doktor kay risgo kini sa relapsing.

07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.Name: 07 - Bracing All Day Campaign
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Thank you for your hard work for {case.patient_first_name}'s treatment, and for making sure that {case.pronoun_he_she} always wears the brace.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Merci pour votre travail au quotidien pour le traitement de {case.patient_first_name} et pour vous être assuré qu' {case.pronoun_he_she} porte toujours son attelle.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Gracias por tu arduo trabajo en el tratamiento de {case.patient_first_name}, y por asegurarte de que {case.pronoun_he_she} siempre use la ferula.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Misaotra anao noho ny ezaka amin'ny fikarakarana ny fitsaboana an'i {case.patient_first_name} sy ny nanaovanao izay ahazoana antoka fa mipetraka tsara araka ny tokony ho izy ny kiraro manokana,
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ {case.patient_first_name} ရဲ့ ကုသမှုအတွက် ကြိုးစားပေးတဲ့အတွက်ရော {case.pronoun_he_she} ကို ဖိနပ် (brace) အမြဲဝတ်ခိုင်းတဲ့အတွက်ပါ ကျေးဇူးတင်ပါတယ်။
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ សូមអរគុណសម្រាប់ការខិតខំដ៏លំបាករបស់លោកអ្នក ក្នុងការព្យាបាលដល់ {case.patient_first_name} និងក្នុងការធ្វើឲ្យប្រាកដថា {case.pronoun_he_she} តែងតែពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបជានិច្ច។
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । {case.patient_first_name} को उपचारमा तपाईको कडा मेहनतका लागी तथा उहाँले सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  सधैं लगाई     राखेको कुरा ध्यान दिनु भएकोमा तपाईलाई धन्यवाद छ ।
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Asante kwa ukakamavu wako katika matibabu ya {case.patient_first_name}, na kwa kuhakikisha kwamba anavaa brace wakati wote.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Salamat sa inyong pagsisikap para sa paggamot kay {case.patient_first_name}, at sa paninigurong lagi niyang suot ang brace.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Jarajëf ci sa liggéey bés bu nekk ci pajum  {case.patient_first_name} ak ci sa taxawaay ngir {case.pronoun_he_she} di sol àppaare bi saa su nekk.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Salamat sa inyong makanunayung pag-gam sa pagpaayo ni {case.patient_first_name}, ug sa pagsiguro nga nagsuot siya ug brace permi.

07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.Name: 07 - Bracing All Day Campaign
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.EN: Even though {case.patient_first_name} has been in the brace for months, {case.pronoun_he_she} could still relapse. Make sure {case.pronoun_he_she} keeps wearing the brace.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.FRA: Même si {case.patient_first_name} porte bien son attelle depuis des mois, {case.pronoun_he_she} pourrait encore rechuter. Assurez-vous qu' {case.proun_he_she_she} continue bien à porter l'attelle.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.ES: Aunque {case.patient_first_name} haya usado la ferula durante meses, todavía podría recaer. Asegúrate de que siga usando la ferula.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MLG: Mety hiverina mivadika indray ny tongotr'i {case.patient_first_name} na dia efa volana maro izay izy no manao ilay kiraro. Noho izany, ataovy azo antoka fa mitondra hatrany ilay kiraro izy.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MYA: {case.patient_first_name} ဟာ ဖိနပ် (brace)ကို လပေါင်းများစွာ ဝတ်ခဲ့ရင်တောင်မှ {case.pronoun_he_she} က ရောဂါပြန်ဖြစ်နိုင်ပါသေးတယ်။ {case.pronoun_he_she} ကို ဖိနပ် (brace) အမြဲဝတ်ခိုင်းထားပါ။
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.KHM: ទោះបីជា {case.patient_first_name} ពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបអស់រយៈពេលជាច្រើនខែហើយក៏ដោយ​, {case.pronoun_he_she} នៅតែអាចត្រឡប់ទៅរកភាពដើមវិញ។ សូមប្រាកដថា {case.pronoun_he_she} ពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបជាប់ជានិច្ច។
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.NEP: {case.patient_first_name} ले महिनौं सम्म सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  लगाई     राख्नुभएता पनि उहाँलाई रिल्याप्स हुन सक्छ । निश्चय गर्नुहोस् कि, उहाँले सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  लगाई    राख्नुभएको छ ।
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.SW: Ingawa {case.patient_first_name} amevaa brace kwa miezi kadhaa, anaweza kupinda tena. Hakikisha anaendelea kuvaa brace.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.TGL: Kahit na ilang buwan nang naka-brace si {case.patient_first_name}, ay maaari pa rin siyang mag-relapse. Kaya't tiyaking lagi niyang suot ang kaniyang brace.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.WOL: Su fekkee ni sax {case.patient_first_name} mu ngi sol àppaare bi diirub ay weer, {case.pronoun_he_she} mën naa daanuwaat feebar.Na leen wóor ni  {case.proun_he_she_she} mu ngi wéy bu baax di sol àppaare bi.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.PHI: Bisan pag pila ka buwan naay brace si {case.patient_first_name}, pwede gihapon siya nga mag-replase. Siguraduha gayud nga permi siya magsuot sa iyang brace.

07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.Name: 07 - Bracing All Day Campaign
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Please make sure that {case.patient_first_name}'s brace shoe is on tightly. This will not hurt {case.pronoun_him_her}, it will make sure the clubfoot is being corrected.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Veuillez vous assurer que la chaussure orthopédique de {case.patient_first_fname} est bien serrée. Cela ne lui fera pas mal, et cela assurera que le pied bot soit bien corrigé.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Por favor, asegúrate de que la férula de {case.patient_first_name} esté bien ajustada. Esto no le hará daño a {case.pronoun_him_her}, más bien le ayudará a mantener la correcion del pie equinovaro.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Azafady, ataovy izay ahazoana antoka fa ny kiraro manokana an' i {case.patient_first_name} dia migeja tsara, tsy mamparary azy izany, izay no miantoka ny fahombiazan'ny fanamboarana ny voditongotra,
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ {case.patient_first_name} ရဲ့ ဖိနပ် (brace)ကို ကျပ်နေအောင် ဝတ်ပေးထားပါ။ ဒီလိုဝတ်ပေးတဲ့အတွက် {case.pronoun_him_her} ကို မနာပါဘူး။ ခြေထောက်ခွင်နေတာ ပျောက်သွားပါလိမ့်မယ်။
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ សូមប្រាកដថាស្បែកជើងរណបរបស់ {case.patient_first_name} ពាក់ជាប់និងរឹតបានតឹងល្មមត្រឹមត្រូវ។ វានឹងមិន​ធ្វើឲ្យ {case.pronoun_him_her} ឈឺ, និងប្រាកដថាជើងខ្វេរកំពុងត្រូវបានព្យាបាលបានយ៉ាងត្រឹមត្រូវ។
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । कृपया पक्का गर्नुहोस् कि {case.patient_first_name} ले सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  जुत्ता कस्सिने गरी लगाउनुभएको छ । यसले उहाँलाई दुख्दैन, यसले क्लबफुट सुधार गर्न निश्चय गर्छ ।
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Tafadhali hakikisha kwamba kiatu cha brace cha {case.patient_first_name} kimebanwa kabisa. Hii haitakuwa na madhara kwake, itahakikisha kuwa miguu kifundo inarekebishwa.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Tiyaking mahigpit ang pagkakasuot ng brace shoe ni {case.patient_first_name}. Hindi ito makakasakit sa kaniya, titiyakin lamang nitong naitatama ang kaniyang mga paa.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Na leen wóor ni dàllu  {case.patient_first_fname} tëju na bu baax.Du metti te dina tax laagog tànk gi aw ci yoonu jubbantiku..
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Palihug pasiguro nga ang sapatos ni {case.patient_first_name} kay hugot gyud. Dili ni sakit sa iyaha. Gisiguro ni nga ang clubfoot kay natarong.

07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.Name: 07 - Bracing All Day Campaign
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Sometimes putting on the brace is easier with 2 people. One can play with {case.patient_first_name} while the other puts the feet in the brace correctly.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Parfois, il est plus facile de mettre l'attelle à deux. L'un peut jouer avec {case.patient_first_name} tandis que l'autre met correctement les pieds dans l'attelle.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. A veces es más fácil poner la ferula entre 2 personas. Uno puede jugar con {case.patient_first_name} mientras que el otro pone sus pies en la ferula correctamente.
