07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name}, Indraindray dia mora kokoa raha olona roa no mametaka ny kiraro manokana: ny iray milalao miaraka amin'i {case.patient_first_name} mandritra ny ametahan'ilay iray hafa tsara araka ny tokony ho izy ny kiraro manokana amin'ny tongony
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ ဖိနပ် (brace)ကို လူ ၂ ယောက်က ဝတ်ပေးရင် တစ်ခါတလေ ပိုလွယ်ကူပါတယ်။ တစ်ယောက်က {case.patient_first_name} နဲ့ ကစားနေတုန်းမှာ နောက်တစ်ယောက်က ဖိနပ် (brace)ကို ပုံစံတကျ ဝတ်ပေးလိုက်ပါ။
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ ពេលខ្លះ ការពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបដោយមនុស្ស២នាក់ជារឿងដែលងាយស្រួលជាង។ ម្នាក់អាចប្រលែងជាមួយ {case.patient_first_name} ខណៈពេលដែលម្នាក់ទៀតជាអ្នកពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ។
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । कहिलेकाहिं दुई जनाले सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  लगाई     दिंदा सजिलो हुन्छ । एकजनाले {case.patient_first_name} संग खेल्दै गर्दा अर्कोले पैतलामा सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  सही तरिकाले लगाई    दिंन सक्छ ।
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Wakati mwengine kuvalisha brace huwa rahisi wakifanya watu wawili. Mmoja anaweza cheza na {case.patient_first_name} iilhali mwengine anaweka miguu ndani ya brace kwa usahihi.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Kung minsan, mas madaling ilagay ang brace kung 2 tao ang gagawa nito. Maaaring makipaglaro ang isa kay {case.patient_first_name} habang isinusuot nang tama ng isa ang brace sa paa.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Léeg-léeg, su ngeen nekkee ñaar moo gën..Kenn ki mën naa fo ak  {case.patient_first_name} fekk keneen ki di ko dugalal tànk  yi.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Usahay, ang pagbutang sa brace kay mas dali kung duha ka tawo ang magbutang. Ang usa kay makigdula kang {case.patient_first_name} samtang ang usa kay nagbutang sa brace ug tarong.

07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.Name: 07 - Bracing All Day Campaign
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. During this phase of bracing, you can take off {case.patient_first_name}'s brace for 1 hour each day. Most parents use this time to bathe their children.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Pendant cette phase où l'enfant doit porter l'attelle, vous pouvez enlever l'attelle de {case.patient_first_first_name} pendant 1 heure par jour. La plupart des parents utilisent ce temps pour donner le bain à leurs enfants.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Durante esta fase, {case.patient_first_name} podrá quitarse la ferula durante 1 hora al día. La mayoría de los padres usan este tiempo para bañar a sus hijos.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Mandritra io fe-potoana fanamafisana ny kiraro manokana io dia azonao atao ny manala ny kiraro manokana an'i {case.patient_first_name}  adiny 1 isan'andro, Ny ankamaroan'ny ray aman-dreny dia manararaotra an'io fe-potoana io ampandroana ny zanany,
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ ဖိနပ် (brace)ဝတ်ရတဲ့ အဆင့်မှာ {case.patient_first_name} ရဲ့ ဖိနပ် (brace)ကို တစ်ရက် ၁ ကြိမ် ချွတ်ပေးနိုင်ပါတယ်။ မိဘအများစုကတော့ အဲဒီအချိန်မှာ ကလေးကို ရေချိုးပေးပါတယ်။
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ ក្នុងអំឡុងពេលពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបនេះ អ្នកអាចដោះស្បែកជើងរណបរបស់ {case.patient_first_name} ចេញបាន១ម៉ោងក្នុងមួយថ្ងៃ។ ឳពុកម្តាយភាគច្រើនយកពេលនេះសម្រាប់មុជទឹកឲ្យកូន។
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  लगाईदिने यो चरणमा तपाईले {case.patient_first_name} को सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  प्रत्येक दिन १ घण्टाका लागी खोली दिन सक्नुहुन्छ । धेरै अभिभावकहरुले यस समय बच्चाहरुलाई नुहाईदिन प्रयोग गर्नुहुन्छ ।
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Katika awamu ya kuvaa brace, unaweza kutoa brace ya {case.patient_first_name} kwa saa moja kila siku. Idadi kubwa ya wazazi hutumia wakati huu kuosha watoto wao.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Sa yugtong ito ng bracing, maaari ninyong tanggalin ang brace ni {case.patient_first_name} sa loob ng isang oras bawat araw. Ginagamit ng karamihang magulang ang oras na ito para paliguan ang mga anak nila.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}.Ci jamono yi xale biy sol àppaare bi, mën ngeen a dindi àppaare bu {case.patient_first_first_name} diiru waxtu bés bu nekk.Li ëpp ci way-jur yi ci waxtu woowu lañuy sang seeni gone..
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Sa sulod sa proseso sa bracing, pwede nimong hubuon ang brace ni {case.patient_first_name} sa usa ka oras kada adlaw. Halos tanang ginikanan naggamit ani nga panahon para ligoon ang bata.

07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.Name: 07 - Bracing All Day Campaign
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.EN: Make sure {case.patient_first_name}'s feet are dry before putting the brace back on.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.FRA: Assurez-vous que les pieds de {case.patient_first_fname} soient secs avant de remettre l'attelle en place.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.ES: Asegúrate de que los pies de {case.patient_first_name} estén secos antes de volver a colocar la ferula.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MLG: Ataovy izay ahazoana antoka fa maina tsara ny tongotr'i {case.patient_first_name} mialoha ny ametahana indray ny kiraro manokana
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MYA: ဖိနပ် (brace) ပြန်မပတ်ပေးခင် {case.patient_first_name} ရဲ့ခြေထောက်ဟာ ခြောက်သွေ့နေရပါမယ်။
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.KHM: ត្រូវប្រាកដថាប្រអប់ជើងរបស់ {case.patient_first_name} ស្ងួតជាមុនសិន មុនពេលពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបឲ្យ។
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.NEP: सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  बाँधिदिनु भन्दा पहिले {case.patient_first_name} को खुट्टाहरु सुक्खा छन् भनी पक्का गर्नुहोस् ।
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.SW: Hakikisha miguu ya {case.patient_first_name} imekauka kabla ya kuweka brace.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.TGL: Tiyaking tuyo ang mga paa ni {case.patient_first_name} bago ibalik ang brace.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.WOL: Na leen wóor ni tànki  {case.patient_first_fname} wow  nañu laata ngeen di dugalaat àppaare bi.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.PHI: Siguraduha nga ang mga tiil ni {case.patient_first_name} kay uga sa dili pa nimu isuot ug balik ang mga brace ug usab.

07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.Name: 07 - Bracing All Day Campaign
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. After the first three months in the brace, {case.patient_first_name} just needs to wear it for 12-14 hours a day. Always follow the instructions from your doctor.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Après les trois premiers mois avec une attelle, {case.patient_first_name} n'a plus qu'à la porter pendant 12-14 heures par jour. Suivez toujours les instructions de votre médecin.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Después de los primeros tres meses con la ferula, {case.patient_first_name} solo necesitará usarlo durante 12-14 horas al día. Siempre sigue las instrucciones de tú médico.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Aorian'ny 3 volana voalohany nametahana ny kiraro manokana dia tokony hitondra izany 12 na 14 ora isan'andro i {case.patient_first_name}. Araho hatrany ny toromariky ny dokoteranao,
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ ဖိနပ် (brace) ဝတ်ပြီး ပထမ သုံးလပြည့်ရင် {case.patient_first_name} က တစ်ရက်ကို ၁၂-၂၄ နာရီပဲ ဝတ်ဖို့ လိုပါတော့တယ်။ သင့်ရဲ့ဆရာဝန်ဆီက ညွှန်ကြားချက်ကို အမြဲလိုက်နာပါ။
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ បន្ទាប់ពីពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបរយៈពេលបីខែ, {case.patient_first_name} ត្រូវពាក់វាពី១២-១៤ម៉ោងក្នុងមួយថ្ងៃ។ សូមធ្វើតាមការណែនាំពីវេជ្ជបណ្ឌិត។
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । पहिलो तीन महिना सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  लगाएपछी {case.patient_first_name} ले दिनको १२-१४ घण्टा सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  बाँधे पुग्छ । तपाईको डाक्टरको निर्देशन सधैं पालना गर्नुहोस् ।
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Baada ya miezi mitatu ya kwanza ya kuvaa brace, {case.patient_first_name} anapaswa tu kuivaa kwa muda wa masaa 12-14 kwa siku. Fuata maagizo kutoka kwa daktari wako wakati wote.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Pagkatapos ng unang tatlong buwan ng paggamit ng brace, kailangan na lang ni {case.patient_first_name} na isuot ito sa loob ng 12-14 oras bawat araw. Laging sundin ang utos at paalala ng inyong doktor.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.WOL: Salaam maalikum , {case.guardian1_first_name}.Ginnaaw ñetti weer yu jëkk yi mu sol àppaare bi, {case.patient_first_name} li  ko dese mooy mu koy sol 12- 14 waxtu bés bu nekk.Toppleen saa yu nekk ndénkaaney doktoor bi..
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Paghuman sa permirong tulo ka bulan sa paggamit sa brace, kinahanglan nalang suoton ni {case.patient_first_name} ang mga braces sa 12-14 ka oras sa usa ka adlaw. Permi gayud sunda ang mga tugun sa imong doktor.

07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.Name: 07 - Bracing All Day Campaign
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Play with {case.patient_first_name} when {case.pronoun_he_she} is wearing the brace. This will help {case.pronoun_him_her} feel comfortable and will make wearing the brace easier.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Jouer avec {case.patient_first_name} lorsqu' {case.pronoun_he_she} porte l'attelle. Cela l'aidera à se sentir à l'aise et facilitera le port de l'attelle.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Juega con {case.patient_first_name} mientras esté usando el soporte. Esto ayudará a {case.pronoun_him_her} a sentirse cómodo y facilitará el uso del mismo.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Milalaova miaraka amin'i {case.patient_first_name} rehefa mitondra kiraro manokana izy mba hampahazo aina azy sy hanamora ny fitondranany ilay kiraro.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ {case.patient_first_name} က ဖိနပ် (brace) ဝတ်နေတဲ့အခါ {case.pronoun_he_she} နဲ့ကစားပေးပါ။ အဲဒါကနေ {case.pronoun_him_her} က သက်သောင့်သက်သာနဲ့ ဖိနပ် (brace)ကို ဝတ်နိုင်ပါလိမ့်မယ်။
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ សូមប្រឡែងលេងជាមួយ {case.patient_first_name} ពេល {case.pronoun_he_she} ពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណប។ ធ្វើបែបនេះនឹងជួយដល់ {case.pronoun_him_her} ឲ្យមានផាសុកភាព និងធ្វើឲ្យការពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបងាយស្រួល។
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । {case.patient_first_name} ले सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  लगाई    राख्नु भएको बेला उहाँसंग खेल्नुहोस् । यसले उहाँलाई सहज महसुस गराउँछ र सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  बाधीराख्न सजिलो बनाउँछ ।
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Cheza na {case.patient_first_name} akiwa amevaa brace. Hii itamsaidia kumakinika na itafanya kuvaa brace kuwa rahisi.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Makipaglaro kay {case.patient_first_name} kapag suot niya ang brace. Makatutulong ito sa upang maging komportable ang kaniyang pakiramdam at mas mapadali ang pagsuot ng brace.
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Nanu di  fo ak  {case.patient_first_name} saa yu  {case.pronoun_he_she} solee àppaare bi.Loolu dina ko dimbali te dina ko féexal su solee àppaare bi..
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Pakigdula ni {case.patient_first_name} kung nagsuot siya sa iyang brace. Makatabang kini sa iyaha nga makomportable ug mahimong sayon ang pagsuot sa braces.

07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.Name: 07 - Bracing All Day Campaign
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. The brace is not painful for {case.patient_first_name}. It maintains the correction of the feet and prevents the feet from turning inward. Remember to always keep it on!
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. L'attelle n'est pas douloureuse pour {case.patient_first_name}. Elle maintient la correction des pieds et empêche les pieds de se retourner vers l'intérieur. N'oubliez pas de toujours la garder!
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. La ferula no le causa dolor a {case.patient_first_name}. Mantiene la corrección de los pies y evita que los pies roten hacia adentro. ¡Recuerda siempre mantenerlo puesto!
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Tsy marary an'i {case.patient_first_name} ny kiraro manokana fanitsiana tongotra , Mitazona ny fanitsiana ny voditongotra izy sy misakana ny tongotra tsy hivadika any anatiny ihany koa, Aza hadinoina mihitsy ny mitondra azy io
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ {case.patient_first_name} အတွက် ဖိနပ် (brace)က မနာပါဘူး။ ခြေထောက် ပုံမှန်ပြန်ဖြစ်အောင် ထိန်းပေးပြီး ခြေထောက်ပြန်မခွင်သွားအောင် ကာကွယ်ပါတယ်။ အမြဲဝတ်ထားဖို့ မမေ့ပါနဲ့နော်။
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ ស្បែកជើងរណបមិនធ្វើឲ្យមានការឈឺចាប់ដល់ {case.patient_first_name} ទេ។ វាជួយរក្សាប្រអប់ដែលបានពត់តំរង់រួចហើយ និងការពារប្រអប់ជើង មិនឲ្យងាកចូលក្នុងវិញ។ សូមចងចាំថា ត្រូវពាក់វាជាប់ជានិច្ច!
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  बाँध्दा {case.patient_first_name} लाई दुखाई हुँदैन । यसले पैतला ठीक अवस्थामा राख्दछ र पैतला भित्र तिर फर्कनबाट रोक्छ । यो सधैं लगाईराख्न याद राख्नुहोस् ।
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Brace haisababishi maumivu kwa {case.patient_first_name}. Inadumisha urekebishaji wa miguu na kuzuia miguu isipinde ndani. Kumbuka kuweka brace wakati wote!
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ang brace ay hindi makakasakit kay {case.patient_first_name}. Pananatilihin nito ang koreksiyon ng mga paa at pinipigilan nito ang mga paa na muling magpingkaw. Tandaan, lagi itong isuot!
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Appaare bi mettiwul. Ci  {case.patient_first_name}. Dafay jubbanti tànk yi te dafay tere tànk yi  walbatiku jëm ci biir.Bu leen ko fàtte mukk!
07 - Bracing All Day Campaign.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ang brace kay dili sakit para kang {case.patient_first_name}. Nagpadayun kini ug tarong sa iyang mga tiil ug nagpugong sa iyang mga tiil nga musulod ug balik. Hinumdumi nga permi ni niya suoton!

08 - Bracing Night Introduction.Name: 08 - Bracing Night Introduction
08 - Bracing Night Introduction.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Now {case.patient_first_name} only has to wear the brace at night and during naps! Make sure {case.pronoun_he_she} wears it every night so that it becomes part of {case.pronoun_his_her} routine.
08 - Bracing Night Introduction.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Maintenant {case.patient_first_name} n'a plus qu'à porter l'attelle la nuit et pendant les siestes ! Assurez-vous qu'{case.pronom_he_she_she} la porte tous les soirs pour qu'elle fasse partie de sa routine.
08 - Bracing Night Introduction.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ahora {case.patient_first_name} solo deberá usar la ferula por la noche y durante las siestas. Asegúrate de que {case.pronoun_he_she} lo use todas las noches para que se convierta en parte de su rutina.
08 - Bracing Night Introduction.MLG: Salama! {case.guardian1_first_name}, Ankehitriny {case.patient_first_name} dia tokony hitondra ny kiraro manokana ny alina ihany sy rehefa matory makamaka aina amin'ny antoandro ! Ataovy izay ahazoana antoka fa mitondra izany ny alina izy ka ho lasa fahazarana ho azy izany,
08 - Bracing Night Introduction.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ အခုဆိုရင် {case.patient_first_name} က ဖိနပ် (brace)ကို ညဘက်နဲ့ နေ့ခင်းခဏအိပ်ချိန် တွေမှာပဲ ဝတ်ဖို့လိုပါတော့တယ်။ {case.pronoun_he_she} ကို ဒါညတိုင်း ဝတ်ခိုင်းမှသာ {case.pronoun_his_her} ရဲ့ ပုံမှန်လို ဖြစ်လာပါလိမ့်မယ်။
08 - Bracing Night Introduction.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ ពេលនេះ {case.patient_first_name} ត្រូវពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបតែនៅពេលយប់ និងពេលគេងថ្ងៃតែប៉ុណ្ណោះ! ត្រូវតែប្រាកដថា {case.pronoun_he_she} ពាក់វាជារៀងរាល់យប់ ដើម្បីឲ្យវាក្លាយជាទម្លាប់របស់ {case.pronoun_his_her}។
08 - Bracing Night Introduction.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । अब {case.patient_first_name}ले सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  राती र सुतेकोबेला मात्र लगाए पुग्छ ! उहाँलाई यो हरेक रात लगाई    दिनुहोला ताकी यो उहाँको दैनिकी बनोस् ।
08 - Bracing Night Introduction.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Sasa {case.patient_first_name} napaswa kuvaa brace tu wakati wa usiku na anapolala! Hakikisha anavaa kila usiku ili iwe sehemu ya utaratibu wake wa kila siku.
08 - Bracing Night Introduction.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ngayon, ang brace ay kailangan na lamang isuot ni {case.patient_first_name} tuwing gabi at kapag natutulog! Tiyaking suot niya ito gabi-gabi upang maging bahagi ito ng kaniyang routine.
08 - Bracing Night Introduction.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Léegi {case.patient_first_name} nay sol àppaare bi guddi ak buy nelaw bëccëg ! Na leen leer ni '{case.pronom_he_she_she}  dafay sol àppaare bi ngoon gu nekk ba mu faf nekk tàmmeel.
08 - Bracing Night Introduction.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Karon si {case.patient_first_name} kay magsuot nalang sa iyang mga braces matag gabie ug kung matulog siya sa hapon! Siguraduha nga nagsuot siya niini kada gabie para mahimong parti kini sa iyang naandan.

09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.Name: 09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Even though {case.patient_first_name}'s feet look corrected, {case.pronoun_he_she} still needs to wear the brace at night and during naps to prevent them from turning inward again.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Même si les pieds de {case.patient_first_name} ont l'air corrigés, {case.proun_he_she} doit toujours porter l'attelle la nuit et pendant les siestes pour empêcher le pied de se replier vers l'intérieur.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Aunque los pies de {case.patient_first_name} parecen corregidos, {case.pronoun_he_she} todavía necesita usar la barra por la noche y durante las siestas para evitar que estos vuelvan a rotar hacia adentro.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Na dia ohatra ny efa voahitsy aza ny tongony dia tokony hitondra kiraro manokana fanitsiana tongotra ihany izy ny alina sy ny fotoana fatoriana makamaka aina amin'ny antoandro mba hisorohana ny fivadihan'ilay tongotra indray ho any anatiny,
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ {case.patient_first_name} ရဲ့ ခြေထောက်ကို ပုံမှန်လို့ထင်ရပေမယ့် {case.pronoun_he_she} က ခြေထောက်ပြန်မခွင်သွားအောင် ဖိနပ် (brace)ကို ညဘက်နဲ့ နေ့ခင်းခဏအိပ်ချိန် တွေမှာ ဝတ်ဖို့လိုပါသေးတယ်။
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ ទោះបីជាប្រអប់ជើងរបស់ {case.patient_first_name} ហាក់ដូចជាព្យាបាលបានត្រង់ល្អហើយក៏ដោយ, {case.pronoun_he_she} នៅតែត្រូវការពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបនៅពេលយប់ និងពេលគេងថ្ងៃ ដើម្បីការពារមិនឲ្យប្រអប់ជើងងាកត្រឡប់ទៅរកភាពដើមវិញ។
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । {case.patient_first_name} को खुट्टा ठीक भएको जस्तो देखिएपनि, पैतला भित्र तर्फ फर्कन नदिन उहाँले अझै बेलुका सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  लगाउन जरुरी हुन्छ ।
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ingawa miguu ya {case.patient_first_name} inaweza kuonekana ni kama imerekebishwa, bado anahitaji kuvaa brace wakati wa usiku na anapolala ili kuzuia kupinda ndani tena.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Kahit na mukhang ayos na ang mga paa ni {case.patient_first_name}, kailangan pa rin niyang isuot ang brace sa gabi at sa tuwing siya ay tulog para mapigilan ang relapsing.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}.Su fekke ni sax tànki  {case.patient_first_name} dañoo mel ni lu jubbantiku, {case.proun_he_she} dafa war a sol àppaare bi guddi ak buy nelaw bëccëg ngir tànk bi bañ  a walbatiku jëm ci biir.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Bisan pag ang mga tiil ni {case.patient_first_name} kay tarong tan-awon, kinahanglan gihapon ni niyang suoton ug gabie ug inag katulog sa hapon para dili napud musulod ug balik ang tiil.

09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.Name: 09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Most children wear the brace every night for about four years until their clubfoot is treated completely.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. La plupart des enfants portent l'attelle tous les soirs pendant environ quatre ans, jusqu'à ce que leur pied bot soit complètement traité.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. La mayoría de los niños usan a ferula todas las noches durante unos cuatro años hasta que su pie equinovaro se haya corregido por completo.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Ny ankamaroan'ny zaza no mitondra izany kiraro manokana fanitsiana tongotra izany ny alina mandritra ny efa-taona mandrapaha vitan'ny fitsaboana tanteraka,
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ ကလေးငယ် အများစုဟာ ခြေခွင်တာ လုံးဝပျောက်ကင်းသွားဖို့အတွက် ဖိနပ် (brace)ကို လေးနှစ်ခန့် ညစဉ်ဝတ်ကြရပါတယ်။
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ កុមារភាគច្រើនពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបជារៀងរាល់យប់រយៈពេលបួនឆ្នាំ រហូតទាល់តែការព្យាបាលជើងខ្វេររបស់គាត់បានបញ្ចប់ទាំងស្រុង។
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । क्लबफुट पूरा निको नभएसम्म प्राय: सबै बालबालिकाहरुले सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  चार बर्ष जति हरेक रात लगाउने गर्छन् ।
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Idadi kubwa ya watoto huvaa brace kila usiku kwa muda wa takriban miaka minne hadi miguu kifundo imetibika kabisa.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Karamihan ng mga bata ay suot ang brace tuwing gabi sa loob ng apat na taon hanggang sa tuluyang gumaling ang clubfoot.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}.Li ëpp ci xale yi dañuy sol àppaare bi ngoon gu nekk diiru lu jege ñeenti at ba seen laagog tànk faju.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Halos tanang mga bata kay nagsuot sa ilang brace kada gabie sa halos upat ka tuig hangtud ang ilang clubfoot kay kompletong naayo.

09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.Name: 09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.EN: We know this is a long time, but if make wearing the brace part of your routine your entire family will get used to it.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.FRA: Nous savons que c'est une longue période, mais si vous intégrez le port de l'attelle à votre routine quotidienne, toute votre famille s'y habituera.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.ES: Sabemos que esto es mucho tiempo, pero el uso de la ferula se convierte en parte de la rutina, toda la familia se acostumbrará.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MLG: Fantatsika fa fotoana maharitra izany, saingy raha ataonao ao anatin'ny fahazaranao ny fitondrana ny kiraro manokana fanitsiana tongotra dia ho zatra izany koa ny fianakavianao rehetra
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MYA: အချိန်ကြာမြင့်တာ မှန်ပေမယ့် ခြေပတ်ကိုပုံမှန်လို ဝတ်လိုက်မယ်ဆိုရင် သင့်ရဲ့ တစ်မိသားစုလုံး ကျင့်သားရသွားပါလိမ့်မယ်။
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.KHM: យើងដឹងថារយៈពេលនេះយូរណាស់ ប៉ុន្តែបើអ្នកធ្វើឲ្យការពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបទៅជាផ្នែកមួយនៃទម្លាប់របស់អ្នក គ្រួសារអ្នកទាំងមូលនឹងស៊ាំជាមួយវា។
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.NEP: हामीलाई थाहा छ कि, यो लामो समय हो, तर यदी सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  लगाउने तपाईको दैनिकीको रुपमा लिनुभयो भने, तपाईका सम्पूर्ण परिवार यसमा अभ्यस्त हुनुहुनेछन् ।
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.SW: Twajua huu ni muda mrefu, lakini unapoweka kuvaa brace kuwa sehemu ya utaratibu wako wa kila siku, familia yako yote itazoea.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.TGL: Alam nating tila may kahabaan ang panahong ito, subalit kung magiging bahagi na ng routine ang pagsusuot ng brace, makakasanayan din ito ng buong pamilya.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.WOL: Xam nanu ni diir bu yàgg la wànte su ngeen tàmmalee seen bopp àppaare bi , waa kër gépp dinañu ko tàmmal seen bopp.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.PHI: Kahibalo mi nga taas kaayo ni nga panahon, pero kung himuon nimong parti sa imong naandan ang pagbutang ug brace, maanad gyud ang imong tibuok pamilya.

09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.Name: 09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. If {case.patient_first_name}'s feet get too big for the shoes, please come back to the clinic so that the doctor can give you a new brace.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Si les pieds de {case.patient_first_name} deviennent trop grands pour les chaussures, veuillez revenir à la clinique pour que le médecin puisse vous donner une nouvelle attelle.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Si los pies de {case.patient_first_name} se tornan demasiado grandes para los zapatos, por favor ve a la clínica para que el médico pueda darte una ferula nueva.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Raha lasa lehibe loatra noho ny kirarony ny tongotr'i {case.patient_first_name}, dia aoka hiverina any amin'ny toeram-pitsaboana mba hahafahan'ny dokotera manome kiraro manokana fanitsiana tongotra vaovao indray
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ တကယ်လို့ {case.patient_first_name} ရဲ့ခြေထောက်က ဖိနပ်ထက်သိပ်ကြီးနေရင် ဆရာဝန်က ဖိနပ် (brace)အသစ်တစ်ခု ပေးနိုင်အောင် ဆေးခန်းကိုပြန်လာခဲ့ပါ။
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ ប្រសិនបើប្រអប់ជើងរបស់ {case.patient_first_name} ធំពេកធៀបនឹងស្បែកជើង សូមត្រឡប់មកកាន់គ្លីនិកវិញ ដើម្បីឲ្យវេជ្ជបណ្ឌិតអាចផ្តល់ស្បែកជើងរណបថ្មីមួយសម្រាប់ទៀត។
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । यदी {case.patient_first_name} को खुट्टा जुत्ताको लागी धेरै ठूलो भएको खण्डमा कृपया क्लिनिकमा आउनुहोस् ताकी डाक्टरले तपाईलाई नयाँ सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  दिन सकून् ।
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Iwapo miguu ya {case.patient_first_name} imekuwa mikubwa kupita viatu, tafadhali rudi katika kliniki ili daktari akupe brace mpya
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Kung nakalakhan na ng paa ni {case.patient_first_name} ang sapatos, mangyaring bumalik sa klinika updang siya ay mabigyan ng doktor ng bagong brace.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}.Su fekkee ni tànki {case.patient_first_name} dañoo réy ci dàll yi,delluleen ca kilinig ba ngir doktoor ba jox leen beneen àppaare.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Kung ang tiil ni {case.patient_first_name} kay natubuan ang iyang mga sapatos, palihug ug balik diri sa clinic para makahatag ang doktor ug bag-ong brace.

09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.Name: 09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Make sure that {case.patient_first_name} is wearing the brace. Relapsing takes a long time to show, so you may not notice at first. By the time you do, it may be too late to correct!
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Assurez-vous que {case.patient_first_name} porte bien l'attelle. La rechute prend beaucoup de temps à se manifester, de sorte que vous ne le remarquerez peut-être pas au début. Le temps que vous le fassiez, il sera peut-être trop tard pour la corriger!
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Asegúrate de que {case.patient_first_name} esté usando la ferula. La recaída demora mucho tiempo en aparecer, por lo que es posible que no la notes al principio. Para cuando lo hagas, puede que sea demasiado tarde como para corregirla.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MLG: Salama! {case.guardian1_first_name} Ataovy azo antoka fa mitondra hatrany ny kiraro manokana fanitsiana tongotra i {case.patient_first_name}. Ny fiverenan'ny fivadian-tongotra dia miandalana sady maharitra ka mety tsy ho tandritandrinao eny am-piandohany. Mety ho efa tara mandrapahatongan'ny fotoana hahatsikaritranao azy.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ {case.patient_first_name} ကို ဖိနပ် (brace) သေချာဝတ်ခိုင်းပါ။ အချိန်အကြာကြီးနေမှ ရောဂါပြန်ဖြစ်တတ်တာကြောင့် အစပိုင်းမှာ သတိမထားမိတတ်ပါဘူး။ သတိထားမိတဲ့အချိန်ရောက်တော့ ပြန်ပြင်ဖို့ အရမ်း နောက်ကျသွားနိုင်ပါတယ်။
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ ត្រូវប្រាកដថា {case.patient_first_name} ពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបជានិច្ច។ ការលាប់ឡើងវិញត្រូវការពេលវេលាយូរណាស់ដើម្បីបង្ហាញឲ្យដឹង  ហើយដែលអ្នកអាចមិនបានសំគាល់ឃើញពីដំបូងៗក៏ថាបាន។ ពេលដែលអ្នកដឹង វាអាចយឺតពេលណាស់ទៅហើយក្នុងការកែតំរង់!
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । {case.patient_first_name} ले सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  लगाउनु भएको कुरा निर्क्यौल गर्नुहोस् । रिल्याप्स भएको देख्न लामो समय लाग्छ, तसर्थ तपाईले सुरुमै यो देख्न सक्नु हुन्न । तपाईले याद गरुञ्जेल यो मिलाउन धेरै ढिला भएको हुन सक्छ ।
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Hakikisha kwamba {case.patient_first_name} anavaa brace. Kupinda tena huchukua muda kuonekana, kwa hivyo unaweza kosa kuona kwa mara ya kwanza. Wakati unapoona, inaweza ikawa umechelewa kurekebishwa!
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Tiyaking suot ni {case.patient_first_name} ang brace. Hindi agad-agad ang relapsing, kaya maaaring hindi ninyo ito mapansin sa una. At kung ito'y inyo ng mapansin, maaaring huli na para maayos pa ito!
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Na la wóor ni  {case.patient_first_name} sol na bu baax àppaare bi.Su feebar biy dellusi du gaaw a feeñ moo tax doo ko seetlu ci njalbéen.,Saa yoo koy seetlu dina fekk pajtal mi  wees..
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Siguraduha nga si {case.patient_first_name} kay nagsuot sa iyang braces. Ang replasing kay dugay makita, mao dili ni nimu mabantayan permiro. Unya ug mabantayan na nimu, ulahi na para matarong!

09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.Name: 09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. You are doing a great job! Soon your child will be able to walk normally.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Vous faites un excellent travail ! Bientôt, votre enfant pourra marcher normalement.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. ¡Estás haciendo un muy buen trabajo! Pronto {case.patient_first_name} podrá caminar normalmente.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Arahabaina! Tsy ho ela ny zanakao dia handeha tsara tahaka ny olon-drehetra
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ သင့်ရဲ့လုပ်ဆောင်ချက် တကယ်ကောင်းပါတယ်။ မကြာခင် သင့်ကလေးငယ်ဟာ ပုံမှန်အတိုင်း လမ်းလျှောက်နိုင်တော့မှာပါ။
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ អ្នកធ្វើបានល្អណាស់! កូនរបស់អ្នកនឹងអាចដើរបានធម្មតាក្នុងពេលឆាប់ៗខាងមុខនេះ។
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । तपाईले धेरै राम्रो कार्य गरीरहनुभएको छ ! चाँडै नै तपाईको बच्चा सामान्य रुपमा हिंड्न सक्नुहुनेछ ।
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Unafanya kazi nzuri sana! Hivi karibuni mtoto wako ataweza kutembea kwa kawaida.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Magaling! Kaunting panahon na lang at makakalakad na nang normal ang inyong anak.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}.Yaa ngi def liggéey bu mucc ayib ! Léegi sa doom ji dina mën a doxaat ni mu ware.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Maayo ang imong mga gipangbuhat! Puhon ang imong anak kay makalakaw na ug normal.

09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.Name: 09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Even just one night without the brace can affect {case.patient_first_name}'s treatment. Remember that {case.pronoun_he_she} must wear the brace every night!
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Même une seule nuit sans l'attelle peut affecter le traitement de {case.patient_first_name}. Rappelez-vous qu' {case.proun_he_she} doit porter l'attelle chaque nuit !
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Una sola noche sin la ferula puede afectar el tratamiento de {case.patient_first_name}. ¡Recuerda que {case.pronoun_he_she} debe usar la ferula todas las noches!
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name}. Tsy fanaovana ilay kiraro 1 alina monja dia mety hiteraka olana amin'ny fitsaboana an'i {case.patient_first_name​} Tsarovy fa tokony hanao ilay kiraro isaky ny alina izy.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ ဖိနပ် (brace)ကို တစ်ညလောက် မဝတ်ဘဲ ထားရင်တောင် {case.patient_first_name} ရဲ့ ကုသမှုအပေါ် ထိခိုက်နိုင်ပါတယ်။ {case.pronoun_he_she} က ဖိနပ် (brace)ကို ညတိုင်းဝတ်ရပါမယ်။
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ ការមិនបានពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបសូម្បីតែមួយយប់ ក៏អាចធ្វើឲ្យប៉ះពាល់ដល់ការព្យាបាលរបស់ {case.patient_first_name​} ដែរ។ សូមចាំថា {case.pronoun_he_she} ត្រូវតែពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបជារៀងរាល់យប់!
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  बिना केवल एक रातले पनि {case.patient_first_name} को उपचारमा असर पार्न सक्छ । याद राख्नुहोस् कि, उहाँले प्रत्येक रात सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  लगाउनु पर्छ ।
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Hata usiku mmoja bila brace unaweza athiri matibabu ya {case.patient_first_name}. Kumbuka kwamba lazima avae brace kila usiku!
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Kahit isang gabi lang na hindi suot ang brace, maaapektuhan ang paggamot kay {case.patient_first_name}. Kaya't laging tandaan, kailangang isuot niya ang brace gabi-gabi!
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Genn guddi gu mu solul àppaare bi mën na yàq pajum  {case.patient_first_name}. Fàttalikuleen ni {case.proun_he_she} dafa war a sol àppaare bi guddi gu nekk.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Bisan pag usa ra ka gabie nga walay brace kay maka-apekto kini sa pagpa-ayo ni {case.patient_first_name}. Hinumdumi nga kinahanglan gayud siya magsuot ug brace kada gabie!

09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.Name: 09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. If {case.patient_first_name} is having trouble sleeping with the brace, ask your doctor for tips on how to make {case.pronoun_him_her} more comfortable.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Si {case.patient_first_name} a de la difficulté à dormir avec l'attelle, demandez à votre médecin des conseils pour qu'{case.pronoun_him_her} la porte plus confortablement.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Si {case.patient_first_name} está teniendo problemas para dormir con la ferula, pídele consejos a tu médico sobre qué hacer para que su hijo esté más cómodo.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Maka torohevitra amin'ny dokotera raha tsy mahita tory tsara i {case.patient_first_name} rehefa manao ilay kiraro amin'ny alina.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ တကယ်လို့ {case.patient_first_name} က ဖိနပ် (brace)နဲ့ အိပ်ရတာအဆင်မပြေရင် {case.pronoun_him_her} ပိုပြီးအဆင်ပြေအောင် ဘယ်လိုလုပ်ရမလဲဆိုတာ သိရအောင် သင့်ရဲ့ဆရာဝန်ကို မေးပါ။
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ បើ {case.patient_first_name} គេងមិនលក់ដោយសារតែការពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណប សូមសាកសួរទៅកាន់វេជ្ជបណ្ឌិតរបស់អ្នកពីគន្លឹះដើម្បីធ្វើឲ្យ {case.pronoun_him_her} មានផាសុកភាពជាងមុន។
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । यदी {case.patient_first_name} लाई सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज) लगाएर  सुत्न गाह्रो भएको छ भने, उहाँलाई सहज पार्न तपाईको डाक्टरसंग सल्लाह लिनुहोस् ।
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Iwapo {case.patient_first_name} anapata shida kulala na brace, uliza daktari wako akupatie vidokezo vya jinsi ya kumfanya atulie.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Kung nahihirapang matulog si {case.patient_first_name} suot ang brace, maaring humingi ng payo sa doktor kung paano siya magiging mas maginhawa.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Su {case.patient_first_name} amee jafe-jafe buy nelaw ak àppaare bi, laajleen seen doktoor ay ndigal  ngir {case.pronoun_him_her} mën koo sol te du ci am benn coono.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Kung si {case.patient_first_name} kay naglisud ug tulog tungod sa brace, pangutana sa imong doktor ug mga tips para makomportable ang bata.

09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.Name: 09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Remember to keep checking {case.patient_first_name} for blisters, dark spots or irritated skin. Let your doctor know if you see these signs.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. N'oubliez pas de vérifier {case.patient_first_fname} pour les ampoules, les taches brunes ou la peau irritée. Informez votre médecin si vous voyez ces signes là.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Recuerda seguir revisando los pies {case.patient_first_name} para detectar ampollas, manchas oscuras o piel irritada. Hazle saber a tu médico que tu hijo presenta estos síntomas.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} aza hadinoina ny manamarina raha misy tambaingan-drano na faritra maintimainty na mangidihidy ny hoditr'i {case.patient_first_name}. Ilazao ny dokoteranao raha vao mahita an'ireo tranga ireo ianao.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ {case.patient_first_name} မှာ အရည်ကြည်ဖုတွေ၊ အမဲစက်တွေ၊ အရေပြား ယားယံတာတွေ ရှိသလား အမြဲစစ်ဆေးဖို့ မမေ့ပါနဲ့။ ဒီလက္ခဏာတွေမြင်ရင် သင့်ဆရာဝန်ကို အသိပေးလိုက်ပါ။
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ សូមចាំថា អ្នកត្រូវតែពិនិត្យ {case.patient_first_name} រកមើលពងបែក ស្នាមអុជខ្មៅៗ ឬកន្លែងរមាស់លើស្បែក។ ប្រាប់ដល់វេជ្ជបណ្ឌិតរបស់អ្នកបើអ្នកឃើញសញ្ញាទាំងអស់នេះ។
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । {case.patient_first_name} को शरीरमा फोकाहरु, गाढा टाटाहरु वा छाला चिलाएको छन् कि भनेर जाँच गर्ने गर्नुहोस् । यदी तपाईले यी लक्षण देख्नुभएमा डाक्टरलाई थाहा दिनुहोस् ।
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Kumbuka kuangalia miguu ya {case.patient_first_name} kama utaona uvimbe, madoa meusi au ngozi iliyochubuka. Mjuze daktari wako iwapo utaona dalili hizi.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Tandaan, laging tingnan kung may paltos, maiitim na batik, o iritadong balat si {case.patient_first_name}. Huwag kalimutang ipaalam sa inyong doktor kung inyong makita ang mga senyales na ito.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Buleen fàttee seetlu ni  {case.patient_first_fname} amul ay gamb ak ay gàkk-gàkk  yu ñuul walla der buy jam.Jokkool ak sa doktoor soo gise mbir yu deme ni yii..
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Hinumdumi nga paggatan-awon nimu kung naa bay mga luto si {case.patient_first_name} o mga lagum-lagum o iritasyon sa panit. Pahibal-a imong doktor kung makita ni nimu na mga sinyales.

09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.Name: 09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Remember to hug and play with {case.patient_first_name}, and encourage {case.pronoun_him_her} to run and play during the day while {case.pronoun_he_she} is not wearing the brace.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. N'oubliez pas d'embrasser et de jouer avec {case.patient_first_name}, et encouragez {case.pronoun_him_her} à courir et jouer pendant la journée lorsqu' {case.pronoun_he_she} ne porte pas l'attelle.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Recuerda abrazar y jugar con {case.patient_first_name}, y alentarlo/la a correr y jugar durante el día mientras que no esté usando la ferula.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Aza hadinoina ny manambitamby sy milalao amin'i {case.patient_first_name} ary ampirisiho hihazakazaka sy hilalao izy rehefa tsy manao kiraro manokana fanitsiana tongotra
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ {case.patient_first_name} နဲ့အတူ ပွေ့ဖက်ကစားဖို့၊ {case.pronoun_he_she} က နေ့ဘက်မှာ ဖိနပ် (brace) မဝတ်ထားတဲ့အခါ {case.pronoun_him_her} ကို ပြေးလွှား ဆော့ကစားအောင် အားပေးဖို့ သတိရပါ။
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ សូមចាំថា ត្រូវឱបក្រសោប បន្លែងលេងជាមួយ {case.patient_first_name}, និងលើកទឹកចិត្ត {case.pronoun_him_her} ឲ្យរត់ និងលេងនៅពេលថ្ងៃខណៈពេលដែល {case.pronoun_he_she} មិនពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណប។
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । {case.patient_first_name} लाई माया गर्न र उहाँसंगै खेल्न नबिर्सनुहोस्, र सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  नलायको बेला उहाँलाई खेल्न कुद्न प्रेरित गर्नुहोस् ।
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Kumbuka kukumbatia na kucheza na {case.patient_first_name} na umuhimize kukimbia na kucheza wakati wa mchana wakati hajavaa brace.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Huwag kalilimutang yakapin at makipaglaro kay {case.patient_first_name}, at hikayatin siyang tumakbo at maglaro sa mga pagkakataong hindi niya suot ang brace.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Buleen fàtte di fóon ak di fo ak  {case.patient_first_name}, te di soññ   {case.pronoun_him_her} ngir muy daw ak di fo ci bëccëg gi saa yu ' {case.pronoun_he_she} solul àppaare bi.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Hinumdumi nga gaksa ug pakigdula kay {case.patient_first_name} ug sige siya ug idasig nga mag-dagan-dagan o mag-dula-dula ma-adlawan samtang wala siya nagsuot sa braces.

09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.Name: 09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. If {case.patient_first_name} has bright red spots or blisters. {case.pronoun_his_her} shoe may not be on tightly enough. Make sure that {case.pronoun_his_her} heel is down in the shoe.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Si {case.patient_first_name} a des taches rouges vives ou des ampoules, c'est qu' {case.pronoun_his_her} n'a pas sa chaussure assez serrée. Assurez-vous que le talon est bien dans la chaussure.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Si {case.patient_first_name} tiene manchas rojas o ampollas brillantes puede que la ferula no esté lo suficientemente apretado. Asegúrate de que su talón esté dentro del zapato.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} raha toa ka misy teboteboka na tasitasy menamena amin'ny tongotr'i {case.patient_first_name} dia mety tsy ao tsara amin'ny tongony ny kirarony. Ataovy izay ahazoana antoka fa mitsatoka tsara amin'ny kiraro ny voditongony
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ တကယ်လို့ {case.patient_first_name} မှာ အနီစက်တွေ ဒါမှမဟုတ် အရည်ကြည်ဖုတွေ ရှိနေရင် {case.pronoun_his_her} ရဲ့ဖိနပ်ကို ကျပ်အောင်မစီးလို့ ဖြစ်နိုင်ပါတယ်။ {case.pronoun_his_her} ရဲ့ဖနောင့်ကို ဖိနပ်ထဲဝင်နေအောင်ထားပါ။
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ បើ {case.patient_first_name} មានស្នាមក្រហម និងពងទឹកលើស្បែក {case.pronoun_his_her} ស្បែកជើងរណបអាចមិនត្រូវបានពាក់តឹងល្មមនោះឡើយ។ ត្រូវប្រាកដថាកែងជើងរបស់ {case.pronoun_his_her} ធ្លាក់ចុះទៅដល់បាតស្បែកជើងពេលពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណប។
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । यदी {case.patient_first_name} को शरीरमा उज्याला रातो टाटा वा फोकाहरु देखिएमा उहाँको जुत्ता मिल्नेगरी कस्सिएको नहुन सक्छ । उहाँको कुर्कुच्चा जुत्तामा परेको छ भनी पक्का गर्नुहोस् ।
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.SW: Hujambo {case.guradian1_first_name}. Iwapo {case.patient_first_name} ana madoa mekundu ama uvimbe, kiatu chake kinaweza kuwa hakijabanwa kwa kutosha. Hakikisha kwamba kisigino chake kiko chini ndani ya kiatu.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Kung namumula o may paltos si {case.patient_first_name}, maaaring hindi sapat ang higpit ng sapatos niya. Tiyaking nakalapat ang kanyang sakong sa sapatos.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Su {case.patient_first_name} amee ay gàkk-gàkk  yu xonx  walla ay gamb , dafay wone ni, {case.pronoun_his_her} solul dàll wi ba mu daŋ.Na leen wóor ni téstén wi egg na ci suuf dàll wi..
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Kung si {case.patient_first_name} naay mga hayag nga mga pula-pula o mga nalut-han, lu-ag ra ang iyang mga sapatos. Siguraduha nga ang iyang takong kay sangko sa laplapa sa sapatos.

09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.Name: 09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. It is very important that {case.patient_first_name}'s heel stays completely inside the shoe when {case.pronoun_he_she} wears the brace in order for the treatment to work!
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Il est très important que le talon de {case.patient_first_name} reste complètement à l'intérieur de la chaussure lorsque {case.pronoun_he_he_she} porte l'attelle pour que le traitement fonctionne!
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. ¡Es muy importante que el talón de {case.patient_first_name} permanezca completamente dentro del zapato cuando use la ferula para que el tratamiento funcione!
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Tena zava-dehibe ny hoe tena mitsatoka tsara ao anaty kiraro ny voditongotr'i {case.patient_first_name} rehefa manao kiraro manokana fanitsiana tongotra izy mba hampahomby ny fitsaboana.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ ကုသမှု ထိရောက်အောင် {case.pronoun_he_she} က ဖိနပ် (brace)ဝတ်တဲ့အခါမှာ {case.patient_first_name} ရဲ့ ဖနောင့်က ဖိနပ်ထဲကိုလုံးဝ ရောက်နေဖို့ အရမ်းအရေးကြီးပါတယ်။
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ ជាការសំខាន់ណាស់ដែលកែងជើងរបស់ {case.patient_first_name} ត្រូវនៅក្នុងស្បែកជើង'នៅពេលដែល {case.pronoun_he_she} ពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណប ដើម្បីឲ្យការព្យាបាលមានប្រសឹទ្ធិភាព !
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । उपचारले काम गर्नका लागी {case.patient_first_name} का कुर्कुच्चा जुत्ता भित्र पूरै हुनु धेरै जरुरी छ ।
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ni muhumu sana kwamba kisigino cha {case.patient_first_name} kinakaa ndani ya kiatu kabisa wakati anapovaa brace ili matibabu yafaulu!
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Mahalagang nakalapat ang sakong ni {case.patient_first_name} sa sapatos sa tuwing suot niya ang brace upang masiguro ang tulugang paggaling ng kaniyang mga paa!
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Dina am solo lool bu tésténu  {case.patient_first_name} nekkee ci biir dàll wi su  {case.pronoun_he_he_she} solee àppaare bi ngir paj mi jaar yoon!
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Importante gayud kaayo nga ang takong ni {case.patient_first_name} kay magpabilin sa sulod sa sapatos kung nagsuot siya sa brace aron mutalab ang pagpa-ayo!

09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.Name: 09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. If {case.patient_first_name} gets blisters or rashes from {case.pronoun_his_her} brace, do not use lotion or oil to help heal the skin. It will make the problem worse.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Si {case.patient_first_name} souffre d'ampoules ou d'éruptions cutanées, n'utilisez pas de lotion ou d'huile pour aider à guérir la peau. Cela ne fera qu'aggraver le problème.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Si {case.patient_first_name} tiene ampollas o sarpullidos causados por la ferula, no uses lociones ni aceites para ayudar a curar la piel. Solo harán que el problema empeore.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name}. Aza asiana tsirano-panafody na menaka ny hoditra na faritra mangidihidy eo amin'i {case.patient_first_name} rehefa manao ilay kiraro izy fa mety hampitombo ny olana izany.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ တကယ်လို့ {case.patient_first_name} က {case.pronoun_his_her} ဖိနပ် (brace)ကြောင့် အရည်ကြည်ဖုတွေ၊ အနီကွက်တွေ ဖြစ်လာရင် အရေပြားသက်သာအောင် လိမ်းဆေးတွေ၊ အဆီတွေ မလိမ်းပါနဲ့။ ပိုဆိုးသွားပါလိမ့်မယ်။
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ បើ {case.patient_first_name} មានពងបែក ឬរមាស់បណ្តាលមកពីស្បែកជើងរណប {case.pronoun_his_her}, សូមកុំប្រើឡេ ឬប្រេងជំនួយស្បែក។ វានឹងបណ្តាលឲ្យបញ្ហាកាន់តែធំឡើង។
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । यदी {case.patient_first_name} को सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज) को कारण छालामा फोकाहरु वा डाबरहरु आएमा त्यसलाई निको पार्न लोशन वा तेलको प्रयोग नगर्नुहोला । यसले समस्यालाई झन जटिल बनाउँछ ।
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Iwapo {case.patient_first_name} amepata uvimbe ama kukerwa na ngozi kutokana na kuvaa brace, usitumie lotion au mafuta kusaidia kutibu ngozi. Itaifanya iwe mbaya zaidi.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Kung nagkapaltos o nagkapantal si {case.patient_first_name} sa pagsusuot niya ng brace, huwag itong pahiran ng lotion o langis. Lalo lamang nitong palalalain ang problema.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Su {case.patient_first_name} amee gamb yuy metti walla ay picc yu génn ci yaram wi,buleen jëfandikoo lu xeetoo lajkoloñ mbaa diwlin ngir jéem koo faj.Loolu dafay yokk jafe-jafe yi rekk.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Kung si {case.patient_first_name} kay mmalut-han o mga nuka-nuka gikan sa brace, ayaw ug gamit ug losyon o mga lana sa pagtabang sa pag-ayo sa panit. Makasamot ni siya sa problema.

09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.Name: 09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.EN: Make sure {case.patient_first_name}'s feet are dry when you put the brace on, and talk to the doctor if you are concerned.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.FRA: Assurez-vous que les pieds de {case.patient_first_name} soient secs lorsque vous mettez l'attelle, et parlez-en au médecin si vous êtes inquiet.

09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MLG: Ataovy izay ahazoana antoka fa maina tsara ny tongotr'i {case.patient_first_name} rehefa mametraka ny kiraro manokana amin'izany ianao, ary ambarao amin'ny dokotera raha misy fanahiana aminao ny amin'izany
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MYA: ဖိနပ် (brace)ဝတ်ပေးချိန်မှာ {case.patient_first_name} ရဲ့ခြေထောက်တွေ ခြောက်နေရပါမယ်။ စိုးရိမ်တယ် ဆိုရင်တော့ ဆရာဝန်ကို ပြောပြပါ။
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.KHM: ត្រូវប្រាកដថាប្រអប់ជើងរបស់ {case.patient_first_name} ស្ងួតនៅពេលបំពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណប និងពិភាក្សាជាមួយវេជ្ជបណ្ឌិតបើអ្នកមានកង្វល់។
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.NEP: सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  बाँधिदिनु भन्दा पहिले {case.patient_first_name} को खुट्टाहरु सुक्खा छन् भनी पक्का गर्नुहोस् र यदी तपाई चिन्तित हुनुहुन्छ भने डाक्टरसंग सल्लाह गर्नुहोस् ।
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.SW: Hakikisha miguu ya {case.patient_first_name} imekauka kabla ya kuweka brace. Ongea na daktari iwapo una wasiwasi.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.TGL: Tiyaking tuyo ang mga paa ni {case.patient_first_name} sa tuwing isinusuot niya ang brace, at makipag-usap sa inyong doktor kung kayo'y may mga katanungan o pag-aalala.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.WOL: Na leen wóor ni  tànki  {case.patient_first_name} wow nañu laata ngeen di ko solal àppaare bi te itam, waxtaanleen ci ak doktoor bi su ngeen ci amee ag jaaxle.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.PHI: Siguraduha nga ang mga tiil ni {case.patient_first_name} kay uga kung ibutang nimu ang brace, ug pakig-istorya sa imong doktor kung naa kay gikabalak-an.

09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.Name: 09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Don't stop using the brace at night until the doctor says it is okay.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. N'arrêtez pas d'utiliser l'attelle la nuit jusqu'à ce que le médecin vous dise que c'est bon.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. No dejes de usar la ferula durante la noche hasta que el médico lo autorice.

09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ ဆရာဝန်က အဆင်ပြေပြီလို့ ပြောတဲ့အချိန်အထိ ဖိနပ် (brace)ကို ညဘက်မှာ ဝတ်ထားရပါမယ်။
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ សូមកុំបញ្ឈប់ការពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបនៅពេលយប់ រហូតទាល់តែវេជ្ជបណ្ឌិតប្រាប់ឲ្យឈប់។
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । डाक्टरले हुन्छ नभनेसम्म बेलुका सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  लगाउन नछाड्नुहोस् ।
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Usiache kutumia brace usiku mpaka daktari asema ni sawa.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Huwag ihinto ang pagsuot ng brace sa gabi hanggang sabihin ng inyong doktor na maaari na itong hindi isuot.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Buleen bàyyee jëfandikoo àppaare bi fii ak doktoor bi waxu leen baax na.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ayaw ug undang ug paggamit sa brace kada gabie hangtud mu-ingon ang doktor nga pwede na.

09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.Name: 09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. You can always let your doctor know about problems with {case.patient_first_name}'s treatment.

09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Azonao atao hatrany ny mampahafantatra ny dokoteranao mikasika ny olana mifandraika amin'ny fitsaboana an'i {case.patient_first_name}
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ {case.patient_first_name} ရဲ့ ကုသမှုနဲ့ ပတ်သက်တဲ့ ပြဿနာတွေကို သင့်ရဲ့ဆရာဝန်ကို အချိန်မရွေး ပြောပြနိုင်ပါတယ်။
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ អ្នកអាចប្រាប់វេជ្ជបណ្ឌិតរបស់អ្នកឲ្យបានដឹងពីបញ្ហានៅក្នុងការព្យាបាលរបស់ {case.patient_first_name}។
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । {case.patient_first_name} को उपचारका क्रममा कुनै समस्या भए तपाईको डाक्टरलाई थाहा दिन सक्नु हुन्छ ।
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Unaweza kuambia daktari wako kuhusu shida zinazotokana na matibabu ya {case.patient_first_name} wakati wowote.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Anumang oras ay maaari ninyong ipaalam sa inyong doktor ang mga problema kaugnay sa gamutan ni {case.patient_first_name}.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Saa yu nekk mën ngeen a jokkoo ak seen doktoor ci jafe-jafe yi jëm ci pajum  {case.patient_first_name}.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Pwede ra nimu permi ipahibalo ang mga problema sa imong doktor bahin sa pagpa-ayo ni {case.patient_first_name}.

09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.Name: 09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Keep up the good work. Remember it is important for {case.patient_first_name} to wear the brace during the night, so that {case.pronoun_he_she} will be able to run and play.

09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Sigue con el buen trabajo. Recuerda que es importante que {case.patient_first_name} use la barra durante la noche, para que {case.pronoun_he_she} pueda correr y jugar.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Tohizo fa tsara! Aza hadinoina fa zava-dehibe ho an'i {case.patient_first_name} ny mitondra hatrany ny kiraro manokana fanitsiana tongotra mandritra ny alina ka amin'izay izy dia ho afaka mihazakazaka sy milalao indray izy.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ ကောင်းမွန်တဲ့ ဆောင်ရွက်ချက်ကို ထိန်းထားပါ။ {case.patient_first_name} က ညဘက်မှာ ဖိနပ် (brace) ဝတ်ထားမှသာ {case.pronoun_he_she} ပြေးလွှားဆော့ကစားနိုင်မယ်ဆိုတာ မမေ့ပါနဲ့။
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ សូមព្យាយាមធ្វើឲ្យបានល្អ។ សូមចាំថា ប្រសើរបំផុតត្រូវឲ្យ {case.patient_first_name} ពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបនៅពេលយប់ ដើម្បីឲ្យ {case.pronoun_he_she} អាចរត់ និងលេងបាន។
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । राम्रो कार्य जारी राख्नुहोस् । याद राख्नुहोस्, {case.patient_first_name} ले राती सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  लगाई     राख्न जरुरी हुन्छ, ताकी उहाँ खेल्न र कुद्न सक्षम हुनुहुनेछ ।
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Endelea na kazi nzuri unayofanya. Daima kumbuka kuwa ni muhimu kwa {case.patient_first_name} kuvaa brace wakati wa usiku, ili apate uwezo kukimbia na kucheza.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ipagpatuloy ang magandang gawa. Tandaan, mahalagang suot ni {case.patient_first_name} ang brace sa gabi, upang sa kalaunan siya ay makatakbo at makapaglaro.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case guardian1_first_name}. Wéyleen ci seen liggéey bu baax bii.Fàttalikuleen ni am na solo lool su  {case.patient_first_name} dee sol àppaare bi ci guddi gi ngir {case.pronoun_he_she} mën a daw ak di fo bu ëllëgee.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Padayuna ang imong maayong ginabuhat. Hinumdumi nga importante para kang {case.patient_first_name} nga isuot niya ang brace kada gabie para makadagan-dagan ug makadula siya ma-adlawan.

09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.Name: 09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Thank you for all of your effort towards {case.patient_first_name}'s treatment. Even though {case.pronoun_he_she} has been in the brace for months, {case.pronoun_he_she} could still relapse.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Merci de tous vos efforts pour le traitement de {case.patient_first_name}. Même si {case.pronoun_he_she} porte son attelle depuis des mois, {case.pronoun_he_she} pourrait encore rechuter.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Gracias por todo tu esfuerzo en el tratamiento de {case.patient_first_name}. Aunque {case.pronoun_he_she} ha estado usando la ferula durante meses, {case.pronoun_he_she} todavía podría recaer.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Misaotra indrindra amin'ny ezaka rehetra nataonao ho an'i {case.patient_first_name}. Na dia nitondra kiraro manokana hatrany aza izy nandritra ny volana maro, dia mety ho tafaverina hivadi-tongotra indray.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ {case.patient_first_name} ရဲ့ ကုသမှုအတွက် ကြိုးစားပေးလို့ ကျေးဇူးတင်ပါတယ်။ {case.pronoun_he_she} က ဖိနပ် (brace)ဝတ်ထားတာ လပေါင်းများစွာကြာပြီ ဖြစ်ပေမယ့် {case.pronoun_he_she} ဟာ ရောဂါပြန်ဖြစ်နိုင်ပါသေးတယ်။
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ សូមអរគុណចំពោះការខិតខំរបស់លោកអ្នកក្នុងការព្យាបាលដល់ {case.patient_first_name}។ ទោះបីជា {case.pronoun_he_she} បានពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបជាច្រើនខែក៏ដោយ, {case.pronoun_he_she} នៅតែអាចត្រឡប់ទៅរកភាពដើមវិញដែរ។
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । {case.patient_first_name} को उपचारमा तपाईको मेहनतको लागी धन्यवाद । उहाँले महिनौं सम्म सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  प्रयोग गर्नुभएता पनि, उहाँलाई रिल्याप्स हुन सक्छ ।
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Asante kwa juhudi zako katika matibabu ya {case.patient_first_name}. Hata kama {case.patient_first_name} amevaa brace kwa miezi kadhaa, anaweza kupinda tena. Hakikisha anaendelea kuvaa brace.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Salamat sa lahat ng inyong pagsisikap para gamutan ni {case.patient_first_name}. Kahit na ilang buwan na siyang naka-brace, maaari pa rin silang mag-relapse.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Jarajëf ci seen farlu ci lu jëm ci pajum  {case.patient_first_name}. Donte sax  {case.pronoun_he_she} mu ngi sol àppaare bi ay weer a ngii, {case.pronoun_he_she} mën naa daanuwaat feebar.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Salamat sa inyong makanunayung pag-gam sa pagpayo ni {case.patient_first_name}. Bisan ug nag-brace nalang siya sa pipila ka bulan, pwede gihapon siya mag-relapse.

09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.Name: 09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.EN: To prevent relapse, make sure {case.patient_first_name} wears the brace for the entire bracing period.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.FRA: Pour éviter une rechute, assurez-vous que {case.patient_first_name} porte l'attelle pendant toute la durée de son traitement.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.ES: Para evitar una recaída, asegúrate de que {case.patient_first_name} use la ferula durante todo el tratamiento.

09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.MYA: ရောဂါပြန်မဖြစ်အောင် {case.patient_first_name} က ဖိနပ် (brace)ဝတ်ရမယ့် ကာလတစ်ခုလုံး ဝတ်ထားခိုင်းပါ။
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.KHM: ដើម្បីការពារមិនឲ្យវិលទៅរកភាពដើមវិញ ត្រូវប្រាកដថា {case.patient_first_name} ពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបជានិច្ចក្នុងអំឡុងពេលត្រូវពាក់។
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.NEP: रिल्याप्स हुन नदिनका लागी {case.patient_first_name} ले सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  लगाउने पूरै समय अवधि सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  लगाउनुभएको कुरा पक्का गर्नुहोस् ।
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.SW: Kuzuia kupinda tena, hakikisha {case.patient_first_name} anavaa brace kwa muda wote uliotengewa wa kuvaa brace.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.TGL: Upang mapigilan ang relapse, tiyaking suot ni {case.patient_first_name} ang brace sa kabuuan ng itinakdang panahon para sa bracing.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.WOL: Ngir moytu mu daanuwaat,na leen wóor nin {case.patient_first_name} mu ngi sol àppaare bi diirub li muy faju.
09A - Bracing Night Campaign Y1.PHI: Para mapug-ngan ang pag-relapse, siguraduha nga si {case.patient_first_name} nagsuot sa iyang brace sa sulod sa tibuok bracing period.

09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.Name: 09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. We know bracing is a long process, but it will be worth it!
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Nous savons que le port de l'attelle est un long processus, mais cela en vaudra la peine!
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Sabemos que uso de la ferula es un proceso largo, ¡pero valdrá la pena!
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Maharitra tokoa ny fotoana hanaovana ilay kiraro manokana, saingy tsy mahafaty antoka ny manao azy.
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ ဖိနပ် (brace)ဝတ်ရတာ ရေရှည်အလုပ် ဖြစ်ပေမယ့် ထိုက်တန်ပါတယ်။
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ យើងដឹងថាការពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបជាដំណើរការរយៈពេលយូរ ប៉ុន្តែវានឹងទទួលបានមកនូវលទ្ធផលមកវិញយ៉ាងសមរម្យ!
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । हामीलाई थाहा छ कि, सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  लगाउने लामो प्रक्रिया हो, तर यो फलदायी हुनेछ!
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Twajua muda uliotengewa kuvaa brace ni mrefu lakini una thamani yake.
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Alam nating mahabang proseso ang bracing, ganunpaman tiyak namang maganda ang kahihinatnan nito!
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Xam nanu ni sol àppaare mbir mu yàgg la waaye jar na ko.
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Kahibalo mi ang braces kay usa kini kataas nga proseso, pero masulit ra gyud ni!

09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.Name: 09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. As {case.patient_first_name}'s feet grow they will need a bigger brace.
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Au fur et à mesure que les pieds de {case.patient_first_name} grandissent, ils auront besoin d'une attelle plus grande.
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. A medida que crezcan los pies de {case.patient_first_name} necesitarán una barra más grande.
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.MLG: Salama {case.guardian1_first_name} Arakaraka ny fitomboan'ny tongotr'i {case.patient_first_name} no ilàna kiraro manokana fanitsiana tongotra lehibe kokoa
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ {case.patient_first_name} ရဲ့ ခြေထောက် ကြီးလာတဲ့အခါ ပိုကြီးတဲ့ဖိနပ် (brace)ကို လိုလာပါလိမ့်မယ်။
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ ពេលប្រអប់ជើងរបស់ {case.patient_first_name} លូតលាស់ គាត់ត្រូវការស្បែកជើងរណបដែលធំជាងមុន។
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । {case.patient_first_name} को खुट्टा बढ्दै जाँदा उहाँलाई ठूलो सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  चाहिनेछ ।
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Wakati miguu ya {case.patient_first_name} inaendelea kukua, atahitaji brace kubwa.
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Kakailanganin ni {case.patient_first_name} ng mas malaking brace kasabay ng paglaki kaniyang mga paa.
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Su tànki  {case.patient_first_name} di gën di màgg, dañuy soxla àppaare bu gën a mag.
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Samtang nagdako ang mga tiil ni {case.patient_first_name}, nanginahanglan sad sila mas dakong brace.

09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.Name: 09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.EN: If you notice {case.pronoun_he_she} is fussy at night or if {case.pronoun_his_her} toes curl over the front of the shoes, it may mean {case.pronoun_he_she} needs a bigger brace.
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.FRA: Si vous remarquez qu' {case.pronom_he_he_she} a du mal la nuit ou si ses orteils se recourbent sur le devant des chaussures, cela peut signifier qu' {case.pronom_he_she} a besoin d'un plus gros support.
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.ES: Si observas que {case.pronoun_he_she} está irritable por las noches o si sus dedos se doblan en la parte delantera de los zapatos, esto puede significar que es necesario una barra más grande.
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.MLG: Raha mahatsikaritra ianao fa izy mipelipelika be i azy amin'ny alina na raha miforitra mankany aoriana ny rantsan-tongony izany dia mety hidika fa mila kiraro manokana fanitsiana tongotra lehibe kokoa.
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.MYA: ညဘက်မှာ {case.pronoun_he_she} က ဂဏှာမငြိမ်တာ ဒါမှမဟုတ် {case.pronoun_his_her} ရဲ့ခြေချောင်းတွေက ဖိနပ်ရှေ့ဘက်မှာ ကွေးလာတာ သတိထားမိရင် {case.pronoun_he_she} ဟာ ပိုကြီးတဲ့ဖိနပ် (brace)ကို လိုအပ်နေပါပြီ။
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.KHM: បើអ្នកសំគាល់ឃើញ {case.pronoun_he_she} មួរម៉ៅច្រើននៅពេលយប់ ឬបើម្រាមជើងខ្ញាំពីលើផ្នែកខាងក្នុងនៃស្បែកជើងរបស់ {case.pronoun_his_her}, បានន័យថា {case.pronoun_he_she} ត្រូវការស្បែកជើងរណបធំជាងមុន។
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.NEP: यदी उहाँ राती चिड्चिडाहा हुनुभयो अथवा उहाँका खुट्टाका औंलाहरु जुत्ताको अगाडीतिर घुमेका छन् भने, त्यसको अर्थ उहाँलाई ठूलो सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज) को आवश्यकता परेको हुन सक्छ ।
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.SW: Ukiona kuwa {case.patient_first_name} hatulii usiku ama vidole vyake vya miguu vinapinda mbele ya viatu, inaweza kumaanisha kuwa anahitaji brace kubwa.
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.TGL: Kung hindi mapakali si {case.pronoun_he_she} sa gabi o kung bumabaluktot ang mga daliri ng kaniyang ng paa sa unahan ng sapatos, nangangahulugan itong kailangan na niya ng mas malaking brace.
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.WOL: Su ngeen seetloo ni  {case.pronom_he_he_she} dafay am mettit  bu guddee walla baaraami déy yi dañuy banku ci kanamu dàll yi,loolu mën naa wone ni {case.pronom_he_she} dafa soxla beneen àppaare.bu gën a mag.
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.PHI: Kung nakamatikod ka nga magsige siya ug hilak inag ka gabie o kung magsige siya ug kulong sa iyang mga kuyamoy sa tumoy sa sapatos, nagpagsabot ni nga nanginahanglan na siya ug dako-dako nga brace.

09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.Name: 09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Talk to your doctor if you notice that {case.patient_first_name}'s foot is moving back into a clubfoot position, or if it starts pointing down. This could be a sign of relapse!
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Parlez à votre médecin si vous remarquez que le pied de {case.patient_first_name} revient en position pied bot, ou s'il commence à pointer vers le bas. Cela pourrait être un signe de rechute !
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Contacta a tu médico si notas que el pie de {case.patient_first_name} se está moviendo nuevamente hacia su posición inicial, o si comienza a apuntar hacia abajo. ¡Esto podría significar una recaída!
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.MLG: Salama {case.guardian1_first_name} Miresaha amin'ny dokoteranao raha mahatsikaritra ianao fa ny tongotr'i {case.patient_first_name} dia mitady ho lasa mihodina  indray na manomboka mitifitra mankany ambany izany, mety ho efa fambaran'ny fivadihan-tongotra indray izany,
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ {case.patient_first_name} ရဲ့ ခြေထောက်ဟာ ခြေထောက်ခွင်တဲ့ပုံစံ ပြန်ရောက်သွားတာမျိုး၊ အောက်ဘက် စိုက်လာတာမျိုး သတိပြုမိရင် သင့်ဆရာဝန်နဲ့ ဆွေးနွေးပါ။ ဒါက ရောဂါပြန်ဖြစ်တဲ့ လက္ခဏာ ဖြစ်နိုင်ပါတယ်။
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ ត្រូវជជែកជាមួយវេជ្ជបណ្ឌិតរបស់អ្នកបើអ្នកឃើញថា ប្រអប់ជើងរបស់ {case.patient_first_name} វិលត្រឡប់ទៅរកស្ថានភាពដូចជើងខ្វេរវិញ, ឬបើវាចាប់ផ្តើមសំយ៉ុងចុះ។ នេះអាចជាសញ្ញាបញ្ជាក់អំពីការលាប់ឡើងវិញ!
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । यदी {case.patient_first_name} को पैतला क्लबफुटको अवस्थामा गईरहेको छ वा तलतिर फर्कन सुरु गरेको छ भने, तपाईको डाक्टरसंग सल्लाह गर्नुहोस् । यो रिल्याप्स भएको संकेत हुन सक्छ ।
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ongea na daktari wako ukiona mguu wa {case.patient_first_name} unarudi nyuma katika hali ya miguu kifundo, ama unaanza kuangalia chini. Hii inaweza kuwa ishara ya kupinda tena!
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Makipag-usap sa inyong doktor kung napapansin ninyong bumabalik ang clubfoot ni {case.patient_first_name} o kung nagsisimula itong bumaluktot pababa. Maaring ito ay senyales na ng relapse!
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Jokkooleen ak seen doktoor su ngeen seetloo ni tànku {case.patient_first_name} mu ngi dellu ci laago gi walla su tàmbalee liis jëm suuf.Loolu mën naa tekki ni dafay danuwaat feebar.
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Pakig-istorya sa imong doktor kung nakabantay ka nga ang mga tiil ni {case.patient_first_name} kay nibalik sa clubfoot nga posisyon o kung nagsugod siya ug tudlo paubos. Basin kini mao ang mga sinyales sa relapse!

09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.Name: 09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. {case.patient_first_name} is lucky to have such a caring parent! Keep up the good work!
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. {case.patient_first_name} a de la chance d'avoir un parent aussi attentionné ! Continuez votre bon travail !
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. ¡{case.patient_first_name} tiene suerte de tener un padre muy cariñoso! ¡Sigue con el buen trabajo!
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Tsara vitana i {case.patient_first_name} manana ray aman-dreny mahakarakara toy izao ! Tohizo fa asa tsara izany
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ {case.patient_first_name} အတွက် ဒီလိုဂရုစိုက်တတ်တဲ့ မိဘမျိုးရှိနေတာ ကံကောင်းတာပါပဲ။ ဆက်လုပ်ပါ။
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ {case.patient_first_name}​ មានសំណាងណាស់ដែលមានឪពុកម្តាយថ្នាក់ថ្នមថែទាំដូចជារូបអ្នក។ សូមអ្នកព្យាយាមធ្វើការងារដ៏ល្អនេះជាបន្តទៀត។
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । {case.patient_first_name} भाग्यमानी हुनुहुन्छ कि तपाई साह्रै हेरचार गर्ने अभिभावक हुनुहुन्छ । तपाईको राम्रो कार्य जारी राख्नुहोस् ।
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. {case.patient_first_name} ana bahati kuwa na mzazi anayemjali. Endelea na kazi nzuri unayofanya!
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Masuwerte si {case.patient_first_name} sa pagkakaroon ng mapag-alagang magulang! Ipagpatuloy lamang ang inyong mga nasimulan!
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. {case.patient_first_name} am na wërsëg bi mu amee way-jur wu farlu ! Wéyalleen liggéey bu baax  bii !
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Si {case.patient_first_name} kay swerte kaayo nga maampingon ka nga ginikanan. Ipadayun ang imong maayong gibuhat!

09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.Name: 09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Remember that {case.patient_first_name} wears a brace to keep the clubfoot from coming back. If a relapse occurs then treatment may have to start over.
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Rappelez-vous que {case.patient_first_name} porte une attelle pour empêcher le pied bot de revenir. Si une rechute se produit, le traitement va devoir recommencer.
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Recuerda que {case.patient_first_name} usa una barra para evitar que su condición de equinovaro vuelva. Si ocurre una recaída, entonces el tratamiento deberá comenzar desde el principio.
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Aza hadinoina fa {case.patient_first_name} dia mitondra kiraro manokana fanitsiana tongotra  mba hisorohana ny tongony tsy hivadika indray.
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ {case.patient_first_name} ဟာ ခြေထောက်ခွင်တာ ပြန်မဖြစ်အောင် ဖိနပ် (brace)ဝတ်ရတယ်ဆိုတာကို သတိရပါ။ ရောဂါပြန်ဖြစ်ရင် ကုသမှုကို အစကနေပြန်စရနိုင်ပါတယ်။
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ ត្រូវចាំថា {case.patient_first_name} ពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបដើម្បីព្យាបាលជើងខ្វេរមិនឲ្យកើតឡើងវិញ។ បើវាកើតឡើងវិញនោះ ការព្យាបាលអាចត្រូវចាប់ផ្តើមឡើងវិញដូចពីដំបូង។
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । याद राख्नुहोस् कि, क्लबफुट फर्कन नदिनका लागी {case.patient_first_name} ले सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  लगाई     राख्न जरुरी हुन्छ । यदी रिल्याप्स भएको खण्डमा उपचार पुन: सुरु देखी गर्नुपर्ने हुन्छ ।
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Kumbuka kwamba {case.patient_first_name} anavaa brace ili kuzuia miguu kifundo kurejea. Iwapo mguu umejipinda tena, matibabu yanaweza kuanza mwanzo.
