09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । हामी तपाईलाई सहयोग र समर्थन गर्न यहाँ छौं ।  यदी तपाईका कुनै जिज्ञासा वा चासो भए क्लिनिकमा सम्पर्क गर्नुहोस् ।
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Tuko hapa kukusaidia na kukuunga mkono. Wasiliana na kliniki iwapo una maswali au wasiwasi!
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Narito kami upang kayo'y tulungan at suportahan. Mangyaring tumawag lamang sa klinika kung kayo'y may mga katanungan o anumang alalahanin!
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Li nu tax a jóg mooy dimbali leen ak taxawu leen.Jokkooleen ak kilinig  ba su ngeen amee ay laaj walla lu leen yitteel !
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Naa ra mi diri para mutabang ug musuporta sa imo. Kontaka ang klinika kung naa moy mga pangutana ug mga gikabalak-an.

09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.Name: 09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. You are doing a great job keeping up with treatment! Don't forget to continue going to your appointments at {case.clinic_name}.
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Vous faites un excellent travail concernant son traitement ! N'oubliez pas de continuer à vous rendre à vos rendez-vous à {case.clinic_name}.
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. ¡Estás haciendo un gran trabajo con el tratamiento! No olvides continuar yendo a tus citas en {case.clinic_name}.
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Mety tsara mihitsy ny asa ataonao amin'ny fanarahamaso ny fitsaboana ! Aza hadinoina ny mamonjy ny fotoananao any amin'ny hopitaly
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ ကုသမှုအတိုင်း လိုက်နာပေးတာ တကယ်ကောင်းပါတယ်။ {case.clinic_name} မှာ ဆက်လက်ပြသရမယ်ဆိုတာ မမေ့ပါနဲ့။
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ អ្នកធ្វើបានល្អណាស់ សំរាប់ការព្យាបាលដែលកំពុងតែបន្តនេះ! សូមកុំភ្លេចបន្តទៅតាមការណាត់ជួបនៅ {case.clinic_name}។
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । उपचारमा राम्रोसंग संलग्न हुनुभएर तपाईले अत्यन्तै राम्रो कार्य गर्दै हुनुहुन्छ ! {case.clinic_name} मा तपाईको डाक्टरसंगको भेटका लागी जान नबिर्सनुहोला ।
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Unafanya kazi nzuri sana kuendelea na matibabu! Usisahau kuendelea kuenda kwenye miadi yako katika {case.clinic_name}.
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ipagpatuloy ang inyong magandang nasimulan sa gamutan! Huwag kalimutang pumunta sa takdang araw ng inyong pagbisita sa {case.clinic_name}.
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}.Yéen a ngi def liggéey bu mucc ayib jëm ci am pajam. Buleen fàttee wuyyuji saa su ne  ca " ràndewuu" ya ñu la jox  ca {case.clinic_name}.
09B - Bracing Night Campaign Y2.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Maayo ang imong mga gipangbuhat sa pagsunod sa pagpa-ayo! Ayaw ug kalimot sa pagpadayun sa imong mga bisita sa {case.clinic_name}.

09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.Name: 09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Clubfoot affects 1 out of 800 babies, which means many parents go through clubfoot treatment.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Le pied bot touche 1 bébé sur 800, ce qui signifie que de nombreux parents suivent un traitement du pied bot.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. El pie equinovaro afecta a 1 de cada 800 bebés, lo que significa que muchos padres deben tratar esta condición.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Zaza 1 ao anatin'ny 800 no tratran'ny mivadi-tongotra, izany dia midika fa maro ireo ray aman-dreny no manaraka fitsaboana momba ny fivadihan'ny tongotra,
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ ခြေထောက်ခွင်တဲ့ရောဂါက ကလေး ၈၀၀ မှာ ၁ ယောက်ဖြစ်တာကြောင့် မိဘတော်တော်များများက ခြေထောက်ခွင်တဲ့ရောဂါ ကုသမှုနဲ့ ရင်ဆိုင်ကြရပါတယ်။
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ ជើងខ្វេរកើតឡើង១ករណីក្នុងចំណោមទារក ៨០០នាក់ មានន័យថា ឳពុកម្តាយជាច្រើននាក់ត្រូវឆ្លងកាត់ការព្យាបាលជើងខ្វេរ។
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । क्लबफुटले ८०० बच्चाहरु मध्ये १ बच्चालाई असर गर्छ, जसको मतलब धेरै अभिभावकहरु क्लबफुटको उपचार प्रक्रियामा संलग्न हुनुहुन्छ ।
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.SW: Hujambo {case.guadian1_first_name}. Miguu kifundo inaathiri mtoto mmoja kati ya mia nane, kumaanisha kwamba wazazi wengi hupitia matibabu ya miguu kifundo.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. 1 sa 800 sanggol ang may clubfoot, ibig sabihin maraming magulang ang isinasailalim rin ang kanilang anak sa gamutan para dito.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Laagog tànk dal na 1 liir ci 800 ; loolooy wone ni way-jur yu bari ñu ngi topp pajum laagog tànk.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ang clubfoot kay naka-apekto na siya sa usa kada otso siyentos nga mga bata, nagpasabot kini nga daghang mga ginikanan ang nag-agi sa clubfoot treatment.

09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.Name: 09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.EN: Remember you are not alone! Talk to the other parents at the clinic about their experiences.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.FRA: Rappelez-vous que vous n'êtes pas seul ! Parlez aux autres parents de la clinique pour connaître leurs expériences.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.ES: ¡Recuerda, no estás solo! Hable con otros padres en la clínica sobre sus experiencias personales.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MLG: Aza hadinoina fa tsy irery ianao ! Ambarao amin'ny ray aman-dreny hafa ny amin'ny toeram-pitsaboana sy ireo traikefany,
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MYA: သင်တစ်ယောက်တည်း မဟုတ်ဘူးဆိုတာ သတိရပါ။ ဆေးခန်းမှာရှိတဲ့ တခြားမိဘတွေနဲ့ သူတို့အတွေ့အကြုံတွေအကြောင်း စကားပြောပါ။
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.KHM: សូមចាំថា អ្នកមិនមែនមានតែម្នាក់ឯងទេ! ជជែកជាមួយឳពុកម្តាយដទៃទៀតនៅគ្លីនិកអំពីបទពិសោធន៍របស់ពួកគេ។
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.NEP: याद गर्नुहोस, तपाई एक्लो हुनुहुन्न! क्लिनिकमा अन्य अभिभावकहरुसंग उहाँहरुको अनुभवका बारे कुरा गर्नुहोस् ।
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.SW: Kumbuka hauko peke yako! Ongea na wazazi wengine katika kliniki kuhusu waliyoyapitia.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.TGL: Tandaan, kayo ay hindi nag-iisa! Makipag-usap sa ibang mga magulang sa klinika tungkol sa kanilang mga karanasan.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.WOL: Fàttalikuleen ni wéetu leen! Waxtaanleen ak yeneen way-jur yiy dikk ci kilinig bi ngir xam seeni doxalin.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.PHI: Hinumdumi nga wala ka mag-inusara! Pakig-istorya sa ubang mga ginikanan sa klinika bahin sa ilang mga ka-agi.

09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.Name: 09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Remember that the brace is not painful for {case.patient_first_name}. It mantains the correct position of the feet and prevents the foot from turning inward again.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Rappelez-vous que l'attelle n'est pas douloureuse pour {case.patient_first_name}. Elle maintient la position correcte des pieds et empêche le pied de se retourner vers l'intérieur.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Recuerda que la barra no es dolorosa para {case.patient_first_name}. Mantiene la posición correcta de los pies y evita que el pie rote hacia adentro nuevamente.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Aza hadinoina fa ny kiraro manokana fanitsiana tongotra dia hampaharary an' i {case.patient_first_name}, mitazona ny tongony mba hahitsy tsara izy io ary misoroka ny fivadihan'ny voditongotra indray
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ ဖိနပ် (brace)ဝတ်တာက {case.patient_first_name} အတွက် မနာဘူးဆိုတာ သတိရပါ။ ဒါက ခြေထောက် အနေအထားမှန်အောင် ထိန်းပေးပြီး ခြေထောက်ပြန်ခွင်မသွားအောင် ကာကွယ်ပေးပါတယ်။
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ សូមចាំថាការពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបមិនមានការឈឺចាប់ទេ {case.patient_first_name}។ វាជួយឲ្យរក្សាស្ថានភាពប្រអប់ជើងដែលបានកែតំរង់ និងការពារជើងមិនឲ្យវិលទៅរកភាពដើមវិញ។
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । याद गर्नुहोस्, सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  लगाउनु {case.patient_first_name} का लागी कष्टप्रद हुँदैन । यसले पैतलालाई भित्र तिर फर्कनबाट रोकी सही अवस्थामा राख्दछ ।
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Kumbuka kwamba brace haileti maumivu kwa {case.patient_first_name}. Inadumisha nafasi sahihi ya miguu na kuzuia mguu kupinda ndani tena.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Tandaan, hindi makasasakit ang brace para kay {case.patient_first_name}. Pinananatili lamang nito ang tamang posisyon ng paa at pinipigilan ang muling pagpabalik ng clubfoot.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.WOL: Salaam maalikum  {case.guardian1_first_name}. Fàttalikuleen ni àppaare bi mettiwul ci  {case.patient_first_name}. Dafay téye tànk yi bu jub  te itam dafay tere  ñu bankuwaat wuti ci biir.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Hinumdumi nga ang brace kay dili sakit para kay {case.patient_first_name}. Nagpadayun kini sa pagtarong sa posisyon sa tiil ug nagpugong sa tiil sa pagsulod ug balik.

09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.Name: 09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Clubfoot treatment is a long process but it will ensure {case.patient_first_name} has a life without clubfeet.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Le traitement du pied bot est un long processus mais il assurera que {case.patient_first_name} ait une vie sans pieds bot.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. El tratamiento es un proceso largo, pero asegurará que {case.patient_first_name} tenga una vida sin pie equinovaro.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Ny fitsaboana ny mivadi-tongotra  dia asa maharitra saingy izany no ahafahana mahazo antoka ny hananan'i {case.patient_first_name} fiainana tsy misy tongotra mivadika
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ ခြေထောက်ခွင်တဲ့ရောဂါ ကုသမှုဟာ ရေရှည်ဖြစ်ပေမယ့် {case.patient_first_name} က တစ်သက်လုံး ခြေမခွင်တော့ပါဘူး။
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ ការព្យាបាលជើងខ្វេរគឺជាដំណើរការយូរអង្វែង ប៉ុន្តែវានឹងធ្វើឲ្យជីវិតរបស់ {case.patient_first_name} រស់នៅដោយគ្មានជើងខ្វេរទៀត។
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । क्लबफुटको उपचार लामो प्रक्रिया छ तर यसले {case.patient_first_name} लाई जीवन पयर्नत क्लबफुटबाट मुक्त राख्न सक्छ ।
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Tiba ya miguu kifundo ni utaratibu mrefu lakini itahakikisha {case.patient_first_name} ana maisha bila clubfeet.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Mahabang proseso ang paggamot ng clubfoot, subalit pagkatapos nito ay tiyak namang makakalakad ng normal si {case.patient_first_name}.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}.Pajum laagog tànk gaawul waaye dafay tax ba  {case.patient_first_name} men a tàggoo ak laagog tànk ci ag dundam..
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ang Clubfoot treatment kay usa ka taas nga proseso pero nagsiguro kini nga mabuhi si {case.patient_first_name} nga walay clubfeet.

09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.Name: 09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. It is important that {case.patient_first_name}'s shoe is on correctly. Look through the hole on the side of the shoe to make sure {case.pronoun_his_her} foot is completely down.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Il est important que la chaussure de {case.patient_first_name} soit en place correctement. Regardez à travers le trou sur le côté de la chaussure pour vous assurer que son pied soit complètement au fond.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Es importante que el zapato de {case.patient_first_name} esté correctamente puesto. Mira a través del orificio en el costado del zapato para asegurarte de que su pie esté completamente dentro.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} tena zava-dehibe ny hipetahan'ny ny kiraron'i {case.patient_first_name}  aminy tsara. Tsiriho eo amin'ilay lavaka kely eo amin'ny kiraro raha toa ka mipetraka tsara araka ny tokony ho izy, ao anaty kiraro ny tongony
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ {case.patient_first_name} ရဲ့ ဖိနပ် မှန်မှန်ကန်ကန် ဝတ်ထားဖို့ အရေးကြီးပါတယ်။ {case.pronoun_his_her} ခြေထောက်က လုံးဝ အောက်ကျရဲ့လားဆိုတာကို ဖိနပ်ဘေးနားက အပေါက်ကနေ ကြည့်ပါ။
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.NEP: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ សំខាន់ណាស់ដែលស្បែកជើងរណបរបស់ {case.patient_first_name} ត្រូវបានបំពាក់ដោយត្រឹមត្រូវ។ សូមមើលតាមប្រហោងនៅសងខាងស្បែកជើង ដើម្បីឲ្យប្រាកដថា ប្រអប់ជើងរបស់ {case.pronoun_his_her} ធ្លាក់ចុះទៅក្រោមរាបស្មើ។
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ni muhimu kwamba {case.patient_first_name} amevaa kiatu kwa usahihi. Angalia kupitia tundu upande wa kiatu ili kuhakikisha kuwa mguu umegusa chini kabisa.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Mahalagang wasto ang pagkakasuot ng sapatos ni {case.patient_first_name}. Silipin ang butas sa gilid ng sapatos upang matiyak na nakalapat ang kaniyang mga paa.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}.Dina am solo lool su fekkee ni dàllu  {case.patient_first_name} nekk na bu baax palaasam.Xoolleen ci bën-bën bi nekk ci wetu dàll wi ba mu wóor leen ni tànk bi egg na bu baax ci suuf a suuf..
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Importante gyud kaayo nga ang sapatos ni {case.patient_first_name} masuot ug tarong. Tan-awa ang buslot sa kilid sa sapatos para makasiguro nga ang iyang tiil kay naka-ubos gayud pag-ayo.

09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.Name: 09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.EN: If {case.patient_first_name}'s foot is not completely down, the foot can relapse and {case.pronoun_he_she} may need plaster casts again.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.FRA: Si le pied de {case.patient_first_name} n'est pas complètement au fond le pied peut rechuter et {case.pronoun_he_she} pourrait avoir besoin de plâtres à nouveau.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.ES: Si el pie no está completamente dentro del zapato, el pie puede torcerse y puede ser que {case.patient_first_name} necesite otra tenotomía.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MLG: Raha tsy mipetaka tsara amin'ny voditongo-kiraron'i {case.patient_first_name} ny voditongony dia mety hiverina hivadika indray izany ka mety ilàna fametahana platra vaovao indray.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MYA: တကယ်လို့ {case.patient_first_name} ရဲ့ ခြေထောက်က လုံးဝအောက်မကျဘူးဆိုရင် ခြေခွင်ရောဂါပြန်ဖြစ်နိုင်ပြီး {case.pronoun_he_she} ကို နောက်ထပ်ပတ်တီးစည်းဖို့ လိုအပ်နိုင်ပါတယ်။
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.KHM: បើជើងរបស់ {case.patient_first_name} មិនទាន់ធ្លាក់ចុះទៅក្រោមរាបស្មើទាំងស្រុងនោះទេ ជើងអាចវិលត្រឡប់ទៅរកភាពដើមវិញ ហើយ {case.pronoun_he_she} អាចត្រូវការព្យាបាលដោយការរុំប្លាតសារជាថ្មីឡើងវិញ។
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.NEP: यदी {case.patient_first_name} को पैतला पूरै तल छैन भने, पैतला रिल्याप्स हुन सक्छ र उहाँलाई फेरी प्लाष्टरको आवश्यकता पर्न सक्छ ।
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.SW: Ikiwa mguu wa {case.patient_first_name} haujagusa chini kabisa, mguu unaweza kupinda tena na anaweza kuhitaji plasta tena.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.TGL: Kapag hindi nakalapat ang paa ni {case.guardian1_first_name}, maaaring mag-relapse ang paa at kailanganin na naman niya ng plaster casts!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.WOL: Su tànku  {case.patient_first_name} wàccul lool, tànk bi mën naa yënguwaat te  {case.pronoun_he_she} mën na soxlawaat palaatar.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.PHI: Kung ang tiil ni {case.patient_first_name} kay wala naka-ubos ug ayo, ang tiil kay pwede magka-relapse ug manginahanglan na sad siya ug plaster casts.

09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.Name: 09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Don't forget to keep coming to your appointments at the clinic. The doctor still needs to check on {case.patient_first_name}'s feet.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. N'oubliez pas de continuer à venir à vos rendez-vous à la clinique. Le médecin doit encore vérifier les pieds de {case.patient_first_name}.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. No olvides continuar yendo a tus citas en la clínica. El médico todavía necesita revisar los pies de {case.patient_first_name}.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Aza hadinoina ny mamonjy ny fotoananao amin'ny dokotera any amin'ny toeram-pitsaboana. Ny dokotera dia tokony hanaramaso hatrany ny fitsaboana ny tongotr'i {case.patient_first_name}
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ ဆေးခန်းမှာ လာပြဖို့ မမေ့ပါနဲ့။ {case.patient_first_name} ရဲ့ခြေထောက်ကို ဆရာဝန်က စစ်ဆေးပေးဖို့ လိုပါသေးတယ်။
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ សូមកុំភ្លេចមកតាមការណាត់ជួបរបស់អ្នកនៅគ្លីនិក។ វេជ្ជបណ្ឌិតនៅតែត្រូវការពិនិត្យមើលប្រអប់ជើងរបស់ {case.patient_first_name}។
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । तपाईको डाक्टरसंगको भेटका लागी क्लिनिकमा आईरहन नबिर्सनु होला । डाक्टरले अझै {case.patient_first_name} को पैतला जाँच गर्न जरुरी छ ।
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Usisahau kuendelea kuja kwenye miadi katika kliniki. Daktari bado anahitaji kuangalia miguu ya {case.patient_first_name}.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Huwag kalilimutang pumunta sa inyong appointment sa klinika. Kailangan pa ring tingnan ng doktor ang mga paa ni {case.patient_first_name}.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}.Buleen fàtte ñëw ci seeni "ràndewuu" ci kilinig ba.Doktoor bi dafa war a nemmeekuwaat tànki {case.patient_first_name}.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ayaw ug kalimot ug anhi gihapon para imong pagbisita sa klinika. Kinahanglan pa gihapon tan-awon sa doktor ang mga tiil ni {case.patient_first_name}.

09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.Name: 09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Remember to check {case.patient_first_name} for any discomfort. Tell your doctor if you notice things like bruising, blisters, or red marks that don't go away.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. N'oubliez pas de contrôler l'état de {case.patient_first_name} pour tout inconfort. Avertissez votre médecin si vous remarquez des ecchymoses, des ampoules ou des marques rouges qui ne disparaissent pas.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Recuerda buscar cualquier signo de molestia en {case.patient_first_name}. Hazle saber a tu médico cosas que tu hijo presenta moretones, ampollas o marcas rojas que no desaparecen.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Tadidio hatrany ny manaramaso izay zavatra tsy mety amin'i {case.patient_first_name. }Ambarao amin'ny dokotera raha toa ka mahita zavatra toy ny tambaingan-drano amin'ny hoditra, na faritra menamena amin'ny hoditra, tsy mety afaka.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ {case.patient_first_name} မှာ အဆင်မပြေတာ ရှိ၊ မရှိ စစ်ဆေးပေးဖို့ သတိရပါ။ ညိုမဲတာ၊ အရည်ကြည်ဖုဖြစ်တာ၊ အနီကွက်ပေါ်တာတွေ ဆက်ဖြစ်နေရင်  သင့်ဆရာဝန်ကို ပြောပြပါ။
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ សូមចាំថាត្រូវពិនិត្យមើល {case.patient_first_name} បើមានអ្វីមិនប្រក្រតី។ ប្រាប់វេជ្ជបណ្ឌិតរបស់អ្នក បើឃើញមានជាំ ពងបែក ឬស្នាមក្រហមដែលមិនបាត់ទៅវិញ។
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । {case.patient_first_name} लाई कुनै असुविधा भएको छ कि, जाँच गर्नुहोस् । यदी तपाईले कुनै चोट, फोकाहरु वा रातो टाटाहरु देख्नुभएको खण्डमा तपाईको डाक्टरलाई जानकारी गराउनुहोस् ।
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Kumbuka kuangalia kama {case.patient_first_name} ana kerwa. Ambia daktari wako iwapo unaona vitu kama kukwaruzwa, uvimbe ama madoa mekundu ambayo hayapotei.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Tingnan kung hindi maganda ang pakiramdam ni {case.patient_first_name}. Mangyaring ipaalam sa doktor kung kayo'y may napapansing gasgas, paltos, o pulang marka na hindi nawawala.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Buleen fàttee nemmeeku yaramu  {case.patient_first_name} ci lépp lu ko mën a gàllankoor.. Jokkooleen ak seen doktoor su ngeen gisee ay gàkk-gàkk ci yaram wi, ay gamb walla ay tomb yu xonx yu nanguwul a deñ
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Hinumdumi nga bantayi kung si {case.patient_first_name} kay dili komportable. Ingna imong doktor kung nakabantay kag mga bun-og, nalut-han o mga pula-pula nga dili mawala.

09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.Name: 09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. You are a great parent! Keep up the treatment with {case.patient_first_name} so that {case.pronoun_he_she} can have a bright future without clubfoot!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Vous êtes un super parent ! Continuez le traitement avec {case.patient_first_name} pour que {case.proun_he_she} puisse avoir un bel avenir sans pied bot!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. ¡Eres un gran padre! ¡Sigue con el tratamiento de {case.patient_first_name} para que {case.pronoun_he_she} pueda tener un futuro brillante sin pie equinovaro!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Ray aman-dreny mahafatra-po ianao ! Tohizo ny fitsaboana an'i {case.patient_first_name} amin'izay mba hananan ho avy feno fifaliana tsy mivadika tongotra izy!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ သင်ကတကယ်တော်တဲ့ မိဘပါပဲ။ {case.patient_first_name} ရဲ့အနာဂတ်မှာ ခြေထောက်မခွင်တော့အောင် {case.pronoun_he_she} ရဲ့ကုသမှုကို ဆက်လက်ဆောင်ရွက်ပါ။
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ អ្នកជាឳពុកម្តាយដ៏ល្អ! សូមព្យាយាមបន្តជាមួយការព្យាបាលរបស់ {case.patient_first_name} ដើម្បីឲ្យ {case.pronoun_he_she} មានអនាគតល្អ ដោយគ្មានជើងខ្វេរ!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । तपाई महान अभिभावक हुनुहुन्छ ! {case.patient_first_name} को उपचार जारी राख्नुहोस् ताकी, उहाँको भविष्य क्लबफुट रहित उज्जवल होस् ।
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Wewe ni mzazi mzuri! Endelea na matibabu ya {case.patient_first_name} ili awe na maisha bora yasiyo na miguu kifundo!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Kayo ay mahusay na magulang! Ipagpatuloy lang ang paggamot kay {case.patient_first_name} upang magkaroon siya ng magandang hinaharap nang walang clubfoot!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Way-jur wu am maanaa nga!  Wéyleen ci paj mi ak  {case.patient_first_name} ngir {case.proun_he_she}  am dund gu mucc ayib  gu àndul ak laagog tànk!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Maayo ka nga pagka-ginikanan! Ipagpadayun ang pagpa-ayo kay {case.patient_first_name} para naa siyay hayag nga kaugmaon nga walay clubfoot.

09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.Name: 09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Continue to make sure {case.patient_first_name} wears the brace every night, this is a very important part of clubfoot treatment!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Continuez à vous assurer que {case.patient_first_name} porte l'attelle tous les soirs, c'est une partie très importante du traitement du pied bot!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Continúe asegurándose de que {case.patient_first_name} use la ferula todas las noches, ¡esta es una parte muy importante del tratamiento del pie equinovaro!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Ataovy hatrany izay hahazoana antoka fa {case.patient_first_name} dia manao  kiraro manokana fanitsiana tongotra isaky ny alina, izany dia zava-dehibe amin'ny fitsaboana ny tongotra mivadika
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ {case.patient_first_name} က ညတိုင်းဖိနပ် (brace)ဝတ်ခိုင်းပါ။ ဒါဟာ ခြေထောက်ခွင်တဲ့ရောဂါ ကုသမှုရဲ့ အရမ်းအရေးကြီးတဲ့ အစိတ်အပိုင်း ဖြစ်ပါတယ်။
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ ត្រូវបន្តធ្វើឲ្យប្រាកដថា {case.patient_first_name} ពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបរៀងរាល់យប់ ដែលនេះវាជាផ្នែកមួយសំខាន់ណាស់នៃការព្យាបាលជើងខ្វេរ!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । {case.patient_first_name} ले हेरक राती सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  लगाउनुभएको कुरा निश्चय गर्नुहोस्, यो क्लबफुटको उपचारका लागी धेरै महत्वपूर्ण हुन्छ ।
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Endelea kuhakikisha {case.patient_first_name} anavaa brace kila usiku, ni sehemu ya maana sana katika matibabu ya miguu kifundo!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Patuloy na tiyaking suot ni {case.patient_first_name} ang brace gabi-gabi, napakahalagang bahagi nito sa paggamot ng clubfoot!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.WOL: Salaam maalikum,{case.guardian1_first_name}.Wéyleen di seetlu ni  {case.patient_first_name} dafay sol àppaare bi ngoon gu nekk.  Bokk na ci li ëpp solo ci pajum laagog tànk.!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Siguraduha nga ipagpadayun ang pagsuot ni {case.patient_first_name} ug brace kada gabii, importante kini nga parti pagpa-ayo sa clubfoot.

09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.Name: 09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. We know that clubfoot treatment can be a stressful process but you're doing a great job! Keep up the good work!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Nous savons que le traitement du pied bot peut être un processus stressant, mais vous faites un excellent travail ! Continuez votre bon travail!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Sabemos que el tratamiento del pie equinovaro puede ser un proceso estresante, ¡pero estás haciendo un gran trabajo! ¡Sigue así!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Fantatray fa ny fitsaboana ny miva-ditongotra  dia fikarakarana mila faharetana, saingy asa lehibe no ataonao. Tohizo hatrany izany asa mahasoa ataonao izany !
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ ခြေထောက်ခွင်တာ ကုသမှုက ဖိစီးပေမယ့် သင့်ဆောင်ရွက်ချက်က တကယ်ကောင်းပါတယ်။ ဆက်လုပ်ပါ။
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}! យើងដឹងថាការព្យាបាលជើងខ្វេរអាចជាដំណើរការដែលពោរពេញទៅដោយសម្ពាធ ប៉ុន្តែអ្នកធ្វើបានល្អណាស់! សូមព្យាយាមធ្វើការងារដ៏នេះ​ល្អបន្តទៀត!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । हामीलाई थाहा छ कि, क्लबफुटको उपचार निकै तनावपूर्ण प्रक्रिया हो तर तपाईले धेरै राम्रो कार्य गरीरहनु भएको छ ! राम्रो कार्य जारी राख्नुहोस् ।
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Twajua kwamba matibabu ya miguu kifundo yanaweza kuchosha lakini unafanya kazi nzuri sana! Endelea na kazi nzuri unayofanya!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Alam naming nakaka-stress ang gamutan ng clubfoot, subalit ito'y kayang-kaya po ninyo! Ipagpatuloy lamang ang inyong magandang nasimulan!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Xam nanu ni pajum laagog tànk mën na nekk lu tiis waaye yeen a ngi def liggéey bu mucc ayib ! Wéyleen ci liggéey bi, am na solo !
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Kahibalo mi ang braces kay usa kini ka taas ug kapoy nga proseso, pero maayo na ang imong mga gipangbuhat! Ipagpadayun kini!

09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.Name: 09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Think of how far {case.patient_first_name} has come in {case.pronoun_his_her} clubfoot treatment! Keep up the good work!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Pensez à tout le chemin parcouru par {case.patient_first_name} durant son traitement du pied bot ! Continuez votre bon travail!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. ¡Piensa en cuán lejos ha llegado {case.patient_first_name} gracias al tratamiento de pie equinovaro! ¡Mantén el buen ritmo!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Saino kely anie hoe: hatramin'ny oviana moa i {case.patient_first_name} no nanomboka nanao fitsaboana tongotra mivadika ! Tohizo ny asa mahasoa ataonao !
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ {case.patient_first_name} က {case.pronoun_his_her} ရဲ့ ခြေထောက်ခွင်တာကုသမှုမှာ တော်တော် ထိရောက်နေပါပြီ။ ဆက်လုပ်ပါ။
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ សូមគិតថាតើ {case.patient_first_name} បានធ្វើការព្យាបាលជើងខ្វេររបស់ {case.pronoun_his_her} អស់រយៈពេលប៉ុន្មានមកហើយ! សូមព្យាយាមធ្វើការងារដ៏នេះ​ល្អបន្តទៀត!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । क्लबफुटको उपचारमा {case.patient_first_name} कति धेरै अगाडी बढ्नु भईसकेको हुनुहुन्छ, याद गर्नुहोस् ! राम्रो कार्य जारी राख्नुहोस् ।
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Fikiria umbali {case.patient_first_name} aliotoka katika matibabu ya miguu kifundo! Endelea na kazi nzuri unayofanya!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Isipin po ninyo kung gaano na kalayo ang narating ni {case.patient_first_name} sa paggamot ng clubfoot. Ipagpatuloy lamang ang inyong magandang nasimulan!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}.Xalaatleen ci jaar-jaaru  {case.patient_first_name}  bi muy faju laagog tànk !.Wéyleen ci liggéey bi, am na solo !
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Huna-hunaa kung unsa kalayo ang na-abtan ni {case.patient_first_name} sa pagpa-ayo niya sa clubfoot. Ipagpadayun ang imong maayong gibuhat!

09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.Name: 09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. It is important that {case.patient_first_name}'s shoe is on correctly. Look through the hole on the side of the shoe to make sure {case.pronoun_his_her} foot is completely down.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Il est important que la chaussure de {case.patient_first_name} soit en place correctement. Regardez à travers le trou sur le côté de la chaussure pour vous assurer que son pied soit complètement au fond.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Es importante que el zapato de {case.patient_first_name} esté correctamente puesto. Mira a través del orificio en el costado del zapato para asegurarte de que su pie esté completamente dentro.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Zava-dehibe ny hoe hipetahan'ny kiraron'i {case.patient_first_name} tsara  sy mety amin'ny tongony. Tsiriho eo amin'ilay lavaka kely amin'ny kiraro mba hahazoana antoka raha toa ka mipetraka tsara ao anaty kiraro araka ny tokony ho izy izany.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ {case.patient_first_name} ရဲ့ ဖိနပ် မှန်မှန်ကန်ကန် ဝတ်ထားဖို့ အရေးကြီးပါတယ်။ {case.pronoun_his_her} ခြေထောက်က လုံးဝ အောက်ကျရဲ့လားဆိုတာကို ဖိနပ်ဘေးနားက အပေါက်ကနေ ကြည့်ပါ။
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ សំខាន់ណាស់ដែលស្បែកជើងរណបរបស់ {case.patient_first_name} ត្រូវបានបំពាក់ដោយត្រឹមត្រូវ។ សូមមើលតាមប្រហោងនៅសងខាងស្បែកជើង ដើម្បីឲ្យប្រាកដថា ប្រអប់ជើងរបស់ {case.pronoun_his_her} ធ្លាក់ចុះទៅក្រោមរាបស្មើ។
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । यो महत्वपूर्ण छ कि, {case.patient_first_name} को जुत्ता सही तरिकाले लगाईएको छ । उहाँको पैतला पूरै तल छ कि छैन भनी जुत्ताको छेउमा रहेको प्वालबाट हेर्नुहोस् ।
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ni muhimu kwamba {case.patient_first_name} amevaa kiatu kwa usahihi. Angalia kupitia tundu upande wa kiatu ili kuhakikisha kuwa mguu umegusa chini kabisa.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Mahalagang wasto ang pagkakasuot ng sapatos ni {case.patient_first_name}. Silipin ang butas sa gilid ng sapatos upang matiyak na nakalapat ang kaniyang paa.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Importante gyud kaayo nga ang sapatos ni {case.patient_first_name} masuot ug tarong. Tan-awa ang kilid sa sapatos para makasiguro nga ang iyang tiil kay naka-ubos gayud pag-ayo.

09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.Name: 09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.EN: If {case.patient_first_name}'s foot is not completely down, the foot can relapse and {case.pronoun_he_she} may need plaster casts again.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.FRA: Si le pied de {case.patient_first_name} n'est pas complètement abaissé, le pied peut rechuter et {case.pronoun_he_she} pourrait avoir besoin de plâtres à nouveau.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.ES: Si el pie no está completamente dentro del zapato, el pie puede torcerse y puede ser que {case.patient_first_name} necesite ponerse yesos de nuevo .
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MLG: Raha tsy tafiditra tsara sy mipetraka tsara araka ny tokony ho izy ao anaty kiraro ny tongotr'i {case.patient_first_name}  dia mety hiverina hivadika indray ny tongotra ary izany dia mitaky famerenana fanaovana platra indray.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MYA: တကယ်လို့ {case.patient_first_name} ခြေထောက်က လုံးဝအောက်မကျဘူးဆိုရင် ခြေထောက်က ရောဂါပြန်ဖြစ်နိုင်ပြီး {case.pronoun_he_she} ကို နောက်ထပ်ပတ်တီးစည်းဖို့ လိုအပ်နိုင်ပါတယ်။
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.KHM: បើជើងរបស់ {case.patient_first_name} មិនទាន់ធ្លាក់ចុះទៅក្រោមរាបស្មើទាំងស្រុងនោះទេ ជើងអាចវិលត្រឡប់ទៅរកភាពដើមវិញ ហើយ {case.pronoun_he_she} អាចត្រូវការព្យាបាលដោយការរុំប្លាតសារជាថ្មីឡើងវិញ។
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.NEP: यदी {case.patient_first_name} को पैतला पूरै तल छैन भने, पैतला रिल्याप्स हुन सक्छ र उहाँलाई फेरी प्लाष्टरको आवश्यकता पर्न सक्छ ।
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.SW: Ikiwa mguu wa {case.patient_first_name} haujagusa chini kabisa, mguu unaweza kupinda tena na anaweza kuhitaji plasta tena.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.TGL: Kapag hindi nakalapat ang paa ni {case.guardian1_first_name}, maaaring mag-relapse ang paa at muli niyang kailanganin ang plaster casts!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.WOL: Su tànku  {case.patient_first_name} wàccul lool, tànk bi mën naa yënguwaat te  {case.pronoun_he_she} mën na soxlawaat palaatar.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.PHI: Kung ang tiil ni {case.patient_first_name} kay wala kaayo naka-ubos, ang tiil kay pwede magka-relapse ug manginahanglan na sad siya ug plaster casts.

09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.Name: 09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}, you've done so much great work! Remember to keep the brace on until the end of treatment!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name} vous avez fait tellement du bon travail ! N'oubliez pas de bien lui faire garder l'attelle jusqu'à la fin du traitement!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name} ¡has hecho un gran trabajo! ¡Recuerda usar la ferula hasta el final del tratamiento!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Nanao asa tena goavana ianao. Tsarovy fa tsy esorina mihitsy ny  kiraro manokana fanitsiana tongotra mandrapahatonga any amin' ny faran'ny fitsaboana !
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name} သင့်ဆောင်ရွက်ချက်က တကယ်ကောင်းပါတယ်။ ဖိနပ် (brace)ကို ကုသမှုပြီးတဲ့အထိ ဆက်ဝတ်ထားဖို့ မမေ့ပါနဲ့နော်။
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name} អ្នកធ្វើបានល្អណាស់! សូមចាំថា ត្រូវពាក់រណបស្បែកជើងជានិច្ចរហូតដល់ទីបញ្ចប់នៃការព្យាបាល!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । तपाईले धेरै राम्रो कार्य गरीरहनुभएको छ ! उपचारको अन्तिम समय सम्म पनि सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  लगाई     राख्न याद गर्नुहोस् ।
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Umefanya kazi nzuri sana! Kumbuka kuendelea kuweka brace hadi mwisho wa matibabu!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Marami na po kayong magandang nagawa! Tandaan, isuot ang brace hanggang sa pagtatapos ng gamutan!
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name} Seen liggéey am na maanaa lool ! Buleen ko fàttee taxawu ba mu sol àppaare bi ba paj mi jeex.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Maayo ang imong mga gipangbuhat sa pagsunod sa pagpa-ayo! Hinumdumi nga ipagpadayun ang brace hangtud mahuman ang pagpa-ayo.

09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.Name: 09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Children are born with clubfoot all over the world. You are not alone. Keep up the good work, {case.patient_first_name}'s clubfoot will soon be completely treated.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name} Des enfants naissent avec un pied bot dans le monde entier. Vous n'êtes pas seul. Continuez votre bon travail, le pied bot de {case.patient_first_fname} sera bientôt complètement traité.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. En todo el mundo existen niños que nacen con pie equinovaro. No estás solo. Sigue con el buen trabajo, el pie equinovaro de {case.patient_first_name} pronto estará completamente curado.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Maneran-tany dia misy hatrany ny zaza teraka miaraka amin'ny tongotra mivadika. Tsy irery ianao noho izany. Tohizo hatrany ny asa tsara ataonao ka ny tongotr'i {case.patient_first_name} izay mivadika dia ho voatsabo tanteraka
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name} တစ်ကမ္ဘာလုံးမှာ ခြေထောက်ခွင်ပြီး မွေးလာတဲ့ ကလေးတွေ အများကြီးပါပဲ။ သင်တစ်ယောက်တည်း မဟုတ်ပါဘူး။ ခုဆောင်ရွက်တာ တော်တော်ကောင်းပါတယ်။ {case.patient_first_name} ရဲ့ ခြေထောက်ခွင်တဲ့ရောဂါ မကြာခင်လုံးဝ ပျောက်တော့မှာပါ။
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name} កុមារដែលកើតមកមានជើងខ្វេរ មាននៅពាសពេញពិភពលោក។ អ្នកមិនមែនមានតែម្នាក់ឯងទេ។ សូមបន្តធ្វើឲ្យបានល្អទៀត ជើងខ្វេររបស់ {case.patient_first_name} នឹងទទួលបានការព្យាបាលជាសះស្បើយឆាប់ៗខាងមុខនេះ។
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । संसारभर क्लबफुट भएका बालबालिकाहरु जन्मेका छन् । तपाई एक्लो हुनुहुन्न । राम्रो काम जारी राख्नुहोस्, {case.patient_first_name} को क्लबफुट पूर्ण रुपमा उपचार चाँडै हुनेछ ।
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Watoto huzaliwa na miguu kifundo pande zote za dunia. Hauko peke yako. Endelea na kazi nzuri unayofanya. Miguu kifundo ya {case.patient_first_name} itatibika hivi karibuni.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ipinapanganak nang may clubfoot ang maraming bata sa buong mundo. Hindi kayo nag-iisa. Ipagpatuloy lamang ang magandang nasimulan, hindi magtatagal at maaayos na rin ang mga paa ni {case.patient_first_name}.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name} Ci àddina bépp am na ay xale yuy judduwaale laagog tànk.Wéetu leen!. Wéyleen ci seen liggéey bu am solo bii!.Laagog tànku  {case.patient_first_fname} dina saafarawu bu baax.
09C - Bracing Night Campaign Y3.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Daghang mga bata nga na-anak nga naay clubfoot sa tibuok kalibutan. Wala ka mag-inusara. Ipagpadayun ang maayong binuhatan. Puhon ang maayo ra gayud ang clubfoot ni {case.patient_first_name}.

09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.Name: 09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. If you notice a dark spot on {case.patient_first_name}'s feet after taking off the brace, contact your doctor.
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Si vous remarquez une tache foncée sur les pieds de {case.patient_first_fname} après avoir enlevé l'attelle, contactez votre médecin.
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Si notas una mancha oscura en los pies de {case.patient_first_name} después de quitar la ferula, comunícate con tu médico.
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Raha mahatsikaritra faritra mangana ianao eo amin'ny tongotr'i {case.patient_first_name} rehefa nesorina ny  kiraro manokana fanitsiana tongotra dia mifandraisa amin'ny dokoteranao
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ ဖိနပ် (brace)ချွတ်ပြီးတဲ့အခါ {case.patient_first_name} ရဲ့ခြေထောက်မှာ အမဲစက်တွေ့ရင် သင့်ဆရာဝန်ကို ဆက်သွယ်ပါ။
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ បើអ្នកឃើញមានស្នាមខ្មៅនៅលើប្រអប់ជើងរបស់ {case.patient_first_name} បន្ទាប់ពីដោះស្បែកជើងរណបចេញ សូមទំនាក់ទំនងទៅកាន់វេជ្ជបណ្ឌិតរបស់អ្នក។
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  निकाल्ने बेलामा यदी तपाईले {case.patient_first_name} को पैतलामा गाढा दाग देख्नुभएमा तपाईको डाक्टरलाई सम्पर्क गर्नुहोस् ।
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Wasiliana na daktari wako iwapo unaona madoa meusi kwa miguu ya {case.patient_first_name} baada ya kumtoa brace.
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Kung kayo'y may napapansing maitim na marka sa mga paa ni {case.patient_first_name} kapag tinanggal ang brace, mangyaring ipaalam lamang ito sa inyong doktor.
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Su ngeen seetloo gàkk-gàkk bu fés ci tànki  {case.patient_first_fname} gannaaw boo dindee àppaare bi, jokkool ak sa doktoor.,

09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. {case.patient_first_name} jege na njeextel paj mi ! Fàttalikuleen ni  {case.proun_he_he_she} warul a bàyyee jëfandikoo àppaare bi guddi, ba saa yu doktoor bi waxee ni lépp baax na.

09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.Name: 09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Remember to hug and play with {case.patient_first_name}, and encourage {case.pronoun_him_her} to run and play during the day while {case.pronoun_he_she} is not wearing the brace.
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. N'oubliez pas d'embrasser et de jouer avec {case.patient_first_name}, et encouragez {case.pronoun_him_her} à courir et jouer pendant la journée pendant qu' {case.pronoun_he_she} ne porte pas l'attelle.
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Recuerda abrazar y jugar con {case.patient_first_name}, y alentarlo/la a correr y jugar durante el día mientras que no esté usando la ferula.
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Aza hadinoina ny manambitamby sy milalao miaraka amin'n' {case.patient_first_name ary ny mandrisika azy hihazakazaka sy hilalao mandritry ny andro rehefa tsy mitondra kiraro manokana fanitsiana tongotra
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ {case.patient_first_name} နဲ့အတူ ပွေ့ဖက်ကစားဖို့၊ {case.pronoun_he_she} က နေ့ဘက်မှာ ဖိနပ် (brace) မဝတ်ထားတဲ့အခါ {case.pronoun_him_her} ကို ပြေးလွှား ဆော့ကစားအောင် အားပေးဖို့ သတိရပါ။
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ សូមចាំថាត្រូវឱប និងលេងជាមួយ {case.patient_first_name}, និងលើកទឹកចិត្តដល់ {case.pronoun_him_her} ឲ្យរត់ និងលេងពេលថ្ងៃ​ នៅពេលដែល {case.pronoun_he_she} មិនពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណប។
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । {case.patient_first_name} लाई माया गर्न र उहाँसंगै खेल्न नबिर्सनुहोस्, र सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  नलायको बेला दिनको समयमा उहाँलाई खेल्न कुद्न प्रेरित गर्नुहोस् ।
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Kumbuka kukumbatia na kucheza na {case.patient_first_name}, na kumuhimiza kukimbia na kucheza wakati wa mchana anapokuwa hajavaa brace.
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Huwag kalilimutang yakapin at makipaglaro kay {case.patient_first_name}, at hikayatin siyang tumakbo at maglaro sa mga pagkakataong hindi niya suot ang brace.
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Buleen fàtte di fóon ak di fo ak  {case.patient_first_name}, te di soññ   {case.pronoun_him_her} ngir muy daw ak di fo ci bëccëg gi saa yu ' {case.pronoun_he_she} solul àppaare bi.
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Hinumdumi nga gaksa ug pakigdula kay {case.patient_first_name} ug sige siya ug idasig nga dagan o dula ma-adlawan samtang wala siya nagsuot sa braces.

09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.Name: 09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Keep up the good work. Always remember that it is important for {case.patient_first_name} to wear the brace during the night, so that {case.pronoun_he_she} will be able to run and play.
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Continuez votre bon travail. Rappelez-vous toujours qu'il est important que {case.patient_first_name} porte l'attelle pendant la nuit, afin qu' {case.pronoun_he_she} puisse courir et jouer.
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Sigue con el buen trabajo. Recuerda que es importante que {case.patient_first_name} use la ferula durante la noche, para que {case.pronoun_he_she} pueda correr y jugar.
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Tohizo ny asa tsara ataonao. Tsarovy hatrany hatrany fa zava-dehibe ho an'i {case.patient_first_name} ny fahafahana mihazakazaka sy milalao
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ ကောင်းမွန်တဲ့ ဆောင်ရွက်ချက်ကို ထိန်းထားပါ။ {case.patient_first_name} က ညဘက်မှာ ဖိနပ် (brace) ဝတ်ထားမှသာ {case.pronoun_he_she} ပြေးလွှားဆော့ကစားနိုင်မယ်ဆိုတာ မမေ့ပါနဲ့။
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ សូមបន្តធ្វើឲ្យបានល្អ។ ចូរចាំថាសំខាន់ណាស់ដែល {case.patient_first_name} ត្រូវពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបជារៀងរាល់យប់ ដើម្បីឲ្យ {case.pronoun_he_she} អាចរត់ និងលេងបាន។
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । तपाईका राम्रा काम जारी राख्नुहोस् र सधैं याद राख्नुहोस् कि, {case.patient_first_name} ले राती पनि सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  लगाउनु जरुरी छ ताकी उहाँ कुद्न र खेल्न सक्नुहुनेछ ।
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Endelea na kazi nzuri unayofanya. Daima kumbuka kuwa ni muhimu kwa {case.patient_first_name} kuvaa brace wakati wa usiku, ili apate uwezo kukimbia na kucheza.
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ipagpatuloy ang magandang gawa. Tandaan na mahalagang suot ni {case.patient_first_name} ang brace sa gabi upang siya makatakbo at makapaglaro.
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case guardian1_first_name}. Wéyleen ci seen liggéey bu baax bii.Fàttalikuleen ni am na solo lool su  {case.patient_first_name} dee sol àppaare bi ci guddi gi ngir {case.pronoun_he_she} mën a daw ak di fo.bu ëllëgee.
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ipagpadayun ang imong mga maayong ginabuhat. Hinumdumi nga kailangan magsuot si {case.patient_first_name} sa iyang braces kada gabii para makadagan ug makadula siya.

09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.Name: 09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. {case.patient_first_name} is lucky to have such a caring parent! Keep up the good work!
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. {case.patient_first_name} a de la chance d'avoir un parent aussi attentionné ! Continuez votre bon travail!
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. ¡{case.patient_first_name} tiene suerte de tener un padre muy cariñoso! ¡Mantén el buen ritmo!
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Tena tsara vitana mihitsy i {case.patient_first_name} manana ray aman-dreny tena mahakarakara azy toy izao ! Aza atsahatra izany asa tsara ataonao izany !
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ {case.patient_first_name} အတွက် ဒီလိုဂရုစိုက်တတ်တဲ့ မိဘမျိုးရှိနေတာ ကံကောင်းတာပါပဲ။ ဆက်လုပ်ပါ။
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។  {case.patient_first_name} ពិតជាសំណាងណាស់ដែលមានឳពុកម្តាយដ៏ល្អបែបនេះ! សូមបន្តធ្វើឲ្យបានល្អ!
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । {case.patient_first_name}ले यस्तो ध्यान दिने अभिभावक पाउनु उहाँको भाग्य हो । तपाईका राम्रा काम जारी राख्नुहोस् ।
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. {case.patient_first_name} ana bahati kuwa na mzazi anayemjali. Endelea na kazi nzuri unayofanya!
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Masuwerte si {case.patient_first_name} sa pagkakaroon ng mapag-alagang magulang. Ipagpatuloy ang magandang gawa!
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. {case.patient_first_name} am na wërsëg bi mu amee way-jur wu farlu ! Wéyalleen liggéey bu baax  bi!
09D - Bracing Night Campaign Y4.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Si {case.patient_first_name} kay swerte kaayo nga maampingon ka nga ginikanan. Ipadayun ang imong maayong gibuhat!

10 - Treatment Complete.Name: 10 - Treatment Complete
10 - Treatment Complete.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Congratulations on completing treatment! Thank you for your effort throughout this process. You have guaranteed a bright future for {case.patient_first_name}!
10 - Treatment Complete.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Félicitations pour avoir terminé le traitement ! Nous vous remercions de vos efforts tout au long de ce processus. Vous avez garanti un bel avenir à {case.patient_first_name} !
10 - Treatment Complete.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. ¡Felicitaciones por completar el tratamiento! Gracias por todo tu esfuerzo durante este proceso. ¡Has garantizado un futuro brillante para {case.patient_first_name}!
10 - Treatment Complete.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Arahabaina nahavita soa ny fitsaboana! Misaotra noho ny ezaka nataonao nandritra ny fanatontosana ny fitsaboana. Afaka namolavola ho avy tsy misy olana ho an'i {case.patient_first_name} ianao !
10 - Treatment Complete.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ ကုသမှုပြီးသွားတဲ့အတွက် ဂုဏ်ယူပါတယ်။ ဒီကုသမှုမှာ သင့်ရဲ့ကြိုးပမ်းအားထုတ်မှုကို ကျေးဇူးတင်ပါတယ်။ {case.patient_first_name} အတွက် လှပတဲ့အနာဂတ်ကို အာမခံလိုက်ပါတယ်။
10 - Treatment Complete.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ អបអរសាទរដែលបានបញ្ចប់ការព្យាបាល! អរគុណសម្រាប់ការខំប្រឹងប្រែងនៅក្នុងដំណើរការនេះ។ អ្នកបានធានានូវអនាគតដ៏ភ្លឺស្វាងដល់ {case.patient_first_name}!
10 - Treatment Complete.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । यस प्रक्रिया भर उपचार पूरा गर्नुभएकोमा बधाई छ ! तपाईको योगदानका लागी धेरै धन्यवाद । तपाईले {case.patient_first_name} को उज्जवल भविष्य सुनिश्चित गर्नुभएको छ ।
10 - Treatment Complete.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Hongera kwa kukamilisha matibabu! Asante kwa jitihada zako katika utaratibu huu. Umehakikishia maisha bora ya baadaye ya {case.patient_first_name}!
10 - Treatment Complete.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Binabati namin kayo sa pagkompleto sa gamutan! Salamat sa panahong inyong inilaan para sa prosesong ito. Inyo pong tiniyak ang magandang hinaharap ni {case.patient_first_name}!
10 - Treatment Complete.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Jarajëf bi nga eggalee paj mi ! Nu ngi leen di gërëm diirub li ngeen ànd ak nun ci liggéey bi..Fexe ngeen ba leeral yoonu  {case.patient_first_name} !
10 - Treatment Complete.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Congratulations sa paghuman sa pagpa-ayo. Salamat kaayo sa imong pagkugi sa tibuok proseso. Nag-garantiya kag hayag nga kaugmaon ni {case.patient_first_name}.

11 - Not Wearing Brace Enough.Name: 11 - Not Wearing Brace Enough
11 - Not Wearing Brace Enough.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Relapse is when clubfoot has been corrected but later returns. It can be caused by wearing the brace incorrectly, or for not enough time.
11 - Not Wearing Brace Enough.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. La rechute se produit lorsque le pied bot a été corrigé mais qu'il revient à nouveau plus tard. Cela peut être causé par un port incorrect de l'attelle ou par un manque de temps d'utilisation.
11 - Not Wearing Brace Enough.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Una recaída es cuando el pie equinovaro ha sido corregido, pero luego vuelve a deformarse. Puede ser causado por el uso incorrecto de la ferula, o por no haber seguido el tratamiento durante el tiempo necesario.
11 - Not Wearing Brace Enough.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Misy ny fiverenan'ny fivadihan'ny tongotra raha voatsabo tsara izy teo nefa niverina tato aoriana. Izany dia mety mitranga vokatry ny tsy fanaovana araka ny tokony ho izy ny kiraro manokana fanitsiana tongotra na tsy ampy ny fotoana nitondrana izany.
11 - Not Wearing Brace Enough.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ ရောဂါပြန်ဖြစ်တယ်ဆိုတာ ခြေထောက်ခွင်တာ ပျောက်သွားပြီး နောက်ပိုင်းမှာ ပြန်ဖြစ်တာကို ခေါ်ပါတယ်။ ဖိနပ် (brace)ကို မမှန်မကန် ဝတ်ဆင်တာ၊ ဝတ်တဲ့အချိန် မလုံလောက်တာကြောင့် ဖြစ်နိုင်ပါတယ်။
11 - Not Wearing Brace Enough.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ ការលាប់ឡើងវិញគឺនៅពេលដែលជើងខ្វេរដែលបានកែតំរង់រួចហើយ​ ងាកត្រឡប់មកវិញដូចពីមុន។ វាអាចបណ្តាលមកពីការពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបមិនត្រឹមត្រូវ ឬមិនគ្រប់គ្រាន់តាមរយៈពេលដែលត្រូវពាក់។
11 - Not Wearing Brace Enough.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । क्लबफुट सच्याईसके पछि पनि  फेरी फर्केको अवस्थालाई रिल्याप्स भनिन्छ । यो सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  गलत तरिकाले लगाउनाले वा पर्याप्त समय सम्म नलगाउनाले हुन सक्छ ।
11 - Not Wearing Brace Enough.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Relapse ni wakati miguu kifundo imerekebishwa lakini baadaye inarudi. Inaweza kusababishwa na kuvaa brace isivyostahili, au kwa wakati usio wa kutosha.
11 - Not Wearing Brace Enough.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Nangyayari ang relapse kapag bumabalik ang clubfoot ng naitama nang paa. Maaaring dulot ito ng di-wastong paraan o kakulangan ng panahon ng pagsusuot ng brace.
11 - Not Wearing Brace Enough.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Daanuwaat mu ngi am su fekkee ni jubbanti nañu laagog tànk gi ba noppi mu dellusiwaat.Li ko  mën a  indi mooy colinu àppaare bu jaarul yoon walla àppaare biy  bañ a yàgg ci tànk bi.
11 - Not Wearing Brace Enough.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ang Relapse kay kung ang clubfoot natarong na pero paghuman nibalik. Ang hinungdan niini kay ang dili saktong pagsuot sa brace or dili sakto ang mga oras sa pagbutang.

12 - Not Tolerating Brace.Name: 12 - Not Tolerating Brace
12 - Not Tolerating Brace.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Do your best to be consistent with the brace so that {case.patient_first_name} knows it is part of {case.pronoun_his_her} daily routine and can get used to it.
12 - Not Tolerating Brace.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Faites de votre mieux pour faire comprendre à {case.patient_first_name} que son attelle est très importante et qu'elle doit faire partie de sa routine quotidienne et qu'il faut s'y habituer.
12 - Not Tolerating Brace.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Haz tu mejor esfuerzo para ser consistente con el uso de la ferula para que {case.patient_first_name} sepa que es parte de su rutina diaria y se pueda acostumbrar a él.
12 - Not Tolerating Brace.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Ataovy izay mety indrindra azonao atao mikasika ny tokony hatao amin'ny fampiasana ny kiraro manokana fanitsiana tongotra amin'izay fantatr'i {case.patient_first_name} fa isan'ny andavanandrom-piainany izy io ka ho fahazarana ho azy ny hampiasa izany
12 - Not Tolerating Brace.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ ဖိနပ် (brace)ဝတ်ဖို့ တစ်ပုံစံတည်းဖြစ်အောင် အတတ်နိုင်ဆုံးကြိုးစားပေးမှာသာ {case.patient_first_name} က ဒါကို {case.pronoun_his_her} ရဲ့နေ့စဉ် ပုံမှန်အလုပ်တစ်ခုလို ကျင့်သားရလာမှာပါ။
12 - Not Tolerating Brace.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ សូមធ្វើឲ្យបានល្អបំផុតក្នុងការបំពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបឲ្យបានទៀតទាត់ ដើម្បីឲ្យ {case.patient_first_name} ដឹងថាវាជាផ្នែកមួយនៃការរស់នៅប្រចាំថ្ងៃរបស់ {case.pronoun_his_her} និងមានទម្លាប់ស៊ាំជាមួយវា។
12 - Not Tolerating Brace.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  नियमित रुपमा लगाई    राख्न पहल गर्नुहोला ताकी {case.patient_first_name} ले यो उहाँको दैनिकी हो भनी बुझुन् र यसमा अभ्यस्त होउन् ।
12 - Not Tolerating Brace.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Jitahidi kuvalisha {case.patient_first_name} brace kila siku ili ajue ni sehemu ya kawaida ya kila siku na atazoea.
12 - Not Tolerating Brace.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Gawin ninyo ang makakaya upang mapanatili ang paggamit ng brace ni {case.patient_first_name} at malaman niyang bahagi ito ng kaniyang araw-araw na routine at ito'y kaniyang makasanayan.
12 - Not Tolerating Brace.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}.Defleen lu ngeen mën ngir xamal  {case.patient_first_name} ni àppaare bi  am na njariñ lool  te dafa  war a bokk ci ay yënguteem bés bu nekk te itam dafa koo war a tàmm.
12 - Not Tolerating Brace.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Buhata ang imong labing maayo sa pirming pagsuot sa brace para makahibalo si (Pangalan) nga parti ni sa iyang pangadlaw-adlaw, ug maanad sad siya ani.

12 - Not Tolerating Brace.Name: 12 - Not Tolerating Brace
12 - Not Tolerating Brace.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Play with {case.patient_first_name} when {case.pronoun_he_she} is wearing the brace. This will help {case.pronoun_him_her} feel comfortable and will make wearing the brace easier.
12 - Not Tolerating Brace.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Jouer avec {case.patient_first_name} lorsqu' {case.pronoun_he_she} porte l'attelle. Cela l'aidera à se sentir à l'aise et facilitera le port de l'attelle.
12 - Not Tolerating Brace.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Juega con {case.patient_first_name} mientras esté usando la ferula. Esto le ayudará al paciente a sentirse cómodo y facilitará el uso del mismo.
12 - Not Tolerating Brace.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Miaraha milalao amin'i {case.patient_first_n​ame} ilay mbola manao ilay kiraro manokana fanitsiana tongotra iny. Izany dia hanampy {azy} hahatsiaro ho mahazo aina tsara sy hanampy azy ho zatra manao  ilay kiraro manokana fanitsiana tongotra tsy misy olana.
12 - Not Tolerating Brace.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ {case.patient_first_name} က ဖိနပ် (brace)ဝတ်ထားတဲ့အခါ {case.pronoun_he_she} နဲ့ ဆော့ကစားပေးပါ။ ဒါကနေ {case.pronoun_him_her} က ဖိနပ် (brace)ဝတ်ရတာ သက်သောင့်သက်သာနဲ့ လွယ်ကူလာပါလိမ့်မယ်။
12 - Not Tolerating Brace.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ សូមប្រលែងលេងជាមួយ {case.patient_first_n​ame} ពេលដែល {case.pronoun_he_she} ពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណប។ ធ្វើបែបនេះនឹងជួយដល់ {case.pronoun_him_her} ឲ្យមានអារម្មណ៍ល្អ និងធ្វើឲ្យការពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបកាន់តែមានភាពងាយស្រួលជាងមុន។
12 - Not Tolerating Brace.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । {case.patient_first_name} ले सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  बाँधिराखेको बेला उहाँसंग खेल्नुहोस् । यसले उहाँलाई सहज महसुस गर्न सहयोग गर्छ र सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  लगाई     राख्न सजिलो बनाउँछ ।
12 - Not Tolerating Brace.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Cheza na {case.patient_first_name} wakati amevaa brace. Hii itamsaidia kumakinika na itafanya kuvaa brace kuwa rahisi.
12 - Not Tolerating Brace.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Makipaglaro kay {case.patient_first_name} kapag suot niya ang brace. Sa pamamagitan nito, magiging kumportable siya at mapapadali ang pagsusuot ng brace.
12 - Not Tolerating Brace.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}.Foleen ak  {case.patient_first_name} su  {case.pronoun_he_she} solee àppaare bi.Loolu dina ko dimbali ba du yëg dara te itam dina ko yombal colum àppaare bi.
12 - Not Tolerating Brace.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Pakigdula ni {case.patient_first_name} kung nagsuot siya sa iyang brace. Makatabang kini sa iyaha nga makomportable ug mahimong sayon ang pagsuot sa braces.

13 - Not Accepting Brace.Name: 13 - Not Accepting Brace
13 - Not Accepting Brace.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Even though {case.patient_first_name}'s feet may look corrected, {case.pronoun_he_she} still needs to wear the brace so that {case.pronoun_his_her} clubfoot does not come back!
13 - Not Accepting Brace.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Même si les pieds de {case.patient_first_name} peuvent paraître corrigés, {case.pronoun_he_she_he_she} doit toujours porter l'attelle pour que son pied bot ne revienne pas!
13 - Not Accepting Brace.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Aunque los pies de {case.patient_first_name} parecen corregidos, {case.pronoun_he_she} todavía necesita usar el soporte por la noche y durante las siestas para evitar que estos vuelvan a rotar hacia adentro.
13 - Not Accepting Brace.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Na dia efa hita hoe mahitsy  aza ny tongotr'i {case.patient_first_name},  dia mila manao ny kiraro manokana fanitsiana tongotra ihany mba tsy hiverina indray ilay fivadihan'ny tongotra.
13 - Not Accepting Brace.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ {case.patient_first_name} ရဲ့ ခြေထောက်ကို ပုံမှန်လို့ထင်ရပေမယ့် {case.pronoun_he_she} က ခြေထောက်ပြန်မခွင်သွားအောင် {case.pronoun_his_her} က ဖိနပ် (brace)ကို ဝတ်ဖို့လိုပါသေးတယ်။
13 - Not Accepting Brace.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ ទោះបីជាប្រអប់ជើងរបស់ {case.patient_first_name} មើលទៅហាក់ដូចជាបានកែតំរង់រួចហើយក៏ដោយ, {case.pronoun_he_she} នៅតែត្រូវការពាក់ស្បែកជើងរណបដដែល ដើម្បីកុំឲ្យជើងខ្វេររបស់ {case.pronoun_his_her} ត្រឡប់មកវិញ!
13 - Not Accepting Brace.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । {case.patient_first_name} को खुट्टा सद्दे भएको जस्तो देखिएता पनि फेरी क्लबफुट नदोहोरिनका लागी उहाँले अझै सहायेक् उपकरन (डि.बी शूज)  लगाउन जरुरी छ ।
13 - Not Accepting Brace.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ingawa miguu ya {case.patient_first_name} inaweza kuonekana ni kama imerekebishwa, bado anahitaji kuvaa brace ili miguu kifundo isimrudie!
13 - Not Accepting Brace.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Kahit na mukhang maayos na ang mga paa ni {case.patient_first_name}, kailangan pa rin niyang isuot ang brace upang hindi bumalik ang clubfoot!
13 - Not Accepting Brace.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Donte tànki {case.patient_first_name}  mel nañu ni lu jubbantiku , {case.pronoun_he_she_he_she} war naa sol saa yu nekk àppaare bi ngir laagog tànk gi bañ a dellusi.!
13 - Not Accepting Brace.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Bisan pag ang mga tiil ni {case.patient_first_name} kay tarong tan-awon, kinahanglan gihapon ni niyang suoton aron dili mubalik ang clubfoot!

14 - Reminder: 2 days before visit.Name: 14 - Reminder: 2 days before visit
14 - Reminder: 2 days before visit.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. {case.patient_first_name} has an appointment at the clubfoot clinic on {case.next_visit_date}. Please remember to take {case.pronoun_him_her} to the appointment. You are doing the best thing for {case.pronoun_him_her}!
14 - Reminder: 2 days before visit.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. {cas.patient_prénom_du_patient} a un rendez-vous le {cas.next_visit_date}. N'oubliez pas de l'emmener au rendez-vous. Vous faites ce qu'il y a de mieux pour {case.pronoun_him_her}!
14 - Reminder: 2 days before visit.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. {case.patient_first_name} tiene una cita en la clinica de pie equino varo el {case.next_visit_date}. Recuerda acudir a la cita. ¡Estás haciendo lo mejor para {case.pronoun_him_her}!
14 - Reminder: 2 days before visit.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} I {case.patient_first_name} dia manana fotoana amin'ny dokotera any amin'ny toeram-pitsaboana {case.clinic_name} amin'ny {case.next_visit_date}. Azafady, aza hadinoina ny miverina any. Tena zava-tsoa no ataonao aminy
14 - Reminder: 2 days before visit.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ {case.patient_first_name} က {case.clinic_name} မှာ {case.next_visit_date} ကျရင် ပြသဖို့ ချိန်းဆိုထားပါတယ်။ {case.pronoun_him_her} ကို ဆေးခန်း ခေါ်လာပေးပါ။ {case.pronoun_him_her} အတွက် အကောင်းဆုံး ဆောင်ရွက်ပေးနိုင်ပါလိမ့်မယ်။
14 - Reminder: 2 days before visit.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ {case.patient_first_name} មានការណាត់ជួបនៅ {case.clinic_name} ថ្ងៃទី {case.next_visit_date}។ សូមចាំថាត្រូវនាំ {case.pronoun_him_her} មកតាមការណាត់ជួប។ អ្នកកំពុងតែធ្វើបានល្អបំផុតហើយ សម្រាប់ {case.pronoun_him_her}!
14 - Reminder: 2 days before visit.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू ।{case.patient_first_name} को डाक्टरसंगको भेट {case.clinic_name} मा {case.next_visit_date} दिन तय भएको छ । कृपया उहाँलाई भेटका लागी ल्याउनुहोला । तपाईले उहाँका लागी सबैभन्दा राम्रो कार्य गर्दै हुनुहुन्छ ।
14 - Reminder: 2 days before visit.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. {case.patient_first_name} ana miadi katika {case.clinic_name} tarehe {case.next_visit_date}. Tafadhali kumbuka kumleta. Unafanya jambo bora kwake!
14 - Reminder: 2 days before visit.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. May appointment si {case.patient_first_name} sa {case.clinic_name} sa {case.next_visit_date}. Tiyaking siya ay makararating sa kaniyang appointment. Inyo pong ginagawa ang pinakamabuti para sa kaniya!
14 - Reminder: 2 days before visit.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}. {cas.patient_prénom_du_patient} am na "ràndewuu"  ca  {cas.nom_de_la_clinique} ci  {cas.next_visit_date}.Buleen ko fàttee yobbu ca "ràndewuu " ba. Kon , dingeen def li gën ci  {case.pronoun_him_her}!
14 - Reminder: 2 days before visit.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Si {case.patient_first_name} naay bisitasyon sa {case.clinic_name} sa {case.next_visit_date}. Palihug ug hinumdumi nga kahinanglan nimu siya dalhon. Ginabuhat nimo ang pinakamaayo para sa iya.

15 - Reminder: 1 day after missed visit.Name: 15 - Reminder: 1 day after missed visit
15 - Reminder: 1 day after missed visit.EN: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. We are sorry you missed {case.patient_first_name}'s appointment on {case.next_visit_date}.
15 - Reminder: 1 day after missed visit.FRA: Bonjour, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Nous sommes désolés que vous ayez manqué le rendez-vous de {case.patient_first_name} le {case.next_visit_date}.
15 - Reminder: 1 day after missed visit.ES: Hola, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Lamentamos que hayas perdido la cita de {case.patient_first_name} el {case.next_visit_date}.
15 - Reminder: 1 day after missed visit.MLG: Salama ! {case.guardian1_first_name} Miala tsiny izahay fa tara tamin'ny fotoana nifanomezana hitondrana an'i {case.patient_first_name} tany amin'ny dokotera ianao tamin'ny daty {case.next_visit_date}
15 - Reminder: 1 day after missed visit.MYA: မင်္ဂလာပါ {case.guardian1_first_name}။ {case.next_visit_date} နေ့မှာ {case.patient_first_name} ဆေးခန်းပြဖို့ ပျက်ကွက်သွားတာ စိတ်မကောင်းပါဘူး။
15 - Reminder: 1 day after missed visit.KHM: សួស្តី {case.guardian1_first_name}។ យើងសោកស្តាយ ដែលអ្នកមិនបានមកតាមការណាត់ជួបរបស់ {case.patient_first_name}នៅថ្ងៃទី {case.next_visit_date}។
15 - Reminder: 1 day after missed visit.NEP: नमस्ते {case.guardian1_first_name} ज्यू । तपाईले {case.patient_first_name} को मिति {case.next_visit_date} को भेट गुमाउनुभएकोमा खेद छ ।
15 - Reminder: 1 day after missed visit.SW: Hujambo {case.guardian1_first_name}. Tunasikitika ulikosa miadi ya {case.patient_first_name} kumuona daktari ya tarehe {case.next_visit_date}.
15 - Reminder: 1 day after missed visit.TGL: Kumusta, {case.guardian1_first_name}. Ikinalulungkot namin na hindi kayo nakarating sa appointment ni {case.patient_first_name} noong {case.next_visit_date}.
15 - Reminder: 1 day after missed visit.WOL: Salaam maalikum, {case.guardian1_first_name}.Nu ngi mettitlu li nga luppe "ràndewuu" bu   {case.patient_first_name} ci  {case.next_visit_date}.
15 - Reminder: 1 day after missed visit.PHI: Hi {case.guardian1_first_name}. Pasensya kaayo nga wala ka kaabot sa takdang pagbisita ni {case.patient_first_name} sa {case.next_visit_date}.

15 - Reminder: 1 day after missed visit.Name: 15 - Reminder: 1 day after missed visit
15 - Reminder: 1 day after missed visit.EN: Remember that {case.patient_first_name} needs to keep going to the doctor to make sure that the treatment works correctly. Try to return to the clinic as soon as possible!
15 - Reminder: 1 day after missed visit.FRA: Rappelez-vous que {case.patient_first_name} doit continuer à aller chez le médecin pour s'assurer que le traitement fonctionne correctement. Essayez de retourner à la clinique dès que possible!
15 - Reminder: 1 day after missed visit.ES: Recuerda que {case.patient_first_name} debe seguir yendo al médico para asegurarse de que el tratamiento funciona correctamente. ¡Intenta acudir a la clínica lo antes posible!
15 - Reminder: 1 day after missed visit.MLG: Aza hadinoina fa {case.patient_first_name} dia mila mamonjy dokotera mba hahazoana antoka fa mandeha tsara ny fikarakarana ny fitsaboana atao. Miverena mankany amin'ny toeram-pitsaboana vantany vao azonao atao izany.
15 - Reminder: 1 day after missed visit.MYA: ကုသမှု မှန်ကန်စေဖို့အတွက် {case.patient_first_name} က ဆရာဝန်ဆီ သွားနေရမယ်ဆိုတာ မမေ့ပါနဲ့။ ဆေးခန်းကို အမြန်ဆုံး ပြန်လာပြပေးပါ။
15 - Reminder: 1 day after missed visit.KHM: សូមចាំថា {case.patient_first_name} ត្រូវបន្តមកជួបគ្រូពេទ្យជានិច្ចដើម្បីឲ្យប្រាកដថា ការព្យាបាលមានដំណើរការត្រឹមត្រូវ។ ចូរព្យាយាមត្រឡប់មកកាន់គ្លីនិកឲ្យបានឆាប់តាមដែលអាច!
15 - Reminder: 1 day after missed visit.NEP: याद राख्नुहोस् {case.patient_first_name} को उपचारले सही काम गरीराखेको छ भनेर पक्का हुन डाक्टरकहाँ गईराख्नु आवश्यक हुन्छ । क्लिनिकमा सकेसम्म चाँडो फर्कने प्रयत्न गर्नुहोला ।
15 - Reminder: 1 day after missed visit.SW: Kumbuka kwamba {case.patient_first_name} anahitaji kuendelea kuenda kwa daktari kuhakikisha matibabu yanafanya kazi ipasavyo. Jaribu kurudi katika kliniki mara iwezekanavyo
15 - Reminder: 1 day after missed visit.TGL: Tandaan, kailangang magpatingin ni {case.patient_first_name} sa doktor para matiyak na maayos ang gamutan. Sikaping makabalik sa klinika sa lalong madaling panahon!
15 - Reminder: 1 day after missed visit.WOL: Fàttalikuleen ni {case.patient_first_name} dafa war a wéy di dem ci doktoor bi ngir mu  wóor ni paj maa ngi jaar yoon. Delluleen ca kilinig ba saa yu mënee nekk!
15 - Reminder: 1 day after missed visit.PHI: Hinumdumi nga kailangan magpadayun si {case.patient_first_name} sa pagbisita sa iyang doktor para makasiguro nga ang tarong ang iyang pagpa-ayo. Sulayi ug balik dayun sa klinikasa pinaka!

16 - Treatment Suspended.Name: 16 - Treatment Suspended
16 - Treatment Suspended.EN: Remember to follow your doctor’s directions and return to the clinic for {case.patient_first_name}'s treatment when it is okay to do so!
16 - Treatment Suspended.FRA: N'oubliez pas de suivre les directives de votre médecin et de retourner à la clinique pour le traitement de {case.patient_first_fname} lorsqu'il est possible de le faire!
16 - Treatment Suspended.ES: ¡Recuerda seguir las instrucciones de tu médico y regresar a la clínica para el tratamiento de {case.patient_first_name} cuando sea necesario!
